SA01vakobhau:3: 001_08 śāstraṃ praṇetukāmaḥ svasya śāsturmāhātmyajñāpanārthaṃ guṇākhyānapūrvakaṃ tasmai namaskāramārabhate ya iti /

SA01vakobhau:618: 017_26-02 tatra tāvat pañcānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktijñānadarśanaskandhānāṃ śīlaskandho rūpaskandhena saṃgṛhītaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:630: 018_10-11 ya ime tatra ṣaḍ dhātavaḥ uktāḥ pṛthivīdhāturabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturākāśadhāturvijñānadhāturityeṣāṃ dvayorlakṣaṇamanuktam /
SA01vakobhau:631: 018_11-12 tat kimākāśamevākāśadhāturveditavyaḥ sarvaṃ aca vijñānaṃ vijñānadhātuḥ/
SA01vakobhau:644: 018_19 aghaṃ ca tadanyasya rūpasya tatrāpratighātātsāmantakaṃ cānyasya rūpasyetyapare /
SA01vakobhau:651: 018_24-25 tadevaṃ satyeṣāṃ catvāro dhātavaḥ spraṣṭavyadhātāvantarbhūtāḥ pañcamo rūpadhātau ṣaṣṭhaḥ saptasu vijñānadhātuṣviti /
SA01vakobhau:652: 018_26 ye punarime aṣṭādaśa dhātava uktāsteṣāṃ kati sanidarśanāḥ katyanidarśanāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:659: 019_06 ya ete rūpaskandhasaṃgṛhītā daśa dhātava uktāste sapratighāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:660: 019_06-07 pratigho nāma pratighātaḥ sa ca trividhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:663: 019_08 yathā hasto haste pratihanyate upale vā /
SA01vakobhau:666: 019_09-10 yathoktaṃ prajñaptā"vasti cakṣurjale pratihanyate na sthale /
SA01vakobhau:684: 019_16-17 yasmin yasya kāritraṃ sa tasya viṣayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:686: 019_17-18 kaḥ punaḥ svasminviṣaye pravarttamānamālamvane vā pratihanyata ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:688: 019_18-19 nipāto vā 'tra pratighāto yā svaviṣaye pravṛttiḥ
SA01vakobhau:690: 019_20-21 ye dharmā viṣayapratighātena sapratighā āvaraṇapratighātenāpi ta iti catuṣkoṭikaḥ
SA01vakobhau:691: 019_21 prathamā koṭiḥ sapta cittadhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaśca yaḥ saṃprayuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:695: 019_23-24 ye dharmā viśayapratighātena sapratighā ālambana pratighātenāpi ta iti /
SA01vakobhau:740: 021_01-02 tasmādabhyavahāravītarāgāṇāṃ gandharasau tatra niṣprayojanau na tu spraṣṭavyam /
SA01vakobhau:744: 021_03-04 ata eṣāmeva trayāṇāṃ dhyānopapattau saṃbhavo na gandharasayoriti /
SA01vakobhau:747: 021_05-06 tābhyāṃ hi vinā'; śrayaśobhaiva na syāditi vyavahārśca /
SA01vakobhau:748: 021_06-07 yadyetat prayojanamadhiṣṭhānamevāstu śobhārthaṃ vacanārthaṃ ca mā bhūdindriyam /
SA01vakobhau:769: 021_16 yāni tatrendriyāṇi tairavikalā ahīnendriyā iti ko 'tra virodhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:772: 021_17-18 sta eva tatra ghrāṇajivhendriye na tu gandharasau /
SA01vakobhau:773: 021_18 ātmabhāvamukhena hi ṣaḍāyatane tṛṣṇāsamudācāro na viṣayamukhena /
SA01vakobhau:777: 021_21-22 rūpavītarāgāṇāṃ tatropapattirato 'tra daśa rūpasvabhāvā dhātavastadāśrrayālambanāśca pañca vijñānadhātāvo na saṃabhavanti //
SA01vakobhau:784: 022_02 kati savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ katyavitarkā vicāramātrāḥ katyavitarkā avicārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:791: 022_06-08 tatra manodhāturmanovijñānadhātuḥ saṃprayuktaśca dharamadhāturanyatra vitarkavicārābhyāṃ kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:796: 022_11 kāmadhātau prathame dhyāne vicāra eṣu triprakāreṣu nāntarbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:806: 022_17 daśa rupiṇo dhātavaḥ śeṣā nityamavitarkā avicārā asaṃprayogitvāt //
SA01vakobhau:807: 022_18 yadi pañca vijñānakāyāḥ savitarkāḥ savicārāḥ kathamavikalpakā ityucyante /
SA01vakobhau:819: VAkK_1.33 tau prajñā mānasī vyagrā smṛtiḥ sarvaiva mānasī //
SA01vakobhau:823: 022_26 mānasyeva sarvā smṛtiḥ samāhitā cāsamāhitā cānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:826: 023_02-03 cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānadhātavo manodhātuśca ete sapta cittadhātavaḥ sālambanā viṣayagrahaṇāt /
SA01vakobhau:829: 023_05-06 śeṣā daśa rūpiṇo dhātavo dharmadhātupradeśaścāsaṃprayuktako 'nālambanā it isiddham /
SA01vakobhau:833: ye sapta sālambanā uktāḥ aṣṭamaṣyārdhena sārdham /
SA01vakobhau:842: 023_15-16 anye 'nupāttāstadyathā mūlavarjeṣu keśaromanakhadanteṣu viṇmūtrakheṭasiṃghāṇakaśeṇitādiṣu bhūmyudakādiṣu ca /
SA01vakobhau:859: 024_01-02 tacca naivaṃ bhūtānāṃ catuṣṭva khakkhaṭādilakṣaṇāvadhāraṇāt sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:861: 024_02-03 na hi kāṭhinyādīni cakṣurādibhirgṛhyante nāpi varṇādayaḥ kāyendriyeṇa /
SA01vakobhau:862: 024_03-05 uktaṃ ca sūtre "cakṣurbhikṣo ādhyātmikamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādo arupyanidarśanaṃ saprataighaṃ evaṃ yāvat kāyaḥ
SA01vakobhau:863: 024_05-06 rūpāṇi bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāyarupi sanidarśanaṃ sapratigham /
SA01vakobhau:864: 024_06-07 śabdo bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rupyanidarśanaṃ sapratigham /
SA01vakobhau:866: 024_07-08 spraṣṭavyāni bhikṣo bāhyamāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpyanidarśanaṃ sapratighami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:867: 024_09 spraṣṭrvyāyatanikadeśenaiva bhūtānāṃ saṃgrahāccheṣaṃ na bhūtānīti spaṣṭamādarśitam /
SA01vakobhau:868: 024_09-10 yattarhi sūtre uktaṃ "yaccakṣuṣi maṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagatami"ti
SA01vakobhau:872: 024_12-13 na ca yuktaṃ cittameva caittā ityabhyupetum /
SA01vakobhau:873: 024_13-14 "saṃjñā ca vedanā ca caitasika eṣa dharmaścittānvayāccittaniśrita';
SA01vakobhau:879: 024_18-19 paramāṇusaṃghātatvāt śeṣā na saṃcitā iti siddhaṃ bhavati //
SA01vakobhau:880: 024_20-21 aṣṭādaśānaṃ dhātūnāṃ kaśchīnatti kaśiciādyate ko dahati ko dahyate kastulayati kastulyate /
SA01vakobhau:881: 024_22 chinatti cchidyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātue catuṣṭayam /
SA01vakobhau:891: 024_26-27 yathā cchinattī cchiyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātucatuṣṭayam /
SA01vakobhau:897: 025_04 kecidāhuḥ tadeva dhātucatuṣṭayaṃ dāhakaṃ tulyaṃ ca
SA01vakobhau:899: 025_06-07 kati vipākajāḥ dhātavaḥ katyaupacayikāḥ kati naihṣyandikāḥ kati dravayuktāḥ kati kṣaṇikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:902: 025_09-10 adhyātmaṃ tāvat pañca dhātavaḥ cakṣurādayo vipākajāścaupacayikāśca /
SA01vakobhau:911: 025_13 bhavatu phalahetau phalopacāro yathā phale hetūpacāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:922: 025_20-21 yattarhi prajñaptiśāstre uktaṃ "pāruṣyavirateḥ subhāvitatvād brahmasvaratā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ nirvartta iti /
SA01vakobhau:924: 025_22 karmabhyo hi bhūtāni bhūtebhyaḥ śabdaḥ iti /
SA01vakobhau:926: 025_22-24 karmabhyo hi vipākajāni mahābhūtāni tebhyaścaupacayikāni tebhyo naiḥṣyandikāni tebhyaḥ śabda iti /
SA01vakobhau:927: 025_24-25 evam tarhi śāhī hikyapi vedanā karmajabhūtasaṃbhūtatvānna vipākaḥ prapnoti /
SA01vakobhau:937: 026_03-04 te vipākajā apyaupacayikā api naiḥṣyandrikā api /
SA01vakobhau:943: 026_08-09 te prathamānāsrave duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntikalāpe kṣaṇamekamanaiḥṣyandikā bhavantyataḥ kṣaṇikā ityucyante /
SA01vakobhau:951: VAkK_1.38 cakṣurvijñānadhātvoḥ syāt pṛthak lābhaḥ sahāpi ca //
SA01vakobhau:965: 026_22-23 tṛtīyā kāmadhātau labdhāvihīnacakṣuḥ prathamadhyānopapanno dvitīyādidhyānopapannaśca paśyan /
SA01vakobhau:968: 026_25 etasya prasaṅgasya samuccayārthaścaśabdaḥ sahāpi ca iti /
SA01vakobhau:973: 027_05 ṣaḍ vijñānāni ṣaḍāśrayā ityete dvādaśa dhātava ādhyātmakāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:980: 027_10 "cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham" iti /
SA01vakobhau:983: 027_12-13 evam tarhi ṣaḍ vijñānadhātava ādhyātmikā na prāpnuvanti /
SA01vakobhau:985: 027_13-14 yadā tadā ta eva te bhavantīti lakṣaṇaṃ nātibarttante /
SA01vakobhau:988: 027_15-16 yadi cānāgatapratyutpannasya vijñānasya manodhātulakṣaṇaṃ na syāt atīte 'pyadhvani manodhāturna vyavasthāpyeta /
SA01vakobhau:994: 027_21-22 yo hi viṣayo yasya vijñānasya niyato yadi tatra tadvijñānamutpantaṃ bhavatyutpattidharmi vā evaṃ sa viṣayaḥ sabhāga ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:995: 027_22-23 na ca so 'sti kaściddharmadhāturyatra nānantaṃ manovijñānamutpannamutpatsyate vā /
SA01vakobhau:996: 027_23-24 tathā hi sarvāryapudgalānāmidaṃ cittamavaśyamutpadyate "sarvadharmā anātmāna" iti /
SA01vakobhau:998: 027_25-26 sa punaścittakṣaṇo 'nyasya cittakṣaṇasyālambanamiti dvayoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ sarvadharmā hyālambanaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:1004: 028_02 uktaṃ bhavati yaḥ svakarmakṛt sa sabhāga iti /
SA01vakobhau:1005: 028_02-03 tatra yena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇyapaśyat paśyati drakṣyati vā taducyate sabhāgaṃ acakṣuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1008: 028_04-05 yad dṛṣṭvā rūpāṇi niaruddhaṃ nirudhyate nirotsyate vā yaccānutpattidharmi /
SA01vakobhau:1010: 028_06 tadevānutpattidharmi dvidhā kṛtvā vijñānasamāyuktaṃ cāsamāyusktaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:1013: 028_07-08 rūpāṇi ca yāni cakṣuṣā 'paśāyat paśyati drakṣyati vā tāni sabhāgāni /
SA01vakobhau:1015: 028_09 yānyadṛṣṭānyeva niruddhāni nirudhyante nirutsyante vā yāni cānutpattidharmīṇi /
SA01vakobhau:1021: 028_11-12 rūpaṃ tu yaḥ paśyati tasya sabhāgaṃ yo na paśyati tasya tatsabhāgam /
SA01vakobhau:1023: 028_12-13 asti hi saṃbhavo yadrūpamekaḥ paśyati taddhavo 'pi paśyeyuryathā candranaṭmallaprekṣāsu /
SA01vakobhau:1024: 028_13-14 natu saṃbhavo 'sti yadekena cakṣuṣā dvau paśyetām /
SA01vakobhau:1029: 028_16-18 gandhādayastu ya ekena gṛhyante na te 'nyena prāptagṛhaṇādityasādhāraṇatvādeṣāṃ cakṣurādivadatideśo nyāyyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1031: 028_18-19 asti hyeṣa saṃbhavo ya eva gandhādaya ekasya ghrāṇādivijñānamutpādayeyusta evānyeṣāmapi /
SA01vakobhau:1039: 028_23-24 ye punarasabhāgāste teṣā sabhāgānāṃ jātisāmānyena sabhāgatvāt tatsabhāgāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1040: 028_25 kati dhātavo darśanaheyāḥ kati bhāvanāheyāḥ katyaheyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1050: 029_02-03 nanu cānyadapi darśanaprahātavyamasti pṛthagjanatvamāpāyikaṃ ca kāyavākkarma /
SA01vakobhau:1061: 029_11-12 tasmādanyatra jātamaṣaṣṭhajaṃ pañcendriyajaṃ ca yattadapi nāsti darśnaprahātavyam //
SA01vakobhau:1062: 029_13 aṣṭādaśānāṃ dhātūnāṃ kati dṛṣṭiḥ kati na dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1066: 029_17-18 pañca satkāyadṛṣṭyādikā dṛṣṭayaḥ laukikī samyag dṛṣṭiḥ śaiṅkṣī dṛṣṭiraśaikṣī dṛṣṭirityayamaṣṭaprakāro dharmadhāturdṛṣṭi ravraśiṣṭo na dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1077: ata eva cānyā 'pi kliṣṭā 'kliṣṭā vā prājñā na dṛṣṭiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1086: 030_06 savijñānakaṃ yadā bhavati tadā paśyatyanyadā neti /
SA01vakobhau:1087: 030_06-07 evam tarhi tadeva cakṣurāśritam vijñānaṃ paśyatītyastu /
SA01vakobhau:1092: VAkK_1.42 dṛśyate rūpaṃ na kilāntaritaṃ yataḥ //
SA01vakobhau:1093: 030_12 yasmāt kila rūpaṃ kuḍyādivyavahitaṃ na dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:1094: 030_12-13 yadi hi vijñānaṃ paśyettassyāpratighatvāt kuḍyādiṣu pratighāto nāsti ityvāṛtamapi rūpaṃ paśyet /
SA01vakobhau:1095: 030_13-14 naiva hāvṛte cakṣurvijñānamutpadyata ityanutpannaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:1097: 030_14-16 yasya tu cakṣuḥ paśyati tasya cakṣuṣaḥ saparatighatvādvyayavahite vṛttyabhāva iti vijñānasyānutpatti rāśrayeṇaika viṣayapravṛttatvāt yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:1098: 030_16-17 kiṃ nu vai cakṣuḥ prāptaviṣayaṃ kāyendriyavat yata āvṛtaṃ na paśyet /
SA01vakobhau:1103: 030_19-20 yatrālokasyāpratibandha āvṛte 'pi rupe tatropapadyata eva cakṣurvijñānam /
SA01vakobhau:1104: 030_20-21 yatra tu pratibandhastatra notpadyata ityanutpannatvādāvṛtaṃ nekṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:1113: 030_24-25 yathā ca sūtra uktaṃ "cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇīṣṭāni kāntāni"ti /
SA01vakobhau:1115: 030_25-27 uktaṃ ca sūtre "cakṣurbrāhmaṇa dvāraṃ yāvadeva rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya" ityato gamyate cakṣuṣā dvāreṇa vijñānaṃ paśyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:1120: 031_01 yadi vijñānaṃ kpaśyati ko vijānāti kaścānayorviśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1121: 031_01-02 yadeva hi rūpasya vijñānaṃ tadevāsya darśnamiti /
SA01vakobhau:1122: 031_02-03 tadyathā kācit prajñā paśyatītyapyucyate prajānātītyapyevaṃ kiñcidvijñānaṃ paśyatītyapyucyāte vijānātītyapi /
SA01vakobhau:1124: 031_03-04 "yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati kartṛbhūtasya cakṣuṣaḥ kā 'nyā dṛśikriye"ti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:1135: 031_09 tathā hi tasminnutpanne rūpaṃ dṛṣṭamityucyate na vijñātam /
SA01vakobhau:1143: tatra kaḥ paśyati ko vā dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:1147: 031_15-16 uktaṃ hi bhagavatā "janapadaniruktiṃ nābhiniviśeta saṃjñāṃ ca lokasya nābhidhāvedi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:1149: 031_17-18 cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti ghrāṇaṃ jighrati jihvā āsvādayati kāyaḥ spṛśati mano vijānātīti /
SA01vakobhau:1150: 031_19 tadyadi cakṣuḥ paśyati kimekena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyatyāhosvidubhābhyām /
SA01vakobhau:1154: 031_22-23 tathā hi dvayorvivṛtayoḥ paraiśāuddhataraṃ darāśanaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:1155: 031_23-24 ekasmiṃścīnmīlite cakṣuṣi dvitīye cārdhanimīlite dvicandrādigrahaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:1157: 031_24-25 na cāśrayavicchedād vicchedaparasaṅgo vijñānasya deśāpratiṣṭhitatvād raupavaditi /
SA01vakobhau:1158: 031_26-27 yadi cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti yāvanmano vijānāti kimeṣāṃ prāpto viṣaya āhosvidaprāptaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1160: 032_02 tathā hi dūrādrūpaṃ paśyatyakṣisthamañjanaṃ na paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:1162: 032_02-03 sati ca prāptaviṣayatve divyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotramiha dhyāyināṃ nopajāyeta /
SA01vakobhau:1164: 032_03-04 yadyaprāptaviṣayaṃ cakṣuḥ kasmānna sarvamaprāptaṃ paśyati dūraṃ tiraskṛtaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:1167: 032_05-06 kasmānna sarvaṃ prāptaṃ paśyatyañjanaṃ śalākāṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:1168: 032_06-07 yathā ca ghrāṇādīnaṃ prāpto viṣayo na tu sarvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1188: 032_15-16 ata eva yadi hi spṛśeyurhasto haste 'bhyāhataḥ sajyeto palaścopale /
SA01vakobhau:1191: 032_17-18 kaścidvāyudhāturvikiraṇāya pravṛtto yathā saṃvarttanyāṃ kaścit saṃdhāraṇāya yathā vivarttanyāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:1195: 032_20-21 evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'yamapi grantha upapanno bhavati vibhāṣāyām /
SA01vakobhau:1196: 032_21-22 kiṃ nu spṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭamutpadyate āhosvidaspṛṣṭahetukamiti praśnayitvāha"kāraṇaṃ prati /
SA01vakobhau:1199: 033_01 kadācit spṛṣṭahetukaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yadā cayavatāṃ cayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1205: 033_04 anyathā hi sāntarāṇāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ śūnyeṣvantareṣu gatiḥ kena pratibadhyeta /
SA01vakobhau:1208: 033_05-06 ta eva te saṃghātāḥ paramāṇavaḥ spṛśyante yathā rūpyante /
SA01vakobhau:1209: 033_06-07 yadi ca paramāṇordigbhāgabhedaḥ kalpyate spṛṣṭasyāspṛṣṭasya vā sāvayavatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1214: 033_12 yāvanto hīndriyaparamāṇavastāvanto hi viṣayaparamāṇavaḥ sametya vijñānaṃ janayanti /
SA01vakobhau:1218: 033_14-15 kadācit bhūyāṃso yadā mahāntaṃ parvataṃ paśyatyunmiṣitamātreṇa /
SA01vakobhau:1234: 033_24 tatra cakṣurindriyaparamāṇavaḥ kadācit sarve sabhāgā bhavanti kadācittatsabhāgāḥ /

SA01vakobhau:1866: 051_23 atha yaḥ srvālpaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kiyadbhirindriyaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1872: 052_01 vedanā hi vit vedayata iti kṛtvā /
SA01vakobhau:1885: 052_09 atha yaḥ sarvabahubhirindriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa kiyadbhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1899: 052_19-20 kimete saṃskṛtā dharmā yathā bhinnalakṣaṇā evaṃ bhinnotpādā utāho niyatasahotpādā api kecitsanti /
SA01vakobhau:1902: 052_21 rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikāścttaviprayuktāḥ saṃskārā asaṃskṛtaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:1906: 052_24 sarvasūkṣmo hi rūpasaṃghātaḥ paramāṇur ity ucyāte /
SA01vakobhau:1908: 052_24-25 sa kāma ghātāvaśabdako 'nindriyaścāṣṭadravyaka utpadyate nānyatamena hīnaḥ/
SA01vakobhau:1909: 052_25-01 aṣṭo dravyāṇicatvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri copādāyarūpāṇi rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni /
SA01vakobhau:1910: 053_01-02 sendriyastu paramāṇuraśabdako navadravyaka utpadyate daśadravyako vā /
SA01vakobhau:1917: 053_06 aparamindriyaṃ yatra paramāṇau tatra daśa dravyāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:1919: 053_07-08 saśabdā punarete paramāṇava utpadyamānā yathākramaṃ navadaśaikādaśa dravyakā utpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:1921: 053_09-10 kathamihāvinirbhāge bhūtānāṃ kaścideva saṃghātaḥ kaṭhina utpadyate kaścideva drava uṣṇo vā samudīraṇo vā /
SA01vakobhau:1922: 053_10-11 yadyatra paṭutamaṃ prabhāvata udbhūtaṃ tasya tatropalabdhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1926: 053_12-13 pratyayalābhe ca sati kaṭhinādīnāṃ dravaṇā dibhāvāt apsu śaityātiśayādauṣṇyaṃ gamyata ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:1929: 053_14-15 bījatas teṣu teṣāṃ bhāvo na svarūpata ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:1934: 053_17-18 rūpadhātau gandharasayorabhāva uktastena tatratyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ ṣaṭsaptāṣṭadravyakā ityuktarūpatvāt na punarucyante /
SA01vakobhau:1935: 053_19 kiṃ punaratra dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate āhosvidāyatanam /
SA01vakobhau:1937: 053_19-20 yadi dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate atyalpamidamucyate aṣṭadravyako navadaśādravyaka iti /
SA01vakobhau:1943: 053_23-24 caturdravyako hi vaktavyo yāvatā bhūtānyapi spraṣṭavyāyatanam /
SA01vakobhau:1944: 053_24-25 kiñcidatra dravyameva dravyaṃ gṛhyate yadāśrayabhūtaṃ kiñcidatrāyatanaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhyate yadāśritabhūtam /
SA01vakobhau:1945: 053_25-26 evamapi bhūyāṃsi bhūtadravyāṇi bhavantyupādāyarūpāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ bhūtacatuṣkāśritatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:1956: 054_07-08 yatkiṃ cidutpadyate rūpaṃ cittaṃ caitasikā viprayuktā vā sarvaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaiḥ sārdhamutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:1958: 054_10-410 prāptyā saha satvākhyamevotpadyate nānyaditi vikalpārtho vāśabdaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1962: 054_13-14 pañca prakārāścaittā mahābhūmikāḥ kuśalamahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ akuśalamahābhūmikāḥ parīttakleśamahābhūmikāśca /
SA01vakobhau:1964: 054_14-15 yo hi yasya gativiśayaḥ sa tasya bhūmirityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:1965: 054_15-16 tatra mahatī bhūmireśāmiti mahābhūmikāḥ ye sarvatra cetasi bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:1967: VAkK_2.24 vedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśo matiḥ smṛtiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1969: 054_19 ime kila daśa dharmāḥ sarvatra cittakṣaṇe samagrā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:1982: 054_24-25 sa eva duḥparicchedaḥ pravāheṣvapi tāvat kiṃ punaḥ kṣaṇeṣu /
SA01vakobhau:1983: 054_25-02 rūpiṇīnāmapi tāvadoṣadhīnāṃ bahurasānāṃ kāsaṃcidindriyagrāhyā rasaviśeṣā duravadhārā bhavanti kiṃ punarye dharmā arūpiṇo buddhigrāhyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:1984: 055_02-03 kuśalā mahābhūmireṣāṃ ta ime kuśala mahābhūmikā ye sarvadā kuśale cetasibhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:1987: mūladvayamahiṃsā ca vīryaṃ ca kuśale sadā //
SA01vakobhau:1988: 055_06 ime daśa dharmā kuśale cetasi nityaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:1998: 055_10 sā tu yathā kāyikī vedanā tathā veditavyā /
SA01vakobhau:2006: 055_13-14 tadyathā prītiḥ prītisthānīyāśca dharmāḥ prītisaṃbodhyaṅgamuktaṃ bhagavatā /
SA01vakobhau:2009: 055_16-17 naca saṃkalpavyāyāmau prajñāsvabhāvau tasyāstvanuguṇāviti tāsyātvanuguṇāviti tācchaydyaṃ labhete /
SA01vakobhau:2023: 055_24-25 prajñā ca mahābhūmiketi nāsau kuśalamahābhūmika evocyate /
SA01vakobhau:2028: 056_02-03 kleśā mahābhūmireṣāṃ ta ime kleśamahābhūmikā ye dharmāḥ sadaiva kliṣṭe cetasi bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:2029: 056_03 ke punaste sadaiva kliṣṭe cetasi bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:2044: 056_12-13 "āśraddhyaṃ kauśīdyaṃ muṣitasmṛtitā cetaso vikṣepaḥ avidyā asaṃprajanyamayoniśomanaskāro mithyādhimokṣa auddhatyaṃ pramādaśce" ti /
SA01vakobhau:2051: 056_18-19 ata evocyate "ye mahābhūmikāḥ kleśamahābhūmikā api ta" iti /
SA01vakobhau:2053: prathamā koṭirvedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśaśca /
SA01vakobhau:2059: 056_22-23 styānaṃ punariṣyate sarvakleśasaṃprayogīti kleśamahābhūmikeṣu tasyāpāṭhe kasyāparādhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2060: 056_23-24 evaṃ tvāhuḥ paṭhitavyaṃ bhavetsamādhyanuguṇatvāttu na paṭhitam /
SA01vakobhau:2062: 056_25-26 kaḥ punaḥ styānacarito yo nauddhatyacaritaḥ ko vā auddhatyacarito yo na styānacaritaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2066: 056_28 ete hi sadā kleṣṭa eva cetasi bhavanti nānyatra //
SA01vakobhau:2068: 057_02-03 akuśale tu cetasyāhrīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ ca nityaṃ bhavata ityetau dvau dharmāvakuśalamahābhūmikāvucyete /
SA01vakobhau:2072: 057_06-07 parīttakleśā bhūmireṣāṃ ta ime parīttakleśabhūmikā avidyāmātreṇa bhāvanāheyena manobhūmikenaiva ca saṃprayogāt /
SA01vakobhau:2076: 057_09 tatra vaktavyaṃ kasmiṃścitte kati caittā avaśyaṃ bhavantīti /
SA01vakobhau:2086: daśa mahābhūmikā daśa kuśalamahābhūmikā vitarko vicāraśca /
SA01vakobhau:2089: 057_17-18 yatra tvasti tatra tadevādhikaṃ kṛtvā trayoviṃśatiścaittā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:2092: 057_19 iha tu punaḥ kaukṛtyālambano dharmaḥ kaukṛtyamucyate cetaso vipratisāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2093: 057_19-21 tadyathā śūnyatālalmvanaṃ vimokṣamukhṃ śūnyatetyucyate aśubhālambanaścālobho 'śubha iti /
SA01vakobhau:2094: 057_21-22 loke 'pi ca dṛṣṭaḥ sthānena sthānināmatideśaḥ sarvo grāma āgataḥ sarvo deśa āgata iti /
SA01vakobhau:2100: 058_01 na mayā sādhu kṛtaṃ yanna kṛtamiti /
SA01vakobhau:2107: 058_05-06 daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleāśamahābhūmikā dvāvakuśalamahābhūmikau vitarkovicāraśca /
SA01vakobhau:2108: 058_06-07 āveṇikaṃ nāma cittaṃ yatrāvidyaiva kevalā nānyaḥ kleśo 'sti rāgādiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2113: 058_09-10 tatrākuśalaṃ dṛṣṭiyuktaṃ yatra mithyādṛṣṭirvā dṛṣṭiparāmarśo vā śīlavrataparāmarśo vā /
SA01vakobhau:2115: 058_12-13 yatra punaścaturbhiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃprayuktamakuśalaṃ cittaṃ rāgeṇa va pratighena vā mānena vā vicikitsayā vā tatraikaviṃśatirbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:2117: 058_14-15 krodhādibhirapyupakleśairyathoktaiḥ saṃprayukte citte ete ca viṃśatiḥ sa copakleśa ityekaviṃśatirbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:2120: 058_16 samāsata āveṇike cetasyakuśale dṛṣṭiyukte ca viṃśatiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2125: 058_20 daśa mahābhūmikāḥ ṣaṭ kleśamahābhūmikāḥ vitarkavicārau ca /
SA01vakobhau:2133: VAkK_2.30 middhaṃ sarvāvirodhitvādyatra syādadhikam hi tat //
SA01vakobhau:2137: 059_02 ya eva kāmadhātau caittānāṃ niyama uktaḥ
SA01vakobhau:2139: 059_04 ato yathoktāt kaukṛtyaṃ middhaṃ ca sarvathā nāsti prathame dhyāne yat kiñcidakuśalam /
SA01vakobhau:2142: 059_06 ya eva prathame dhyāne na santi ta eva
SA01vakobhau:2147: 059_10-11 dhyānāntarāt pareṇa dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣvārūpyeṣu ca yathāpratiṣiddhaṃ nāsti vicāraśca /
SA01vakobhau:2151: 059_12-13 sa hi svasyāṃ parṣadyaśvajitā bhikṣuṇā praśnaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ "kutremāni brahman catavāri mahābhūtānyapariśeṣaṃ nirudhyante" iti /
SA01vakobhau:2153: 059_14-15 "ahamasmin brahmā īśvaraḥ kartā nirmātā sraṣṭā sṛjaḥ pitṛbhūto bhūtānāmi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:2155: 059_16 idānīṃ keṣāñcideva caittānāṃ tantravihitaṃ nānākāraṇaṃ vakṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:2158: 059_19-20 guṇeṣu guṇavatsu cāgauravatā apratīśatā abhayamavaśavartitā āhrīkyaṃ gauravapratidvandvo dharmaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:2163: 059_23-24 kathamidaṃ vijñātavyam abhayasya darśanamabhayadarśitā āhosvit bhayasyādarśanam /
SA01vakobhau:2165: 059_24-25 abhayasya darśanaṃ cet prajñā vijñāsyate bhayasyādarśanaṃ cedavidyā vijñāsyate /
SA01vakobhau:2171: 060_01 evamapi dve apekṣe yugapat kathaṃ setsyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2172: 060_01-03 na khalūcyate yugapadātmānaṃ paraṃ cāpekṣata ityapi tvastyasau kadācidalajjā yā ātmānamapekṣamāṇasyāpi pravartate sā āhrīkyam /
SA01vakobhau:2175: 060_04-05 pratahamena tāvat kalpena sagauravatā sapratīśatā na bhayavaśavrtitā hrīḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2189: 060_12-13 pudgaleṣu tu prema na gauravaṃ putradārasārdhaṃ vihāryantevāsiṣu /
SA01vakobhau:2202: 060_20-21 nanu ca śraddhā hrīśca kuśalamahābhūmikatvāttatrāpi vidyete /
SA01vakobhau:2203: 060_21 dvividhā hi śraddhā dharmeṣu pudgaleṣu ca /
SA01vakobhau:2205: 060_21-22 tatra ye pudgalālambane śraddhāhriyau te tatra na staḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2215_1: nātivilīyate evaṃvitarkavicārayogāccittaṃ nātisūkṣmaṃ bhavati nātyodārika mityubhayorapi tatrāsti vyāpāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2216: 061_01-03 evaṃ tarhi nimiṭtabhūtau vitarkavicārāvaudārika sūkṣmatayoḥ prāpnuto yathā payaścā tapaścasarpiṣaḥ śyānatva vilīnatvayornatu punastatsvabhāvau /
SA01vakobhau:2222: 061_06-07 tatra ye audārikāste vitarkāḥ ye sūkṣmāste vicārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2223: 061_07-08 yadi caikatra citte 'nyo dharma audāriko 'nyaḥ sūkṣmaḥ ko 'tra virodha iti /
SA01vakobhau:2231: 061_11-12 naiva hi vitarkavicārāvekatra citte bhavata ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:2236: madaḥ svadharme raktasya paryādānaṃ tu cetasaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:2237: 061_17 yena kenacit parato viśeṣaparikalpena cetasa unnatiḥ mānaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2241: 061_20 uktāḥ saha cittena caittāḥ prakāraśa steṣāṃ punarimāḥ saṃjñāḥ paribhāṣyante /
SA01vakobhau:2255: ta eva hi cittacaittāḥ sāśrayā ucyante indriyāśritatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:2263: 062_09-10 yathaiva hyekaṃ cittamevaṃ caittā apyekaikā iti /
SA01vakobhau:2268: 062_14 ime saṃskārā na cittena asaṃprayuktā naca rūpasvabhāvā iti cittaviprayuktāucyante /
SA01vakobhau:2271: 062_17 dvividhā hi prāptiraprāptavihīnasya ca lābhaḥ pratilabdhena ca samanvāgamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2282: 062_24-25 ata eva hi cottamabhidharme "anāsravairdharmaḥ kaḥ samanvāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2285: 062_26-01 pratisaṃkhyānirodhena sakalabandhanādikṣaṇasthavarjyāḥ sarva āryāḥ pṛthagjanāśca kecitsamanvāgatāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2288: 063_02-03 yasya ca nāsti prāptistastasyāprāptirapi nāstīti siddhāntaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2292: 063_04-05 sūtre hyustaṃ "sa eṣāṃ daśānāmaśaikṣāṇāṃ dharmaṇāmutpādāt pratilambhātsamanvāgamādaryo bhavati pañcāṅgaviprahīṇa" iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2293: 063_06 tena tarhi asattvākhyairapi samanvāgamaḥ prāpnoti parasattvaiśca /
SA01vakobhau:2296: "rājā bhikṣavaścakravarti saptabhī ratnaiḥ samanvāgata" iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2298: tasya teṣu ratneṣu vaśitvaṃ kāmacāra iti /
SA01vakobhau:2301: 063_10-11 ayam ayogaḥ yad asyā naiva svabhāvaḥ prajñāyate rūpaśabdādivad rāgadveṣādivad vā na cāpi kṛtyaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrādivat /
SA01vakobhau:2305: 063_12-13 ye ca dharmā aprāptā ye ca tyaktā bhūmisaṃcāravaiarāgyatasteṣāṃ kathamutpattiḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:2308: 063_14-15 sakalabandhanānāṃ khalvapi mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśotpattibhedo na syāt prāptyabhedāt /
SA01vakobhau:2309: 063_15 yato vā sa bhedastata evāstu tadutpattiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2314: 063_17-18 asatyāṃ hi prāptau laukikamānasānāmāryapṛthagjanānāmāryā ime pṛthagjanā ima iti na syād vyavasthānam /
SA01vakobhau:2316: 063_19-20 etaccaiva kathaṃ bhaviṣyatyeṣāṃ prahīṇaḥ kleśa eṣāmaprahīṇa iti /
SA01vakobhau:2319: 063_21-22 āśrayo hi sa āryāṇāṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgasāmarthyāttathā parāvṛtto bhavati yathā na punastatpraheyāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prarohasamartho bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:2323: 063_24-25 yaścāprahīṇastena samanvāgato yaḥ prahīṇastenā samanvāgata iti prajñapyate /
SA01vakobhau:2324: 063_25-26 kuśalā api dharmā dviprakārā ayatnabhāvino yatnabhāvinaśca ye ta ucyante utpattipratilambhikāḥ prāyogikāśceti /
SA01vakobhau:2325: 063_26-27 tatrāyatnabhāvibhirāśrayasya tadvījabhāvānupaghātāt samanvāgata upaghātādasamanvāgata ucyate samucchinnakuāśalamūlaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2327: 064_01-02 na tu khalu kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vījabhāvasyātyantaṃ santatau samudghātaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2329: 064_03-05 tasmādvījamevātrānapoddhṛtamanupahatam paripṛṣṭaṃ ca vāśiatvakāle samanvāgamākhyāṃ tabhate nānyad dravyam /
SA01vakobhau:2331: 064_05-06 yannāmarūpaṃ phalotpattau samartha sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa vā /
SA01vakobhau:2338: 064_09-10 yāvaddhi tasyādhivāsako 'vinodako bhavati tāvat bhavyastāni bhāvayitum /
SA01vakobhau:2339: 064_10-11 evamayaṃ samanvāgamaḥ sarvāthā prajñaptidharmo na tu dravyadharmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2356: 064_23-24 tatrāpraptiṃsaṃṅkhyānirodhasya traidhātukī pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya rūpārūpyāvacarī cānāsravā ca /
SA01vakobhau:2362: 065_03 naivaśaikṣānāśaikṣā dharmā ucyante sāsravā dharmā asaṃskāṛtaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:2366: 065_05-06 tasyaiva śaikṣeṇa mārgeṇa praptasya śaikṣī aśaikṣeṇāśaikṣī /
SA01vakobhau:2372: teṣāmapratisaṃkhyānirodhasya bhāvanāheyā prāptiḥ anāryaprāptasya ca pratisaṃkhyānirodhasya /
SA01vakobhau:2382: 065_18 dve abhijñe avyākṛte nirmāṇacittaṃ ca varjayitvā /
SA01vakobhau:2383: 065_18-19 teṣāṃ hi balavattvāt prayogaviśeṣaniṣpatteḥ pūrva paścāt sahajā prāptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2389: 065_25-26 yathā 'vyākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāmayaṃ praptibhedaḥ kimevaṃ kuśalākuśalānāmapikaścit prāptibhedo 'sti /
SA01vakobhau:2417: 066_13-14 anyathā hi cuddho 'pi śrāvakapratyekabuddhagotrakai rasamanvāgamādanāryaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:2436: 066_23-24 yathā tāvadāryamārgasyālābhaḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ tasya lābhāttadvihīyate bhūmisaṃcārācca /
SA01vakobhau:2446: 067_01-02 tatra prāptyutpādāttena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bhavati prāptiprāptyā ca /
SA01vakobhau:2447: 067_02-03 prāptiprāptyutpādāt punaḥ prāptyaiva samanvāgato bhavatyato nānavsthā /
SA01vakobhau:2448: 067_03-04 evaṃ ca kṛtva ātmanā tṛtīyasya dharmasya kuśalasya kliṣṭasya kliṣṭasya vā dvitīye kṣaṇe tisraḥ prāptayo jāyante /
SA01vakobhau:2449: 067_04-05 tāsāṃ ca punastisro 'nuprāptaya iti ṣaḍ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:2450: 067_05-06 tṛtīye kṣaṇe prathamadvitīyakṣaṇotpannānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ nava prāptayaḥ sārdhamanuprāptibhirityaṣṭādāśa bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:2451_2: ekasya prāṇinaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe upajāyante ityanantadravyāḥ pratisantānamātmabhāvakṣaṇāḥ
SA01vakobhau:2454: 067_11-12 itarathā hyākāśe 'pyava kāśo na syāt dvitīyasya prāṇinaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:2458: sattvānāṃ sākṛśyaṃ nikāyasa bhāga ityasyāḥ śāstre saṃjñā /

SA01vakobhau:2463: 067_18-20 punaḥ skndhāyatanadhātutaḥ yadi satvasabhāgatā dravyamaviśiṣtaṃ na syāt anyonyaviśeṣabhinneṣu sattveṣu sattvasttva ityabhedena buddhirna syāt prajñaptiśca /

SA01vakobhau:2481: 068_06-07 sa eko 'pyanekasmin varttate yadi dyotitā yadi na dyotitā /

SA01vakobhau:2491: 068_15-17 asaṃjñisattveṣu devepūpapannānāṃ yaścittacaittānāṃ nirodhastadāsaṃjñikaṃnāma dravyaṃ yena cittacaittā anāgate 'dhvani kālāntaraṃ saṃnirudhyante notpattuṃ labhante /

SA01vakobhau:2609_1: nirodhasamāparttiṃ ca samāpannānāmasaṃjñināṃ ca devānāmāsaṃjñike pratilabdhe yo bhava" iti /

SA01vakobhau:2785: 076_08-09 eṣā hyeṣu saṅgāspadamataḥ śriyamivaināṃ kālakarṇīsahitāṃ darśayāmāsa tasyāmanāsaṅgārthamiti /

SA01vakobhau:2817: 076_28-29 avidyāndhā hi bālāḥ saṃskārapravāhamātmāta ātmīyataścādhimuktā abhiṣvajante /

SA01vakobhau:2834: 077_15-16 "kṣaṇikasya hi dharmasya vinā sthityā vyayo bhavet /

SA01vakobhau:2841: 077_19 yadapi ca jñānaprasthāna uktam "ekasmiṃścitte ka utpādaḥ /

SA01vakobhau:2857: 077_26-27 nātivahuviśeṣabhinnāstu saṃskārāḥ satyapyanyathātve sadṛśā eva dṛśyante /
SA01vakobhau:2858: 077_27-29 antimasya tarhi śabdārciḥkṣaṇasya parinirvāṇakāle ca ṣaḍāyatanasyottarakṣaṇābhāvāt sthityahnyanyathātvaṃ nāstītyavyāpinī lakṣaṇavyavasthā prāpnoti /

SA01vakobhau:2862_0: 078_02-04 samāsatastvatra sūtre saṃskṛtasyedaṃ lakṣaṇamiti dyotitaṃ bhagavatā "saṃskṛtaṃ
SA01vakobhau:2862_1: nāma yadbhūtavā bhavati bhūtvā ca punarna bhavati yaścāsya sthitisaṃjñakaḥ prabandhaḥ
SA01vakobhau:2863: 078_04-05 kim atra dravyāntarair jātyādibhiḥ katham idānīṃ sa eva dharmo lakṣyas tasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ yokṣyate /

SA01vakobhau:2864_1: ca gotvalakṣaṇāni gor nānyāni kāṭhinyādīni ca pṛthivīdhātvādīnāṃ lakṣaṇāni tebhyo nānyāni /

SA01vakobhau:2877: 078_16-17 kimanāgataṃ dravyato 'sti nāstīti paścājjanayati vā naveti sidhyet /

SA01vakobhau:2879: 078_18-20 uparatakāritrā cotpannā kathaṃ varttamānā sidhyatīti varttamānalakṣāṇaṃ vaktavyam /

SA01vakobhau:2881: 078_21-22 yadaiva hyenaṃ sthitiḥ sthāpayati tadaiva jrā jarayati anityatā vināśayatīti /
SA01vakobhau:2882: 078_22-24 kimayaṃ tatra kāle tiṣṭatvāhosvijjīryatu vinaśyatu vā yo 'pi hi brūyāt sthityādīnāmapi kāritraṃ krameṇeti tasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ bādhyate /

SA01vakobhau:2892: 078_29 śakyaṃ tu khalu sthityā sthāpyamatyantamapi sthāpayitum /
SA01vakobhau:2896: 079_01-02 yadi hi te balīyasyau syātāṃ pūrvameva syātām /
SA01vakobhau:2897: 079_02-04 nivṛttakāritrāyāṃ khalvapi sthitau ta cāpi na tiṣṭataḥ sa cāpi dharma iti kathaṃ kutra vā kāritraṃ karttumutsahiṣyete kiṃ vā punastābhyāṃ karttavyam /
SA01vakobhau:2898: 079_04-05 sthitiparigrahāddhi sa dharma utpannamātro na vyanaśyat /
SA01vakobhau:2899: 079_05-06 sa tu tayā vyupekṣyamāṇo niyataṃ na sthāsyatyayamevāsya vināśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2901: 079_07 jarā tu khalu sarvathātvena na tathā /
SA01vakobhau:2907: 079_11-12 yo 'pyāha nikāyāntarīyo "vināśa kāraṇaṃ prāpyānityatā vināśāyatī"ti tasya harītakīṃ prāpya devatā virecayatītyāpannaṃ bhavati kiṃ punastāṃ kalpayitvā /
SA01vakobhau:2908_0: 079_12-15 tat evāstu vināśakāraṇādvināśaḥ cittacaittānāṃ ca kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamāttadanityatāyā
SA01vakobhau:2909: 079_15-16 tasmāt pravāhaṃ pratyetāni saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānyuktānītyevametatsūtraṃ sūnītaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:2910: 079_17 apica yadyanāgatā jātirjanyasya janikā kimarthaṃ sarvamanāgataṃ yugapannotpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:2915: 079_20-21 sati sāmargya bhāvādasati cābhāvānna jāteriti hetupratyayā eva jana kāḥsantaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2918: 079_22-23 jātamityeva tu na syādasatyāṃ jātau ṣaṣṭhivacanaṃ ca rūpasyotpādaḥ iti yathā rūpasya rūpamiti /
SA01vakobhau:2920: 079_24 tena tarhy anātmatvam apy eṣṭavyam anātmabuddhi-siddhyartham /
SA01vakobhau:2927: 080_01-02 tasya viśeṣaṇārthaṃ rūpasyotpāda iti ṣaṣṭīṃ kurvanti yathā rupasaṃjñaka evotpādaḥ pratīyeta mā 'nyaḥ pratyāyīti /
SA01vakobhau:2930: 080_04 yadi jātyā vinā jāyate kasmādasaṃskṛtamapyākāśādikaṃ na jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:2933: 080_05-06 yathā ca dharmatayā na sarvaṃ jātimadiṣyate tathā na sarvaṃ jāyata ityeṣṭavyam /
SA01vakobhau:2934: 080_06-08 yathā ca tulye jātimattve tadanye pratyayāstadanyasyotpādane na samarthā bhavantyevamevāsaṃskṛtasyotpādane sarve 'pyasamarthāḥ syuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2935: 080_08 siddhā eva tu dravyabhāvena jātyādaya iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2936: 080_09-10 nahi dūṣakāḥ santītyāgamā apāsyante nahi mṛgāḥ santīti yavā noṣyante nahi makṣikāḥ patantīti modakā na bhakṣyante /
SA01vakobhau:2944: 080_15-16 vākyaṃ padaṃ yāvatā 'rthaparisamāptistadyathā "anityā vata saṃskārā" ityevamādi yena kriyāguṇakālasaṃbandhaviśeṣā gamyante /
SA01vakobhau:2947: 080_17-18 na vai lipyavayavānāṃ pratyāyanārthamakṣārāṇi praṇītānyakṣarāṇāmeva tu pratyāyanārthaṃ lipyavayavāḥ praṇītāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2954: 080_22-23 padakāyaḥ tadyathā "sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ sarvadharma anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇami" tyevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:2955: 080_23-24 vyañjanakāyastadyathā ka kha ga gha ñetyevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:2956: 080_24-25 nanu caite vāksvabhāvatvācchabdātmakā iti rūpasvabhāvā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:2959: 080_25-26 ghoṣo hi vāk naca ghoṣāmātrenārthāḥ pratīyante /
SA01vakobhau:2961: 080_26-28 vāṅnāmni pravrttate nāmārthaṃ dyotayati naiva ghoṣamātraṃ vāg yena tu ghoṣeṇārthaḥ pratīyate sa ghoṣo vāk /
SA01vakobhau:2966: 081_04-05 yo 'pi hi manyate nāmārthaṃ dyotayatīti tenāpyetadavaśyamabhyupagantavyaṃ yadi pratīpadārthakaṃ bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:2967: 081_05-06 taccaita cchabdamātrādeva pratītapadārthakāt sidhyatīti kimartharaṃ nāma kalpayitvā /
SA01vakobhau:2968: 081_06 idaṃ cāpi na jñāyate kathaṃ vāṅnāmni pravarttata iti /
SA01vakobhau:2971: 081_07-09 ghoṣasvavatvādvācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāmotpādayiṣyati yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviāśeṣa iṣyate nāmna utpādakaḥ sa evārthasya dyotako bhaviṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:2973: 081_09-11 ghoṣasvabhāvatvādvācaḥ sarvaṃ ghoṣamātraṃ nāma prakaśayiṣyati yādṛśo vā ghoṣaviśeṣa iṣyate nāmnaḥ parakāśakaḥ sa evārthasya dyotako bhaviṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:2975: 081_12 na caikasya bhāgaśa utpādo yukta iti kathamutpādayantī vāṅnāmotpādayet /
SA01vakobhau:2977: 081_13-14 evaṃ tarhi paścima eva de nāmna utpādādyo 'pi tamevaikam śṛṇoti so 'pyarthaṃ pratipadyeta /
SA01vakobhau:2978: 081_14-15 athāpyevaṃ kalpyeta vāgvyañjanaṃ janayati vyañjanaṃ tu nāmeti /
SA01vakobhau:2979: 081_15-16 atrāpi sa eva prasaṅgo vyañjanāṃ sāmargyābhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:2980: 081_16 eṣa eva ca prasaṅgo nāmnaḥ prakāśakatve vācaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2981: 081_16-18 vyañjanāṃ pi vāgviśiṣṭaprajñā apyavahitacetaskā lakṣaṇataḥ paricchettum notsahanta iti vyañjayāpi vāk naivotpādikā na prakāśikā yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:2983: 081_19 evaṃ satyatītānāgatasyārthasya varttamānaṃ nāma na syād /
SA01vakobhau:2984: 081_19-21 apatyānāṃ pitṛbhiryatheṣṭaṃ nāmāni kalpyanta iti katamannāma tatsahajaṃ syāt asaṃskṛtānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ kena sahajaṃ nāma syādityaniṣṭireveyam /
SA01vakobhau:2987: 081_24-25 atrārtheṣu kṛtāvadhiḥ śabdo nāma nāmnā ca racanāviśeṣo gātheti nāmasaṃnitābhavati racanāviśeṣāśca dravyāntaraṃ nopapadyate /
SA01vakobhau:2991: 081_27-28 santyeva tu viprayuktasaṃskārabhāvanā nāmakāyā dravyata iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:2993: 082_01-02 atha kiṃpratisaṃyuktā ete nāmakāyādayaḥ sattvākhyā asattvākhyā vipākajā aupacayikā naiḥṣyandikāḥ kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā iti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:2997: ārupyāptā api santi te tvanabhilāpyā ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:2999: yaśca dyotayati sa taiḥ samanvāgato na yo dyotyate /
SA01vakobhau:3001: 082_06-07 yathā caite nāmakāyādayaḥ sattvākhyā naiḥṣyandikā anivṛtāvyākṛtāśca /
SA01vakobhau:3017: 082_19-20 yaktūktaṃ "janyasya janikā jātirna hetupratyayairvinā" iti ka ime hetavaḥ keca pratyayāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3021: 082_23-24 kāraṇahetuḥ sahabhūhetuḥ sabhāgahetuḥ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ sarvatragahetuḥ vipākaheturiti /
SA01vakobhau:3024: 082_26 saṃskṛtasya hi dharmasya svabhāvavrjyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ kāraṇaheturutpādayati /
SA01vakobhau:3026_0: 082_27-02 nanu ca ye 'syājānata udapatsyantāsravā jānato 'sya te notpadyanta iti
SA01vakobhau:3026_1: jñānameṣāṃ vighnamuatpattau karoti sūryaprabhāvajjyotiṣāṃ darśanasyeti kathaṃ svabhāvavarjyāḥ
SA01vakobhau:3029: 083_03-04 tadyathā anupadrotāraṃ bhojakamadhikṛtya grāmīṇā bhavanti vaktāraḥ svāminā smaḥ sukhitā iti /
SA01vakobhau:3030: 083_04-06 yasya punarnāstyeva śaktirvighnayituṃ tasya kathaṃ hetubhāvastadyathā nirvāṇasyānutpattidharmakāṇāṃ ca sarvotpattau nārakādīnāṃ carūpyasattva skandhotpattau /
SA01vakobhau:3031: 083_06-07 asanto 'pi hyete tathaiva vidhnaṃ karttumasamarthaḥ syuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3032: 083_07-08 asamarthe 'pi hi bhojake tathā vaktāro bhavantīti sa evātra dṛṣṭāntaḥ sāmānyenaiva nirdeśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3033: 083_08-09 yastu pradhānaḥ kāraṇahetuḥ sa utpādane 'pi samartho yathā cakṣūrūpe cakṣurvijñānasya āhāraḥ śarīrasya vījādayo 'ṅkurādīnāmiti /
SA01vakobhau:3034: 083_10-11 yastvevaṃ codayati anāvaraṇabhāvena cetsarva dharmahetavo bhavanti kasmānā sarvasyotpādo yugapadbhavati prāṇātipātena ca ghātakavat sarve tadbhājo bhavantīti /
SA01vakobhau:3036: 083_12 yasmādanāvaraṇabhāvena sarvadharmāḥ hetuḥ pratijñāyante na kārakabhāveneti /
SA01vakobhau:3040: 083_14-16 tena hyālambanāt manovijñānamutpadyate kuśalākuśālaṃ yataḥ krameṇa paścāccakṣurvijñānamiti kāraṇaparaparayā tasyāpi pratyayībhāvādasti sāmarthyam /
SA01vakobhau:3045: 083_19 mithaḥ pāraṃparyeṇa ye dharmāḥ parasparaphalāste parasparaḥ sahabhūheturyathā /
SA01vakobhau:3051: 083_22-23 evaṃ ca kṛtvā sarvameva saṃskṛtaṃ sahabhūheturyathāyogam /
SA01vakobhau:3052: 083_23-24 vināpi cānyonyaphalatvena dharmo 'nulakṣaṇānāṃ sahabhūheturna tāni tasyetyupasaṃkhyātavyam //
SA01vakobhau:3054: 083_26 caittā dvau saṃvarau teṣāṃ cetaso lakṣaṇāni ca /
SA01vakobhau:3076: 084_11-13 satkāyadṛṣṭestatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ jātiṃ jarāṃ sthitimanityatāṃ ca sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerhetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3078: 084_13-15 ye tarhi "tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇā mi" tyetanna pathanti tairapyetat pathitavyam arthato vaivaṃ boddhavyamiti kāśmīrāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3083_0: 084_16-19 anuparivarttyanulakṣanāni caivaṃ cittasya tāni cānyonyaṃ sapratighaṃ copādāyarūpamanyonyamapratighaṃ
SA01vakobhau:3083_1: ca kiñcit sarvaṃ ca bhūtaiḥ prāptayaśca sahajāḥ prāptimataḥ sahabhuvo na sahabhūheturanekaphalavipāka niṣyandatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:3086: 084_20-21 kiṃ tu prasiddhahetuphalabhāvānāṃ bījādīnāmeṣa nyāyo na dṛṣṭa iti vaktavyametat kathaṃ sahotpannānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ hetuphalabhāva iti /
SA01vakobhau:3088: 084_22-24 saṃpradhāryaṃ tāvadetatkiṃ prabhāyāḥ pradīpo heturāhosvit pūrvotpannaiva sāmagrī saprabhasya pradīpasya sacchāyasyāṅdurasyotpattau heturiti /
SA01vakobhau:3091: 084_25-26 yasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ yasya bhāvābhāvau niyamataḥ sa heturitaro hetumāniti /
SA01vakobhau:3092: 084_26-01 sahabhuvām ca dharmāṇāmekasya bhāve sarveṣāṃ bhāva ekasyābhāve sarveṣāmabhāva iti yukto hetuphalabhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3094: 085_02-03 atha evāha evaṃ tarhyavinirbhāviṇo 'pyupādāyarūpasyānyonyameṣa prasaṅgaḥ bhūtaiśca sārdhaṃ cittānulakṣaṇādīnāṃ ce cittādibhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3097: 085_04-06 kimeṣāṃ sahotpannabalenāvasthānamāhosvit pūrvasāmagrīvaśāttathaivotpāda iti annyadapi ca tatra kiñcidbhavati sūtrakaṃ śaṅkuko vā pṛthivī vā dhārikā /
SA01vakobhau:3098: 085_06-07 eṣāmapi nāmānye 'pi sabhāgahetutvādayo bhavantīti siddhaḥ sahabhūhetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3101: 085_10-11 sadṛśā dharmāḥ sadṛśānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sabhāgahetustadyathā kuśalāḥ pañca skandhāḥ kuśalānāmanyoyyaṃ kliṣṭāḥ kliṣṭānāmavyākṛtā avyākṛtānāṃ rūpamavyākṛtaṃ pañcānām /
SA01vakobhau:3106: 085_14-15 bāhyeṣvapi yavo yavasya śāliḥ śāleriti vistareṇa yojyam /
SA01vakobhau:3107: 085_15-16 ye tu rūpaṃ rūpasya necchanti sabhāgahetuṃ teṣāmeṣa granthaḥ icchāvighātāyasaṃpravarttate "atītāni mahābhūtānyanāgatānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ heturadhipati" riti /
SA01vakobhau:3112: 085_19 svo nikāyo bhūścaiṣāṃ ta ime svanikāyabhuvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3118: 085_22-24 te 'pi kāmāvacarāḥ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikāḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ yāvat bhavāgrabhūmikāstadbhūmikānāmevaṇānyaṣām /
SA01vakobhau:3127: 085_27-02 pūrvotpannāni kuśalamūlānipaścādutpannānāṃ kuśalamūlānāṃ tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ svadhātau sabhāgahetunā hetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3130: 086_03-04 idapi śāstraṃ "yo dharmo yasya dharmasya hetuḥ kadācitsa dharmastasya na hetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3133: 086_05-06 yastu manyate anāgato 'pi sa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāṃ sabhāgahetutve niyatībhūto bhavatyatastāṃ caramāvasthāmabhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ "na kadācinna heturi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:3134: 086_06-08 tasyā yamaparihāro yasmātsa dharma utpadyamānāvasthāyāḥ pūrvaṃ sabhāgaheturabhūtvā paścāt bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:3135: 086_08-10 ihapi ca praśne yo dharmo yasya dharmasya samanantaraḥ kadācit sa dharmastasya dharmasya na samanantara iti śakyamanayā kalpanayā vaktuṃ syānna kadāciditi /
SA01vakobhau:3137: 086_10-11 yadi sa dharmo notpanno bhavatīti dvimukhasaṃdarśanārthaṃ yathā tatra tathehāpi karttavyam /
SA01vakobhau:3139: 086_11-12 evaṃ sati ko guṇo labhyata ityakauśala mevātra śāstrakārasyaiva saṃbhāvyeta /
SA01vakobhau:3141_1: sthāpayitvā yattadanyat kliṣṭaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ tatsatkāyadṛṣṭihetukaṃ na satkāyadṛṣṭerheturyattu
SA01vakobhau:3142: 086_15-16 anāgatasatkāyadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ sthāpayitvetyevametat karttavyamarthato 'pi caivaṃ boddhavyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:3143: 086_16-18 idaṃ tarhi prajñaptibhāṣyaṃ kathaṃ nīyate "sarvadharmāścatuṣke niyatā hetauphale āśraye ālamvane niyatā" iti /
SA01vakobhau:3147: 086_19-20 nanu caivaṃ sati sabhāga heturabhūtvā heturbhavatīti prāptam /
SA01vakobhau:3150: 086_21-22 kiṃ punaḥ syādyadi vipākahetuvadanāgato 'pi sabhāgahetuḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:3161: 086_26-27 vīpākaphalasya pūrvaṃ saha cāyogādanāgate cādhvati pūrvapaścimatā 'bhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:3168: 087_04 yaduktaṃ svabhūmikaḥ sabhāgaheturbhavatīti kimeṣa niyamaḥ sarvasya sāsravasyaiṣa niyamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3171: 087_06-07 anāgamye dhyānāntarikāyāṃ caturṣuraneṣu triṣu cārūpyeṣu mārgasatyamanyo 'nyaṃ sabhāgahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3173: 087_07-08 āgantuko hyasau tāsu bhūmiṣu na taddhātupatitastadbhami kābhistṛṣṇābhirasvīkṛtatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:3178: 087_11-12 tadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntistasyā evānāgatāyāḥ sabhāgahetuviśiṣṭasyaca yāvadanutpādajñānasya /
SA01vakobhau:3185: 087_16-17 kathaṃ punarūrdhvaṃbhūmikasyādhobhūmmikomārgaḥ samo vā bhavati viśiṣṭo vā /
SA01vakobhau:3189: 087_20 kiṃ punaḥ mārga eva samaviśiṣṭayoḥ sabhāgaheturbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:3196: 087_25-26 ete hi prāyogikāḥ śrutacintābhāvanāmayā guṇāḥ samaviśiṣṭayoreva heturnanyūnānām /
SA01vakobhau:3202: 087_29-01 teṣāmapi navaprakārabhedāt mṛdumṛdavaḥ sarveṣāṃ mṛdumadhyā aṣṭānāmityeṣānītiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3203: 088_01-02 upapattipratilambhikāstu kuśalā dharmāḥ sarve navaprakārāḥ paraspara sabhāgahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3207: 088_03-04 te yathākramaṃ catustrīdvekeṣāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ nirmāṇacittamapoi kāmāvacara caturdhyanaphalam /
SA01vakobhau:3210: 088_06-07 tadyathā śāliryavādīnāṃ mā bhūnniṣphalaḥ prayatna iti /
SA01vakobhau:3211: 088_07-08 ata eva cāhuḥ syādutpanno 'nāsravo 'nutpannasyāsravasya na hetuḥ syāttadyathā duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpanāmanutpannānāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntīnām/
SA01vakobhau:3212: 088_08-09 sarvaṃ ca viśiṣṭaṃ nyūnasya na hetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3214: 088_10-11 syādanāgatāḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntayo duḥkhe dharmajñānasyayasmānna pūrvataraṃ phalamastyanāgato vā sabhāgahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3215: 088_11-12 syāt pūrvotpanno 'nāsravo dharmaḥ paścādutpannasyānāsravasya na hetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3217: 088_12-14 tadyathottaraphalaparihīṇasyāvara phalasaṃmukhībhāve duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptiścottarottara kṣaṇa sahotpannānāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptīnāṃ nyūnatvāditi /
SA01vakobhau:3224: 088_17-18 evaṃ tarhi sati bhinnasantānajānāmapi prasaṅgo navacandrādīni paśyatām /
SA01vakobhau:3227: 088_20 samāna āśrayo yeṣāṃ te cittacaittāḥ anyonyaṃ saṃprayuktakahetuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3228: 088_20-22 samāna ityabhinnastatadyathā ya eva cakṣurindriyakṣaṇaścakṣurvijñānasyāśrayaḥ sa eva tatsaṃprayuktānāṃ vedanādīnāmeva yāvanmanaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3236: 088_26-27 ekenāpi hi vinā sarveṇa na saṃprayujyanta ityayameṣāṃ hetubhāvaḥ /

SA01vakobhau:3745: 101_20-21 āha tu "pratyayebhyo bhāvā upajāyante na punaḥ sarvasyaiva jagataḥ īśvarapuruṣapradhānādikaṃ kāraṇamiti /
SA01vakobhau:3748: 101_22 nanu ca atha evāsya vādasya vyudāsaḥ prāpnotyekaṃ kāraṇamīśvarādikaṃ sarvasyeti /
SA01vakobhau:3751: 101_25 yadi hyekameva kāraṇamīśvaraḥ syādanyadvā yugapatsarveṇa jagatā bhavitavyaṃsyāt /
SA01vakobhau:3753: 101_26-27 sa tarhi cchandavaśā dīśvarasya syādayamidānīmutpadyatāmayaṃ nirudhyatāmayaṃ paścāditi /
SA01vakobhau:3756: 102_01-02 kāraṇāntarabhedāpekṣaṇe vā neśvara eva kāraṇaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:3763: 102_06-08 yadi prītistāṃ tarhi nāntareṇopāye śaktaḥ kartumiti na tasyāmīśvaraḥ syāttathaiva cānyasmin /
SA01vakobhau:3764: 102_08-09 yadi ceśvaro narakādiṣu prajāṃ bahubhiścetibhirūpasṛṣṭāṃ sṛṣṭvā tena prīyate namo 'stu tasmai tādṛśāyeśvrāya /
SA01vakobhau:3768: 102_12-13 ekaṃ khalvapi jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ parigṛhṇatā 'nyeṣāmarthānāṃ pratyakṣaḥ puruṣakāro nihgṛhṇtaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:3769: 102_13 sahāpi ca kāraṇaiḥ kāraka mīśvaraṃ kalpayatā kevalo bhaktivādaḥ syat /
SA01vakobhau:3776: 102_17 svānyevaiṣāṃ karmāṇi tasyāṃ tasyāṃ jātau janayanti /
SA01vakobhau:3777: 102_17-18 akṛtabuddhayastu varākāḥ svaṃ svaṃ vipākaphalaṃ cānubhavanta īśvaramaparaṃ mithyā parikalpayanti /
SA01vakobhau:3778: 102_19 gatametadyattu khalu taduktaṃ "dvābhyāmanye tu jāyanta" iti /
SA01vakobhau:3801: 103_08 bhūtānāṃ tu tadbhūtikaṃ rūpaṃ vipākahetureva yasya kāyavākkarmaṇo bhūtāni vipākāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:3802: 103_09-10 abhedena cittacaittāḥ samanantarapratyaya uktā niyamastu noktaḥ kasya cittasyānantaraṃ kasyotpaktiriti /
SA01vakobhau:3820: 103_20-21 kāmadhātau yatkuśalaṃ cittaṃ tasmādanantaraṃ nava cittānyutpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:3830: 103_26 tatra punaḥ kāmāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ cittamaṣṭābhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:3836: 104_02-03 śaikṣāśaikṣe hitvā kāmadhātau hi pratisandhimukhataḥ sarvebhyo rūpārūpyacittebhyaḥ samanantaramakuśalaṃ cittamutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:3854: 104_17 rūpe dhātau yatkukśalaṃ cittaṃ tasmādanantaramekādaśa cittānyutpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:3857: 104_20 rūpāvacaraṃ tu kuśalaṃ cittaṃ navabhyaḥ samanantaramutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:3881: 105_12 ārūpyāvacaraṃ kukśalaṃ svebhyastribhyo rūpāvacarāt kukśalācchaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:3883: 105_14-15 ārūpyāvacarānnivṛtātsvabhūmikāni trīṇi rūpāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ nivṛtaṃ ca kāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭadvayam /
SA01vakobhau:3900: VAkK_2.71 prāyogikopapattyāptaṃ śubhaṃ bhittvā triṣu dvidhā //
SA01vakobhau:3901: 106_04 triṣu dhātuṣu kuśalaṃ cittaṃ dvidhā bhidyate /
SA01vakobhau:3924: 106_19-20 svebhyaḥ kuśalakliṣṭebhyaḥ rūpāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogika kliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:3928: 106_22-23 svebhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ pūrvavat rūpāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikakliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:3935: 106_26-27 svabhūmikāni ṣaḍanyatra prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāṃ rūpārupyāvacāre ca kliṣṭe /
SA01vakobhau:3936: 106_27-28 te punaḥ saptacittānantaraṃ svebhya eva pūrvavat /
SA01vakobhau:3946: 107_03-05 kāmāvacare kuśale abhijñāphalaṃ ca svāni ṣaṭ ārupyāvacaraṃ ca prāyogikaṃśaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:3948: 107_05-07 kāmāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāṃ svebhyaścaturbhyo 'nyatreryāpathikavipākajābhyāmārūpyāvacarābhyāṃ prāyogikakliṣṭābhyāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:3950: 107_07-08 kāmāvacare kliṣṭe svāni pañcānyatrābhijñāphalāt ārupyāvacaraṃ kliṣṭam/
SA01vakobhau:3955: 107_11-12 kāmāvacarebhya utpattipratilambhikairyāpathika vipākajebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ pañcabhyo 'nyatrābhijñāphalāt ārūpyāvacarebhyastribhyo 'nyatra prāyogikāt /
SA01vakobhau:3957: 107_13-14 kāmāvacare kliṣṭe svāni catvāryanyatra prāyogikābhijñāphalābhyāmārūpyāvacaraṃ ca kliṣṭam /
SA01vakobhau:3965: 107_17-18 rūpāvacaraṃ prāyogikaṃ svāni catvāri śaikṣamaśaikṣaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:3972: 107_21-22 svāni catvāri rūpāvacare prāyogikakliṣṭe kāmāvacāre kliṣṭe /
SA01vakobhau:3986: 108_01-02 kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prāyogikacittānantaraṃ vīpākajaiyāpathikaśailpasthānikānicittānyutpadyante na punrebhyaḥ prāyogikam /
SA01vakobhau:4004: 108_14-16 trividhamanaskārānantaramāryamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti tasmādapi trividhaṃ māskāram evaṃ sati yutamidaṃ bhavati "aśubhāsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅga bhāvayatī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:4007: 108_17 aśubhayā tu cittaṃ damayitvā sāmānyamanaskārānantaraṃ mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti /
SA01vakobhau:4010: 108_19-21 syāttāvadanāgamyāditribhūmisaṃniḥśrayeṇa niyāmāvakrāntau tanmārgānantaraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ sāmānyamanaskāraṃ saṃmukhīkuryād /
SA01vakobhau:4015: 108_23-24 nahi prāptaphalasya tatprayogasaṃmukhībhāvo yukta iti anyo 'pyasya tajjātīyaḥ sāmānyamanaskāro bhāvanāṃ gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:4016: 108_25-26 tadyathā "sarvasaṃkārā anityāḥ sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇa"miti tatsaṃmukhī kariṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:4018: 108_26-27 anāgamyaṃ niśrityārhattvaṃ prāpnuvataḥ tadbhūmikaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ vā vyutthānaṃ cittam /
SA01vakobhau:4031: 109_04 yāni dvādaśa cittāni uktānyeṣāṃ katamasmiṃścitte katīnāṃ lābhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4032: 109_05 kliṣṭe traidhātuke lābhaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dvayoḥ
SA01vakobhau:4033: 109_06 kāmāvacare kliṣṭe citte saṃmukhībhūte ṣaṇṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4035: 109_08-09 akuśalanivṛtāvyākṛtayoḥ rūpāvacarasya ca kliṣṭasya dhātupratyāgamanāt parihāṇitaśca /
SA01vakobhau:4044: 109_16-17 rūpāvacare kuśale trayāṇāṃ cittānāṃ lābhastasyaiva kuśalasya kāmarūpāvacarayoścānivṛtāvyākṛtayoḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4050: 109_22-23 yatra citte lābhho na vyākhyātastatra tasyaiva lābho draṣṭavyo nānyasya /
SA01vakobhau:4052: 109_24-25 "kliṣṭe citte navānāṃ hi lābhaḥ ityucyate budhaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4053: ṣaṇṇāṃ tu kuśale citte tasyaivā vyākṛṭe khalu //"
SA01vakobhau:4054: 109_26 tatra saptānāṃ kuśale citta iti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:4077: 111_07-09 ṣaṭ ca devanikāyāstadyathā cāturmahārājakāyikā strāyastriṃśā yāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavarttinaścetyeṣa kāmadhātuḥ saha bhājanalokena /
SA01vakobhau:4082: 111_11-12 saṃjīvaḥ kālasūtraḥ saṃghāto rauravo mahārauravastapanaḥ pratāpano 'vīciśceti /
SA01vakobhau:4085: 111_13-14 ṣaṭ cānantaroktā devanikāyāḥ tiryaścaḥ pretāśca viṃśatiḥ sthānāni /
SA01vakobhau:4086: 111_14-15 kāmadhātuḥ paranirmitavaśavartibhyo yāvadavīciḥ sabhājanagrahaṇena tu yāvadvāyumaṇḍalam /
SA01vakobhau:4097: 111_24-25 caturthamanabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavāḥ bṛhatphalā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhā ityetāni saptadaśa sthānāni rūpadhātuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4099: 111_26-27 brahmapurohiteṣveva kila sthānamutkṛṣṭataraṃ mahābrahmaṇaḥ parigaṇa ivābhinirvṛttamekanāyakaṃ natu bhūmyantaramiti /
SA01vakobhau:4102: 112_02-03 atītānāgatāvijñaptyarūpiṇo hi dharmā ādeśasthā iti niyamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4108: 112_07 yatraiva hi deśe tatsmāpattilābhinaścyavante tatraivopapadyante iti /
SA01vakobhau:4110: 112_09-10 yathā rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpaṃ niśritya pravarttate cittasaṃtatirevamārūpyeṣu kiṃ niśritya pravrttate /
SA01vakobhau:4111: VAkK_3.3 nikāyaṃ jīvitaṃ cātra niśritā cittasantatiḥ //
SA01vakobhau:4113: 112_13 rupiṇāmapi tarhi sattvānāṃ kimartha na tadeva dvayaṃ niśritya pravarttate cittasantatiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4118: 112_15 tata eva tarhi balavattvāt pravarttiṣyate kim punarniśrayeṇa /
SA01vakobhau:4120: 112_16-17 yathā rūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpaṃ niśritya pravarttate nikāyasabhāgo jīvitendriyaṃ ca evamarūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ kiṃ niśritya pravarttate /
SA01vakobhau:4122: 112_18 rūpiṇāmapi tarhi kimarthaṃ na tadeva dvayamanyonyam /
SA01vakobhau:4127: 112_20-21 tasmānnāstyarūpiṇāṃ sattvānāṃ cittasantateranyonyam niśraya iti sautrāntikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4128: 112_21-23 api tu yasyāścittasantaterākṣepaheturavītatṛṣṇo rūpe tasyāḥ saha rūpeṇa saṃbhavādrūpaṃ niśritya pravṛttiryasyāstu heturvītatṛṣṇo rūpe tasyā anapekṣya rūpaṃ pravṛttiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4132: 112_25-26 kāmapratisaṃyuktodhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ rūpapratisaṃyukto dhātū rūpadhāturmadhyapadalopādvajrabālakavat maricapānakavacca /
SA01vakobhau:4138: 112_28-01 kāmānāṃ dhātuḥ kāmadhātuḥ kāmān yo dadhāti /
SA01vakobhau:4142: 113_03-04 "na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgaḥ puruṣasya kāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4143: tiṣṭhanti citrāṇi tathaiva loke aṭhātra dhīrā vinayanti kāmam" //
SA01vakobhau:4147: 113_06-07 "na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgaṃ vadasīha kāmam /
SA01vakobhau:4150: 113_09-10 te cetkāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalparāgo yadi te na kāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4151: śāstā 'pi te bhavitā kāmabhogī dṛṣṭvaiva rūpāṇi manoramāṇi"//
SA01vakobhau:4152: 113_11-12 kiṃ punarye kecana dharmāḥ kāmarūpārupyadhātuṣu samudācaranti sarve te kāmarūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4180: 113_23-24 pratibuddhotpādaṃ cāsaṃkhyeyasattvaparinirvāṇe 'pi nāsti sattvānāṃ parikṣaya ākāśavat /
SA01vakobhau:4182: 113_25-27 tiryaksūtra uktaṃ tadyathā "īṣādhāre deve varṣati nāsti vīcirvā antarikā va antarīkṣādvāridhārāṇāṃ prapatantīnām /
SA01vakobhau:4183: 113_27-28 evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi nāsti vīcirvā antarikā vā lokadhātūnāṃ saṃvarttamānānāṃ vivarttamānāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:4184: 113_28-29 yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇāsyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāmi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:4192: 114_03-04 yaśca prathamadhyānasaṃniśrayāddhi utpādayati sa yatra lokadhātau jāta utpādayati tatratyameva brahmalokamupāgacchati nānyam /
SA01vakobhau:4199: 114_09 kiṃ punargatinirmuktāḥ santi dhātavo yata dhātuṣvityucyante /
SA01vakobhau:4207: 114_14-15 prajñyaptipūktam "catasṛbhiryonibhiḥ pañca gatayaḥ saṃgṛhītā natu pañcabhirgatibhiścatasro yonayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4214: 114_19-20 "sapta bhavā narakabhavastiryagbhavaḥ pretabhavo devabhavo manuṣyabhavaḥ karmabhavo 'ntarābhava" iti /
SA01vakobhau:4215: 114_20-21 atra hi pañca gatayaḥ sahetukāḥ sahāgamanāścoktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4220: 114_24-25 teṣāmāyuṣman kāyavāṅmanovaṅkānāṃ kāyavāṅmanodoṣakaṣāyāṇā narakeṣu rūpaṃ saṃjñā vedanā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ vipāko vipacyate /
SA01vakobhau:4221: 114_26-26 nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:4225: 115_01-02 pratisaṃdhicittāni hi gatīnāṃ pañcaprakārāṇi santyataḥ sapraveśagatigrahaṇādadoṣa eva /
SA01vakobhau:4241: 115_10 yadi hi gatiḥ syādantarābhava ityeva na syāt /
SA01vakobhau:4242: 115_10-11 yatarhi sthaviraśāriputreṇoktaṃ "nirvṛtte vipāke nāraka iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:4243: 115_11-12 nirvṛtte vīpāka ityuktaḥ natu vipāka eveti /
SA01vakobhau:4245: 115_13-14 gatigāminaḥ pudgaladravyasya pratiṣedhaṃ karoti nānyatra skandhebhya upalabhyate nāraka iti na tu skandhāntarapratiṣedham /
SA01vakobhau:4246: 115_14-15 avyākṛtā eva tu gatayo varṇyante vaibhāṣikaiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4253: 115_21-22 sūtre uktaḥ "rupiṇaḥ santi sattvā nānātvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathāmanuṣyāstadekatyāśca devāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4262: 115_25-27 rūpiṇaḥ santi nānātvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñinastadyathā devā brahmakāyikā ye tatprathamābhinirvṛttāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4264: 115_27-28 te hi prathamābhinirvṛttāḥ sarva ekaikasaṃjñino bhavanti anena vayaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā iti /
SA01vakobhau:4266: 115_29-31 anyathaiva tu mahābrahmaṇa ārohapariṇāha ākṛtivigraho vāgbhāṣā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ ca anyathā tatparṣada iti nānātvakāyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4267: 115_31-02 yadidamuktaṃ sūtre "teṣāmevaṃ bhavati imaṃ vayaṃ sattvamadrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ yāvadaho vatānye 'pi sattvā ihopapadyeranmama sabhāmatāyāmi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:4268: 116_02 asya ca sattvasyaivañcetasaḥ praṇidhirvayaṃ cehopapannā iti /
SA01vakobhau:4271_0: 116_03-05 tato hi te pracyutāḥ kathamidānīmalabdhāyāṃ dvitīyadhyānasamāpattau tadbhūmikaṃ
SA01vakobhau:4271_1: pūrvenivāsamasmārṣuḥ labdhāyāṃ vā kathaṃ mahābrahmālambanāṃ śīlavrataparāmarśadṛṣṭiṃ niviṣṭāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4274: 116_06-07 kathaṃ teṣāmevaṃ bhavati sma "imaṃ vayaṃ sattvamadrākṣma dīrghāyuṣaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:4275: 116_08-09 tasmāttatrasthā eva te tasya pūrvavṛttāntaṃ samanusmaranta eva dīrghamadhvānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ dṛṣṭavanto dṛṣṭvā ca paścādadrākṣmetyeṣāṃ babhūva /
SA01vakobhau:4276: 116_09-10 rupiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā nānātvasaṃjñinastadyathā devā ābhāsvarāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4279: 116_11-12 anyathā hi parīttābhā apramāṇābhāśca kasyāṃ vijñānasthitau vyavasthāpyeran /
SA01vakobhau:4282: 116_14-15 te kila maulyāṃ bhūmau saumanasyendriyaparikhinnāḥ sāmantakādupekṣendriyaṃ saṃmukhībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:4283: 116_15-16 sāmantake copekṣendriyaparikhinnāḥ punamaulyā bhumeḥ saumanasyendriyaṃ saṃmukhīkurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:4284: 116_16-17 yathā kāmaratiparikhinnā īśvarā dharmaratiṃ pratyanubhavanti dharmaratiparikhinnāḥ kāmaratimiti /
SA01vakobhau:4288: 116_18-19 śāntaṃ hi tatsukhamaśāntaṃ ca saumanasyaṃ cetasa utplāvakatvāditi sautrāntikā vyācakṣate /
SA01vakobhau:4290_0: 116_20-22 tatra ye sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāye 'ciropapannā bhavanti naiva saṃvarttanīkuśalā
SA01vakobhau:4290_1: na vivarttanīkuśalā asya lokasya te tāmarciṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītāḥ santa udvijante saṃvegamāpadyante /
SA01vakobhau:4292: 116_23-24 tatra ye sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāye ciropapannāḥ saṃvarttanīkuśalā vivarttanīkuśalāścāsya lokasya te tān sattvān bhītānāśvāsayanti /
SA01vakobhau:4293: 116_24-25 mā bhaiṣṭa māṛṣāḥ mā bhaiṣṭa mārṣāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4295: 116_26-27 ato 'rciṣa āgamavyapagamasaṃjñitvāt bhītā bhītasaṃjñitvācca te nānātvasaṃjñino na sukhāduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñitvāditi /
SA01vakobhau:4296: 116_27-28 rūpiṇaḥ santi sattvā ekatvakāyā ekatvasaṃjñinastadyathā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4300: 117_01-02 tatra prathame dhyāne kliṣṭayā saṃjñayā ekatvasaṃjñinaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4301: 117_02-03 dvitīye kuśalayā saṃjñayā nānātvasaṃjñinastṛtīye vipākajayā saṃjñayāekatvasaṃjñinaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4311: 117_07-08 atra hi vijñānaparibhedāḥ santyata eva na vijñānasthitiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4312: 117_08 kaḥ punaḥ paribhedaḥ yena vijñānaṃ paribhidyate
SA01vakobhau:4319: 117_12-13 caturthe dhyāne sattvā uccalitamānasāḥ pṛthagjanā āsaṃjñikaṃ praveṣṭukāmā āryāḥ śuddhāvāsān bhavāgrānapaṭupracāratvānna vijñānasthitiriti /
SA01vakobhau:4329: 117_19-20 anyatra sūtre sapta vijñānasthitaya uktāḥ anyatra
SA01vakobhau:4332: rūpopagā vijñāna sthitirvedanopagā saṃjñopagā saṃskāropagā iti /
SA01vakobhau:4341: 117_27-28 na ca visabhāgabhūmikeṣu skanheṣu vijñānaṃ tṛṣṇāvaśāt pratitiṣṭhatīti /
SA01vakobhau:4342: 117_28-29 kasmānna vijñānaṃ vijñānasthitirucyate yathā saptasu vijñānasthitiṣu pañca skandhā iti /
SA01vakobhau:4346: 118_01-02 yāṃśca dharmānabhiruhya vijñānaṃ vāhayati naunāvikanyāyena te dharmā vijñānasthitaya uktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4347: 118_03 natu vijñānaṃ vijñānamevāruhya vāhayatyato noktamiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4348: 118_03-04 yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ "vijñāne āhāre asti nandī asti rāga iti /
SA01vakobhau:4349: 118_04-05 yatrāsti nandī asti rāgaḥ pratiṣṭhitaṃ tatra vijñānamadhirūḍhami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:4352: 118_06-07 evaṃ tarhyabhedenopapattyāyatanasaṃgṛhīteṣu skandheṣu sābhirāmāyāṃ vijñānapravṛttau vijñānaṃ vijñānasthitiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4353: 118_07-08 pratyekaṃ tu yathā rūpādayo vijñānasya saṃkleśāya bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:4357: 118_11 api ca kṣetrabhāvena bhagavatā catasro vijñānasthitayo deśitāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4358: 118_11-13 vījabhāvena ca sopādānaṃ vijñānaṃ kṛtsnameveti na punarbījaṃ bījasya kṣetrabhāvena vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvetyabhiprāyaṃ parikalapayāmāsa /
SA01vakobhau:4359: 118_13-14 ye dharmāḥ sahavarttino vijñānasya te 'sya kṣetrabhāvena sādhīyāṃso bhavantīti ta evāsya sthitaya uktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4360: 118_15-16 atha kathaṃ saptabhirvijñānasthitibhiścatasro vijñānasthitayaḥ saṃgṛhītāścātasṛbhirvā sapta /
SA01vakobhau:4361: 118_16 naiva hi saptabhiścatasro nāpi catasṛbhiḥ sapta /
SA01vakobhau:4366: 118_19-20 dvitīyā apāyeṣu caturthe dhyāne bhavāgre ca vijñānavarjyāḥ skandhāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4383: 119_01 ye sattvā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetāḥ sakṛdupajāyante /
SA01vakobhau:4384: 119_01-02 ata eva upapadane (read: upapādane) sādhukāritvādupapādukā ityucyante /
SA01vakobhau:4386: 119_03 atha kasyāṃ gatau kati yonayaḥ saṃvidyanta ityāha
SA01vakobhau:4389: 119_05-07 aṇḍajāstāvadyathā kroñcīniryātau śailopaśailau sthavirau mṛgāramātuśca dvātriṃśat putrāḥ pañcālarājasya ca pañca putraśatāni /
SA01vakobhau:4402: 119_15 "pañca putrānahaṃ rātrau divā paña tathā parān /
SA01vakobhau:4403: 119_16 bhakṣayāmi janitvā tān nāsti tṛptistathāpi me //"
SA01vakobhau:4406: 119_17-18 atha kimarthaṃ caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ prāptopapattivaśitve 'pi jarāyurjāṃ yorni bhajate /

SA01vakobhau:4409_0: 119_21-23 itarathā hyaprajñāyamānakulagotraḥ ko 'pyayaṃ māyāpuruṣa ityevaṃ parikalpayeyurdevaḥ
SA01vakobhau:4409_1: piśāca iti vā yathā 'nyatīrthyā apabhāṣante kalpaśatasyātyayādevaṃvidho māyāvī loke
SA01vakobhau:4411_0: 119_24-26 śarīradhātūnāmavasthāpanārthaṃ yeṣumanuṣyā anye ca prajāṃ vijñāya sahasraśaḥ
SA01vakobhau:4411_1: svargaṃ ca prāptā apavargaṃ ceti upapādukānāṃ hi sattvānāṃ bāhyabījābhāvān mṛtānāṃ
SA01vakobhau:4412: 119_26-27 ādhiṣṭhānikīmṛddhiṃ bhagavata icchatāṃ na yukta ekṣa parihāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4414: 119_27-02 yadyapyupapādukānāṃ kāyanidhanaṃ na prajñayate kathamuktaṃ sūtre "upapādukaḥ suparṇī upapādukaṃ nāgamuddharati bhakṣārthami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:4416: 120_02-03 bhakṣayati vā yāvanna mṛto bhavati na pounrmṛtasyāsya tṛṣyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:4419: 120_04-05 sā hi dvigatī tisṛṇāṃ ca pradeśaḥ sarve cāntarābhāvikā iti /
SA01vakobhau:4422: 120_08-09 maraṇabhavasyopapattibhavasya cāntarā ya ātmabhāvo 'bhinirvarttate deśāntaropapattisamprāptaye so 'ntarābhava ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:4437: 120_18-19 santānavarttināṃ hi dharmāṇāmavicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāvo dṛṣṭastadyathā vrīhisantānasya /
SA01vakobhau:4439: 120_20-21 vicchinno 'pi dṛṣṭaḥ prādurbhāvastadyathā ādarśādiṣu bimbāt pratibimbasya /
SA01vakobhau:4446: 120_26 tatraiva hi deśe ādarśarūpaṃ dṛśyate pratibimbaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:4447: 120_26-27 na caikatra deśe rūpadvayasyāsti sahabhāva āśrayabhūtabhedāt /
SA01vakobhau:4448_1: 'nyaṃ pratibimbakamupalabhyate natvekatra rūpe dvayoḥ paśyatoḥ sahadarśanaṃ na bhavatīti
SA01vakobhau:4450: 121_01-02 upalabhyate ca chāyāstha ādarśe sūryasya prativimbakamiti na yukto 'sya tatra prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4453: 121_03-04 anyatraiva hi deśe ādarśatalaṃ bhavatyanyatraivāntargataṃ candrapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate kūpa ivodakam /
SA01vakobhau:4456: 121_05-06 sāmagryāstu sa tasyāstādṛśaḥ prabhāvo yattathā darśanaṃ bhavati //
SA01vakobhau:4457: 121_06 acintyo hi dharmāṇāṃ hi dharmāṇāṃ śaktibhedaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4463: 121_10-11 santānaṃ ca pratyavicchedena deśāntareṣu prādurbhāva udāhṛato nāsantānamityasāmyaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya pratibimbasya ca /
SA01vakobhau:4466: 121_13-14 bimbāccādarśā cceti yat prādhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadāśrityotpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:4467: 121_14-16 nacaivamupapattibhavasyāpi dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ saṃbhavo maraṇabhavāccānyataśca pradhānabhūtādityato 'pyayamasamāno dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4468: 121_16 na ca yuktamuktaṃ bāhyameva cetanaṃ śukraśoṇitaṃ pradhānakāraṇamiti /
SA01vakobhau:4469: 121_16-17 yatra cāndhakāṇa eva prādurbhāva upapādukānāṃ tatra kiṃ parikalpyate /
SA01vakobhau:4475: 121_20-21 narakabhavastiryagbhavaḥ pretabhavo devabhavo manuṣyabhavaḥ karmabhavo 'ntarābhava iti /
SA01vakobhau:4480: 121_23-24 mātā kalyā spi bhavati ṛtumatī ca /
SA01vakobhau:4489: 121_28 kṣatriyo vā 'sau brāhmaṇo vā vaiśyo vā śūdro vā /
SA01vakobhau:4490: 121_28-01 yadi vā pūrvasyā diśa āgato yadi vā dakṣiṇasyā paścimāyā uttrasyā" iti /
SA01vakobhau:4499: 122_07 upapadyādayo 'pi hi nāma devā evaṃ sati prasajyate /
SA01vakobhau:4506: 122_11-12 tadyathā parīttaḥ sakalikāgnirabhinivarttamāna eva parinirvāyādevaṃ prathamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4509: 122_13-14 nacaivamantarā nāma devāstriprakārāḥ kāladeśaprakarṣabhinnāḥ santīti kalpanaiveyaṃ kevalā //
SA01vakobhau:4511: 122_15-16 āyupramāṇāntare vā devasamīpāntare vā yaḥ kleśān prajahāti so 'ntarāparinirvāyī /
SA01vakobhau:4512: 122_16-17 sa punardhātugato vā parinirvāti saṃjñāgato vā vitarkagato vā /
SA01vakobhau:4514: 122_17-18 prathamo vā rūpadhātau nikāyasabhāgaparigrahaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāti /
SA01vakobhau:4517_1: bhūyasā vā āyurūpahatya nopapannamātra eveti ta ete sarve 'pi śakalikādidṛṣṭāntairna saṃvadhyante /
SA01vakobhau:4522: saṃjñayā ṣaṭṭikāṃ kṛtvā vargo bhavati samuditaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:4526: 122_26-01 kimidānīṃ kurmo yacchāstā ca parinirvṛtaḥ śāsanaṃ cedamanāyakaṃ bahudhā bhinnaṃ bhidyate cādyāpi yathecchaṃ granthataścārthataśca /
SA01vakobhau:4527: 123_01-02 yeṣāṃ tu tāvadayamāgamaḥ pramāṇaṃ teṣāmāgamato 'pi siddho 'ntarābhavaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4528: 123_02-03 yattarhi sūtra uttam "atha ca punardūṣī māraḥ svaśarīreṇāvicau mahānarake prapatita" iti /
SA01vakobhau:4532: 123_05-06 atyudīrṇaparipūrṇāni hi karmāṇi kāyasya nikṣepaṃ na pratīkṣante /
SA01vakobhau:4533: 123_06 ato 'sya dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyaṃ karma pūrvaṃ vīpakvaṃ paścādupapadyavedanīyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:4534: 123_07-08 idamidānīṃ kathaṃ nīyate "pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi yāni kṛtvopacitya samanantaraṃ narakeṣūpapadyata" iti /
SA01vakobhau:4540: 123_10 na kālāntaraṃ jīvitvā ko vā 'ntarābhavasyopapadyamānatvaṃ necchati /
SA01vakobhau:4546: vāso 'pi hi nāsti te 'ntarā pātheyaṃ ca na vidyate tave" ti //
SA01vakobhau:4556: 123_22-23 ato yāṃ gatiṃ gantā bhavati tasyāṃ gatau ya āgamiṣyatpūrvakālabhavastasyaivāsyākṛtirbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:4557: 123_23-25 evaṃ tarhi śunīprabṛtīnāmekasmin kukṣau pāñcagatiko 'ntarābhavo 'bhinirvarttate iti nārako 'ntarābhavaḥ kukṣiṃ nirdahet /
SA01vakobhau:4558: 123_25-26 pūrvakālabhave 'pi tāvannārakā na nityaṃ prajvalitā bhavantyutsadeṣu bhramantaḥ kiṃ punarantarābhavikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4560: 123_26-27 sa tu yathā na draṣṭuṃ śasyate tathā na spraṣṭumapyacchatvādātmabhāvasyetyacodyametat /
SA01vakobhau:4562: 123_28-01 pramāṇaṃ tu yathā pañcaṣaḍvarṣasya dārakasya sa tu ṣaṭindriyo bhavati bodhisattvasya punaryathā saṃpūrṇayūnaḥ salakṣaṇānuvyañjanaśca /
SA01vakobhau:4563: 124_01-02 ata evāntarābhavasthena mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśatā koṭīśataścāturdvīpikānāmavabhāsitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4564: 124_03 yattarhi mātā bodhisatvasya svapne gajapotaṃ pāṇḍaraṃ kukṣiṃ praviśantamadrākṣīt /
SA01vakobhau:4568: aśucikapiḥ paṭakalahāviti daśa dṛṣṭā nṛpeṇa kṛkiṇā svapnāḥ" //
SA01vakobhau:4569: 124_07 naiva cāntarābhavikaḥ kukṣiṃ bhittvā praviśatyapi tu māturyonidvāreṇa /
SA01vakobhau:4570: 124_07-08 ata eva yamalayoryaḥ paścāt prajāyate sa jyāyānucyate yaḥ pūrvaṃ sa kanīyāniti /
SA01vakobhau:4577: 124_11-12 kavīnāṃ ca kāvyaṃ samāyojayatāṃ kecit bhāvāḥ samāropitā gacchanti /
SA01vakobhau:4579: 124_12-13 yathā 'sya mātā svapne taṃ praviśantamadrākṣittathā so 'pi gāthāmakārṣīditi /
SA01vakobhau:4582: 124_14-15 bodhisattvasya savastraḥ śuklāyāśca bhikṣuṇyāḥ praṇidhānavaśādhyāvantameva pariveṣṭitā nirdagdhā /
SA01vakobhau:4591: 124_20-21 tasmāt pareṇa maraṇakṣaṇaṃ paryudasyānyaḥ sarvo bhavaḥ pūrvakālabhavaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4592: 124_21 caramakṣaṇo maraṇabhabo yata ūrdhvamantarābhavo bhavati rūpiṣu cetsattveṣūpapadyate /
SA01vakobhau:4596: 124_24-01 yeṣāṃ ca divyaṃ cakṣuḥ suviśuddhamabhijñāmayaṃ ta enaṃ paśyanti /
SA01vakobhau:4615: 125_11-12 tathā hi pradīptāyaḥpiṇdabhede tanmadhyasaṃbhūtaḥ krimirūpalabdhaḥ śrūyate /
SA01vakobhau:4616: 125_12 yasyāṃ ca gatau sa utpatsyamānastasyāḥ sarvathā /
SA01vakobhau:4631: 125_21 yāvadupapattisāmagrīṃ na labhate nahi tasyāyuṣaḥ pṛthagevākṣepaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4634: 125_22-01 yadyāsumeroḥ sthalaṃ māṃsasya syāttatsarva varṣāsu krimīṇāṃ pūryeta /
SA01vakobhau:4635: 126_01-02 kimidānīṃ tatpratīkṣā eva teṣāmantarābhavā āsan kuto yā tadā tebhyo gatā iti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:4639: 126_03-05 te taṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā gandharasābhigṛddhāḥ kālaṃ kurvantaḥ krimibhāvasaṃvarttanīyaṃ karma pravodhya tayā tṛṣṇayā krimiṣūpapadyanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:4640: 126_05-07 athavā nūnaṃ tatpratyayapracūra eva kāle tatsaṃvarttanīyāni karmāṇi vīpākābhinirvṛttau vṛttiṃ labhnte nānyatra /
SA01vakobhau:4641: 126_07-08 tathāhi cakravarttisaṃvarttanīyāni karmaṇi aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ vahutarāyuṣi vā cakravarttino jāyante nānyasyām /
SA01vakobhau:4642: 126_08-09 ata eva coktaṃ bhagavatā "acintyaḥ sattvānāṃ karmavipāka" iti /
SA01vakobhau:4644: 126_09-10 yadi tāvatā sāmagrīṃ na labhate tatraiva punaścyutyā jāyante /
SA01vakobhau:4647: 126_11-12 sa hi saṃbhavaiṣitvātsamdhāvagatvā samdhiṃ badhnātīti yathātvasamagrāḥ pratyayā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:4648: 126_12 niyataṃ cānena tasmin deśe tasyāṃ jātau janitavyaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:4650: 126_13-14 athāniyātaṃ tato 'nyatra deśe tasyāṃ jātau jāyate sadṛśyā mityapare /
SA01vakobhau:4651: 126_14-15 tadyathā gavāmūṣmasu maithunasya prācuryaṃ śaradi śunāṃ ṛkṣānāṃ hemante cākṣvānām /
SA01vakobhau:4652_0: 126_15-17 gavayaśṛgālakharatarakṣāṇāṃ punaḥ kālo nāstīti yenānyatra kāle goṣūpapattavyaṃ
SA01vakobhau:4652_1: sa gavayeṣūpapadyate yena śvas sa śṛgāleṣu yenāśvesu sa gardabheṣu yena ṛkṣeṣu sa
SA01vakobhau:4653: 126_17-18 na tvasya nikāyasabhāgāntarābhavo nānyatra nikāyasabhāge śakyamutpattumekakāmākṣepāditi vaktavyametat /
SA01vakobhau:4656: 126_21 sa hi karmaprabhāvasaṃbhūtena cakṣuṣā sudūrastho 'pi svamupapattideśaṃ prekṣate /
SA01vakobhau:4657: 126_21-22 tatrāsya mātāpitrostāṃ vipratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā puṃsaḥ sataḥ pauṃsno rāga utpadyate mātari stryā satyā straiṇo rāgāḥ udpadyate pitari /
SA01vakobhau:4659: 126_23-24 evaṃ paṭhacyate prajñaptau "gandharvasya tasmin samaye dvayościttayoranyatarānyataraccittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaṃ bhavatyanunayasahagataṃ vā pratighasahagataṃ veti /
SA01vakobhau:4660: 126_24-25 sa tābhyāṃ viparyasto rantukāmatayā tam deśamāśliṣya tāmavasthāmātmanyadhimucyate /
SA01vakobhau:4663: 126_27-28 sa cetpumān bhavati māturdakṣiṇakukṣimāśritya pṛṣṭhābhimukha utkeṭukaḥ saṃbhavatyatha strī tato vāmakukṣimāśrityodarābhimukhī /
SA01vakobhau:4664: 127_01 athedānīṃ napuṃsakaṃ tadyena rāgeṇāśliṣṭaṃ tathā tiṣṭhati /
SA01vakobhau:4666: 127_02-03 athaḥ strībhūtaḥ puruṣabhūto vā 'nupraviśya yathāsthānaṃ tiṣṭhati paścāt garbha āpyāyamāno napuṃsakaṃ bhavatīti" /
SA01vakobhau:4671: 127_05-06 anindriyaṃ hi śukraśoṇitamantarābhavena sārdhaṃ nirudhyate sendriyaṃ prādurbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:4673: 127_07-08 evaṃ ca kṛtvedaṃ sūtrapadaṃ sūtre sūnītaṃ bhavati "mātāpitraśucikalalasaṃbhutasye"ti /
SA01vakobhau:4674: 127_08-09 tathā "dīrgharātraṃ yuṣmābhirbhikṣivaḥ katasiḥ saṃvarddhitā rudhiravindurūpātta" iti /
SA01vakobhau:4678: 127_10-11 evaṃ tāvadaṇḍajāṃ jarāyujāṃ ca yorni pratipadyate /
SA01vakobhau:4682: 127_14-15 saṃsvedajāṃ yoniṃ pratipadyamāna upapattisthānaṃ gatvābhilāṣāt gacchatyamedhyaṃ medhyaṃ vā yathākramam /
SA01vakobhau:4686: 127_16-17 sa hi śītavātavarṣābhiṣekairātmānaṃ bādhyamānaṃ paśyati narakeṣu cāgniṃ dīpyamānam /
SA01vakobhau:4688: 127_18-19 punastaptavātātapāgnisaṃtāpairātmānaṃ bādhyamānamanupaśyan śaityaṃ ca narakeṣu śītābhilāṣāddhāvati /
SA01vakobhau:4689: 127_19-20 yad avasthas tad upapattisaṃvarttanīyaṃ karmākārṣīt tadavasthātmānaṃ tāśca sattvān paśyan dhāvatīti pūrvācāryāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:4690: 127_20-21 tatra punardevāntarābhava ūrdhvaṃ gacchatyā sanādivottiṣṭhan manuṣyatiryakpretānāṃ manuṣyādivat /
SA01vakobhau:4710: 128_09-10 kaścit punaḥ sarvāṇyevāsaṃprajānan karoti praviśatyasaṃprajānan tiṣṭhati niṣkrāmatyapi /
SA01vakobhau:4714: 128_13 aṇḍajaḥ sattvo nityaṃ mūḍha eva sarvāṇi karoti /
SA01vakobhau:4718: 128_15 tadyathā "saṃkṛtamabhisaṃskarotī"ti sūtre odanaṃ pacatīti saktum pinaṣṭīti loke /
SA01vakobhau:4720: 128_17 kathaṃ punarasaṃprajānan mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśati yāvanniṣkrāmati kathaṃ vā saṃprajānan /
SA01vakobhau:4721: 128_18-19 alpeśākhyasya tāvatsattvasya mātuḥ kukṣiṃ praviśataḥ evaṃ vīparītau saṃjñādhimokṣau pravarttete /
SA01vakobhau:4723: 128_19-21 śītaṃ durdinaṃ mahato vā janakāyasya kolāhalaṃ hnta tṛṇagahanaṃ vā praviśāmi vanagahanaṃ vā tṛṇakuṭīṃ vā parṇakuṭīṃ vā vṛkṣamūlaṃ vā sarpāmi kuṇḍayamūlaṃ veti /

SA01vakobhau:5090: 139_08-09 asyāṃ tu kalpanāyāṃ pūrvapadasya grahaṇamanarthakaṃ prāpnoti /
