SA01vakobhau:5093: 139_11-12 atastām kalpanāṃ paryudāsayitumidaṃ nirdhārayāṃvabhūva yasyaivotpādādyadutpadyate tasminneva sati tat bhavati nānyasmin /
SA01vakobhau:5094: 139_12-13 yadutā "vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati"ti /
SA01vakobhau:5101: 139_17-18 utpāde tvadhikṛte kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ sthitivacanasya bhinnakramaṃ ca bhagavān kimarthamācakṣita prāk sthitiṃ paścādutpoādam /
SA01vakobhau:5102: 139_18-19 punarāha "asmin satīdaṃ bhavatī"ti "kārye sati kāraṇasya vināśo bhavatī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:5103: 139_19-20 syānmata mahetukaṃ tarhi kāryamutpadyata ityata āha nāhetukam /
SA01vakobhau:5106: 139_21-22 pūrvaṃ ca tāvat kāryasyotpādāne vācakṣata paścādasmin satīdaṃ na bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:5108: 139_23-24 itarathā tu pratītyasamutpādaḥ katama ityāderarthe kaḥ prakramo vināśavacanasya /
SA01vakobhau:5110: 139_24-25 kathaṃ puna "rvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvat jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇāmi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:5112_1: ātmanaḥ sukhārthamaduḥkhārthaṃ vā kāyādibhistrividhaṃ karmārabhate āyati sukhārthaṃ
SA01vakobhau:5115: 140_03-04 evaṃ ca kṛtvā tadupapannaṃ bhavati vijñānāṅganirdeśe "vijñānaṃ katamat /
SA01vakobhau:5117: 140_05-06 vijñānapūrvakaṃ punastasyāṃ tasyāṃ gatau nāmarūpaṃ jāyate pañcaskandhakaṃ kṛtsnajanmānugatam /
SA01vakobhau:5132: yathā ca nirgranthādīnāṃ nagno ghavatyacelaka iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5141: 140_17-18 yathokta "mātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito natvatrātmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā" iti /
SA01vakobhau:5150: 140_22-23 jātau satyāṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ yathā niriṣṭaṃ sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:5155: sa eva tu vaibhāṣikanyāyo yaḥ pūrvamuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5164: 141_02-03 yathā mitraviparyayeṇa tadvipakṣabhūtaḥ kaścidamitro bhavati na tu yaḥ kaścidanyo mitrānnāpi mitrābhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5181: sā ca dṛṣṭisvabhāvā iti nāvidyā yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:5182: 141_11-12 yā tarhi na dṛṣṭiḥ sā bhaviṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:5186: 141_14 avidyā cet prajñā 'bhaviṣyanna dṛṣṭistayā yujyate saṃprāyokṣyata /
SA01vakobhau:5190: 141_17 "rāgopakliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ nāvamucyate avidyopakliṣṭā prajñā na viśudhyatī"tyuktam sūtre /
SA01vakobhau:5191: 141_18 na ca saiva prajñā tasyāḥ prajñāyā upakleśo yukta iti /
SA01vakobhau:5192: 141_18-19 yathā cittasyānyo bhinnajātīya upakleśo rāga evaṃ prajñāyā avidyā /
SA01vakobhau:5194: 141_20 kliṣṭayā prajñayā kuśalā prajñā vyavkīryamāṇā na viśudhyati /
SA01vakobhau:5198: 141_22 uapahataṃ tu tattathā rāgeṇa bhavati yanna vimucyate /
SA01vakobhau:5203: 141_25 yo 'pi manyate "sarvakleśā avidye"ti tasyāpyata eva vyudāsaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5204: 141_25-01 sarvakleśasvabhāvā 'pi satī saṃyojanādiṣu pṛthagnocyeta dṛṣṭyā ca na saṃprayujyeta /
SA01vakobhau:5205: 142_01-02 anyena vā kleśena dṛṣṭyādīnāṃ paraṃparāsaṃprayogāt cittamapi cāvidyopakleṣṭamevoktaṃ bhavet /
SA01vakobhau:5211: 142_05-06 yadi yanna saṃprakhyānaṃ saṃprakhyānābhāve 'pi tathaiva doṣo yathā avidyāyām /
SA01vakobhau:5213: 142_07 tadidaṃ tathaiva na jñāyate kiṃ taditi /
SA01vakobhau:5219_0: 142_10-12 yā 'sau sūtra uktā "so 'hamevaṃ jñātvā evaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvāsāṃ tṛṣṇānāṃ sarvāsāṃ
SA01vakobhau:5222: 142_13 yata eṣā nānyaḥ kleśaḥ śakyate vaktum /
SA01vakobhau:5232: 142_18 yadidaṃ loke pratītaṃ teṣāṃ teṣāmarthānāṃ pratyāyakaṃ gauraśvo rūpaṃ rasa ityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:5234: teṣu teṣv artheṣu tasya nāmno namanāt /
SA01vakobhau:5235: 142_19-20 iha nikṣipte kāya upapattyantare namanānnāmarupiṇaḥ skandhā ityapare //
SA01vakobhau:5248: 143_05-06 sarve ca te trayo 'pi sparśotpattau praguṇā bhavantīti /
SA01vakobhau:5250: 143_06-08 keciddhi sakṛnnipātameva sparśa vyācakṣate sūtraṃ cātra jñāpakamānayanti "iti ya eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃgatiḥ saṃnipātaḥ samavāyaḥ sa sparśaḥ" iti /
SA01vakobhau:5251: 143_08-09 kecitpunaścittasaṃprayuktaṃ dharmāntarameva sparśa vyācakṣate sūtraṃ cātra jñāpakamānayanti "ṣaṭṣaṭko dharmaparyāyaḥ katamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5259: 143_12-13 tatra ye saṃnipātameva sparśamāhusta evaṃ kparihāramāhuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5263: 143_15-16 na caivaṃ sparśabhūtāttrayādanyattrayamasti yasya śeṣasyātra grahaṇaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:5264: 143_16-17 yadyapi hīndriyārthau syātāmavijñānakau na tu punrvijñānamanindriyārthakam /
SA01vakobhau:5265: 143_17 tasmāttriṣu nirdiṣṭeṣu punaḥ sparśasya grahaṇamanarthakaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:5266: 143_18-19 na khalu sarve cakṣurūpe sarvasya cakṣurvijñānasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi sarvaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ sarvayoścakṣurūpayoḥ kāryam /
SA01vakobhau:5267: 143_19-20 ato yeṣāṃ kāryakāraṇābhāvaste sparśabhāve vyavasthāpitā ityeke /
SA01vakobhau:5268: 143_20-21 ye punaḥ saṃnipātādanyaṃ sparśamāhusta etatsūtra kathaṃ pariharanti "iti ya eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃgatiḥ saṃnipātaḥ samavāyaḥ sa sparśa" iti /
SA01vakobhau:5271: 143_22-23 saṃgateḥ saṃnipātāt samavāyāditi paṭhanti kāraṇe va kāryopacāro 'yamiti bruvanti /
SA01vakobhau:5281: 144_02-04 yathoktaṃ "cakṣurvijñānena nīlaṃ vijānāti no tu nīlaṃ manovijñānena nīlaṃ vijānāti nīlamiti ca vijānātī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:5286: 144_06-07 tena saṃprayuktaḥ sparśo 'dhivacanasaṃsparśa ityeka āśrayaprabhāvito dvitīyaḥ saṃprayogaprabhāvitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5293: 144_12-13 anāsravaḥ sparśo vidyāsaṃsparśaḥ kliṣṭo 'vidyāsaṃsparśo vidyā 'vidyābhyāṃ saṃprayuktatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:5304: 144_20 athavā vedyate tadvedayituṃ vā śakyamiti vedanīyam /
SA01vakobhau:5307: 144_20-21 sukhaṃ vedanīyamasminniti sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśo yatra sukhaṃ veditamasti
SA01vakobhau:5312: tatra yaḥ pūrvaṃ ṣaḍvidhaḥ sparśa uktaḥ
SA01vakobhau:5321: 145_03-04 atha kiṃ sparśāduttarakālaṃ vedanā bhavatyāhosvit samānakālam /
SA01vakobhau:5328: 145_07-08 yadeva hīdaṃ sahotpannayorjanyajanakabhāvo nāstīti tadevedaṃ jāte dharme dharmasya nāstīti /
SA01vakobhau:5333: 145_10-11 "cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa pratītya utpadyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā na tu cakṣuḥpaṃsparśajāṃ vedanāṃ pratītyotpadyate cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa" iti vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:5335: 145_12-13 yo hi dharmo yasya dharmasya janakaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa tasmāt bhinnakālaḥ prasiddhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5336: 145_13-14 tadyathā pūrvaṃ vījaṃ paścādaṅkuraḥ pūrvaṃ kṣīraṃ paścāddadhi pūrvamabhighātaḥ paścācchandaḥ pūrvaṃ manaḥ paścāt manovijñānamityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:5337: 145_14-15 anyathā paraṃparāpekṣatvāt kāryakāraṇayoḥ sarvaṃ vā yugapadutpadyate na vā kadācit paścādviśeṣābhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:5340: 145_16-18 tadyathā cakṣurvajñānādīnāṃ cakṣurūpādibhirbhūtabhautikānāṃ ca tatrāpi pūrvamindriyārthau paścādvijñānam /
SA01vakobhau:5341: 145_18-19 pūrvakācca bhūtabhautikasamudāyāduttara utpadyata itīṣyamāṇe kaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:5342: 145_19 yathā tarhi cchāyāṅkurayorevaṃ sparśavedanayo riti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5345: 145_20-21 so 'sau trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayātpaścādvedanā tṛtīyakṣaṇa iti /
SA01vakobhau:5346: 145_21-22 evaṃ tarhi na sarvantravajñāne vedanā prāpnoti na ca sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ sparśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5348: 145_22-23 pūrvasparśahetukā hyuttaratra sparśe vedanā sarve ca sparśāḥ sarvavedanakāḥ sarvaṃ ca vijñānaṃ sparśa iti /
SA01vakobhau:5352: 145_25-26 kathaṃ nāmānyajātīyālambanasparśasaṃbhūtā vedanā 'nyālambanā bhaviṣyati yena vā cittena saṃprayuktā tato bhinnālambaneti /
SA01vakobhau:5354: 146_01-02 tasmācca yat pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ savedanakaṃ tanna sparśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5362: 146_05-06 na vā eṣa mahābhūmikārthaḥ sarvatra citte daśa mahābhūmikāḥ saṃbhavantīti /
SA01vakobhau:5365: 146_06-07 savitarkā savicārā bhumiḥ avitarkā vicāramātrā avitarkā vicārā bhūmiḥ
SA01vakobhau:5369: 146_08-09 tadya etasyāṃ sarvasyāṃ bhūmau bhavanti te mahābhūmikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5375: 146_12-14 yadi tarhi sparśāduttarakālalṃ vedanā sūtraṃ parihāryaṃ "cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ sahajātā vedanā saṃjñā cetane"ti /
SA01vakobhau:5376: 146_14-15 sahajātā ityucyate na sparśasahajātā iti kimatra parihāryam /
SA01vakobhau:5377: 146_15-16 samanantare 'pi cāyaṃ sahaśabdo dṛṣṭastadyathā "maitrīsahagataṃ smṛtisaṃvodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayatī" tyajñāpakametat /
SA01vakobhau:5378: 146_16-18 yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ "yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā yā ca cetanā yacca vijñānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā ime dharmā nāsaṃsṛṣṭā" ityato nāsti vedanābhirasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ vijñānam /
SA01vakobhau:5380: 146_18-20 tatra hi sūtra evamuktaṃ "yadvedayate taccetayate yaccetayate tastsaṃprajānīte yatsaṃprajānīte tadvijānātī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:5381: 146_20-21 tanna vijñāyate kim tāvadayameṣāmālambananiyama ukta utāho kṣaṇaniyama iti /
SA01vakobhau:5383: 146_22 yaccāpi sūtra uktaṃ "trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ" iti /
SA01vakobhau:5384: 146_22-23 tat kathaṃ vijñānaṃ cāsti na ca trayāṇāṃ saṃnipāto na ca sparśa iti /
SA01vakobhau:5385: 146_23-24 tasmādavaśyaṃ sarvatra vijñāne sparśaḥ sparśasahajā ca vedanaiṣṭavyā /
SA01vakobhau:5390: 146_27 saiva caitasikī vedanā punarāṣṭadaśa manopavicāravyavasthānādaṣṭādadhā bhidyate /
SA01vakobhau:5416: 147_12-13 yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ "cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇyupavicarantītyevamādiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5423: 147_17-18 itrathā hi kāmadhātau rūpadhātvālambanā rūpādyupavicārā na syuḥ kāmadhātbalamvanāśca rūpadhātau gandharasaspraṣṭavyopavicārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5424: 147_18-19 yathā tu yaktataraṃ tathoktaṃ yo 'pi rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā śabdānupavicarati so 'pi manopavicāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5428: 147_23-24 athaiṣāṃ manopavicārāṇāṃ kati kāmapratisaṃyuktāsteṣāṃ ca kati kimālambanā evaṃ yāvadārūpyapratisaṃyuktā vaktavyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5431: 147_26 āmadhātau sarve 'ṣṭādaśa santi sa ca teṣāṃ sarveṣāmālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:5475: 149_06-08 yeṣāṃ tat vyavacchinnālambanamasti yeṣāṃ punaḥ paripiṇḍitālambanaṃ teṣāṃ tatraika eva saṃbhinnālambano dharmopavicāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5488_0: 149_17-21 kāmadhātūpapanno rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyālābhī kāmāvacaraiḥ sarvaiḥ
SA01vakobhau:5488_2: paryudasya ārūpyāvacareṇaikena kliṣṭenaivālābhī rūpāvacarasya kuśalasya cittasyā
SA01vakobhau:5497: 150_01-02 nahi yo yasmādvītarāgaḥ sa tadālambanamupavicaratīti yuktam /
SA01vakobhau:5498: 150_02-03 ataḥ sāsravā api na sarve saumanasyādayo manopavicārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5502: 150_04-05 anunīyate ca pratihanyate cāpratisṅkhyāya copekṣate yeṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ṣaṭ sātatā vihārā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:5503: 150_05-07 cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā naiva sumanā bhavati na durmanā upekṣako viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan evaṃ yāvanmanasā dharmān vijñāyeti /
SA01vakobhau:5504: 150_07-08 nahyarhato laukikaṃ nāsti kuśalaṃ dharmālambanaṃ saumanasyaṃ yattu tatsāṃkleśikaṃ manasa upavicārabhutaṃ tasyaiva pratiṣedho lakṣyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:5521: 150_19 sa caiṣa pratītyasamutpādaḥ samāsataḥ kleśakarmavastūnīti prāk jñāpitam /
SA01vakobhau:5525: 150_22-23 tadyathā vījādaṅkurakāṇḍapatrādīnāṃ prabhavo bhavatyevaṃ kleśāt kleśakarmavastūnām /
SA01vakobhau:5526: 150_23-01 yathā nāgādhiṣṭitaṃ saro na śuṣyatyevaṃ kleśanāgādhiṣṭhitaṃ janmasaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5527: 151_01-02 yathā cānapoddhṛtamūlā vanaspatayaśchinnāśchinnāḥ punarapi prarohantyevamanapoddhṛtakleśamūlā gatayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5528: 151_02-03 yathā ca vṛkṣāḥ kālena kālalṃ puṣpaphalānāṃ prasotāro bhavantyevaṃ kleśā apyasakṛt kleśakarmavastūnāṃ heturbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:5529_0: 151_03-06 yathā ca tuṣāvanaddhāstaṇḍulāḥ prarohaṇasamarthā bhavanti na kevalā evaṃ
SA01vakobhau:5529_1: kleśaprāptatuṣāvanaddhaṃ karma janmāntaravirohaṇe samarthaṃ bhavati na kevalamityevaṃ
SA01vakobhau:5534: 151_09-10 santyoṣadhayaḥ phalapākāntā evaṃ karmāṇi vipacya punarvipākānabhinirvarttayante /
SA01vakobhau:5535: 151_10-11 yathā ca puṣpaṃ phalotpattavāsannaṃ kāraṇamevaṃ karmāṇi vipākotpatto veditavyāni /
SA01vakobhau:5537: 151_13-14 pathā siddhamannaṃ pānaṃ ca kevalaṃ paribhogāya kalpyate na punarvirohāya evaṃ vipākākhyaṃ vastu /
SA01vakobhau:5539: 151_14-15 yadi hi pravardheta mokṣo na syāt /
SA01vakobhau:5540: 151_15-16 na khalveṣa janmasaṃtāna evaṃ pratītyasamutpadyamāno bhavacatuṣṭayaṃ nātikrāmati /
SA01vakobhau:5549: 151_22-23 nahi sa kleśo 'sti yena pratisamdhibandhaḥ pratividyate ityābhidharmikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5551: 151_24-25 yadyapi sā 'vasthā mandikā yastu yatrābhīkṣṇaṃ carita āsannaśca tasya tadānīṃ sa eva kleśa upatiṣṭhate /
SA01vakobhau:5560: 152_04-05 kāmarūpadhātvoraparisaṃkhyānāt sarva eva catvāro bhavāḥ santītyanujñāpitaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:5564: 152_09-10 eko dharmo bhagavatā svayamabhijñāyābhisaṃbadhyākhyāto "yaduta sarvasttvā āhārasthitikā" iti sūtrapadam /
SA01vakobhau:5586: 152_21-22 yānyapi tu nābhyavahniyante sthitiṃ cāharanti tānyapi sūkṣma āhāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5591: 152_25 āhāro hi nāma ya indriyamahābhūtānāmanugrahāya saṃvarttate /
SA01vakobhau:5592: 152_25-26 rūpāyatanaṃ cābhyavaharaṇakāle svamindriyaṃ tanmahābhūtāni vā nānugṛhṇāti /
SA01vakobhau:5594: 153_01-02 yadāpi ca dṛśyamāne sukhasaumanasye ādadhāti tadāpi tadālambanaḥ sukhavedanīyaḥ sparśa āhāro bhavati na rūpam /
SA01vakobhau:5598: 153_05-06 cetanā manaskarma vijñānaṃ ca sāsravāṇyevāhārāḥ triṣvapi dhātuṣu saṃvidyante /
SA01vakobhau:5602: 153_07-09 api tu sūtra uktaṃ "catvāra ime āhārā bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyai saṃbhavaiṣiṇāṃ cānugrahāye"ti /
SA01vakobhau:5604: 153_10 bhūtā hi tāvatsattvā upapannā iti vijñāyante /
SA01vakobhau:5615: 153_16-18 "tathāsti pudgalo yasyābhinirvṛttisaṃyojanaṃ prahīṇaṃ nopapattisaṃyojanam" iti sūtra catuḥkoṭikāt /
SA01vakobhau:5621: 153_21 atha katyāhārāḥ sattvānāṃ sthitaye kati saṃbhavaiṣiṇāmanugrahāya /
SA01vakobhau:5625: 153_23-24 bhagavatā "atvāra ime āhārā rogasya mūlalṃ gaṇḍasya śalyasya jarāmaraṇasya pratyaya" iti /
SA01vakobhau:5627: 153_24-26 evaṃ hi varṇayanti durbhikṣābhyāhatena kīla pitrā putrakau saktava iti bhasmanā bhastrāṃ paripūrya kīlake āsajyāśvāsitau /
SA01vakobhau:5628: 153_26-27 tau ca tāṃ parikalpayantau ciramapyāsitau kenāpi codghāṭitāyāṃ bhasmeti nairāśyamāpannau vyāpannāviti /
SA01vakobhau:5629: 153_27-02 punaśca mahāsamudre bhagnayānapātrāḥ puruṣāḥ sthalamiti mahāntaṃ phenapiṇḍaṃ pradrutāḥ āmṛśya cainaṃ nirāśā uparemuriti /
SA01vakobhau:5630: 154_02-04 saṃgītiparyāye coktaṃ mahāsamudrādaudārikāḥ prāṇino jalāt sthalamabhiruhya sikatāsthale 'ṇḍāni sthāpayitvā sikatābhiravaṣṭabhya punarapi mahāsamudre 'vataranti /
SA01vakobhau:5631: 154_04-05 tatra yāsāṃ mātṛṇāmaṇḍānyārabhya smṛtirna muṣyate tānyaṇḍāni na pūtībhavanti yāsāṃ tu muṣyate tāni pūtībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:5635: 154_06-07 yeṣāmaṇḍānāṃ mātaramārabhya smṛtirna muṣyate tāni na pūtībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:5639: 154_09-10 nanu ca sarva eva sāsravā dharmā bhavānāṃ poṣakāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5647: 154_14-16 manaḥsaṃcetanayā punarbhavasyākṣepaḥ ākṣiptasya punaḥ karmaparibhāvitādvijñānavījādabhinirvṛttirityanayoranutpannasya bhavasyākaraṇe prādhānyam /
SA01vakobhau:5649: 154_16-17 pūrvakau hi dvau dhātrīsthānīyau jātasya poṣakatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:5651: 154_18 yaḥ kaścit kavaḍīkāraḥ sarvaḥ sa āhāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5653: 154_19-20 prathamā koṭiryaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmapacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ ca paribhedaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5655: 154_20-21 tṛtīyā yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo bhavati mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5658: 154_23-24 syāt sparśādīn pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo mahābhūtānāṃ ca vṛddhirna ca ta āhārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5660: 154_24-25 yo 'pi hi paribhukto bhokturbādhāmādadhāti so 'pyāhāra eva /
SA01vakobhau:5662: 154_25-26 dvayorhi kālayorāhāra āhārakṛtyaṃ karoti paribhujyamāno jīryaṃśceti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5668: 154_28-01 yadyūpaghātako 'pyāhāro bhavati catuḥkoṭikaṃ bādhyate prakaraṇagranthaśca "kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ katamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5669: 155_01-03 yaṃ kavaḍīkāraṃ pratītyendriyāṇāmupacayo bhavati mahābhutānāṃ ca vṛddhiryāpanā 'nuyāpaneti vistareṇa yāvadvijñānam /"
SA01vakobhau:5672: 155_04 so 'pi hi jighatsāṃ pipāsāṃ hantuṃ samartha iti /
SA01vakobhau:5674: 155_05-07 uktaṃ bhagavatā "yaśca bāhyakānāmṛṣīṇāṃ kāmebhyo vītarāgāṇāṃ śataṃ bhojayedyaścaikaṃ jambūṣaṇḍagataṃ pṛthagajanam /
SA01vakobhau:5680: 155_09-10 syādyadi bhūyasaḥ pṛthagjanān bhojayitvā bhūyaḥ puṇyaṃ syāt nālpīyaso vītarāgāniti /
SA01vakobhau:5682: 155_11 tadetanna varṇayanti "bahutaraṃ hi tasmai datvā puṇyaṃ nārhatkoṭibhya" iti /
SA01vakobhau:5683: 155_11-12 ato nirvedhabhāgīyalābhī pṛthagjana eṣo'bhipretaḥ iti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5684: 155_12-13 natviyamanvarthā saṃjñā nāpikvacitparibhāṣitā sūtre śāstre vā /
SA01vakobhau:5686: 155_14 bodhisattva eva tveṣu jambūdvīpaṣaṇḍeṣu niṣaṇṇo yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:5687: 155_14-15 sa hi pṛthagjana kāmavairāgyasaṃbandhena tadānīṃ tebhyo viśiṣyamāṇa ukta iti /
SA01vakobhau:5690: 155_16-17 itthaṃ caitadevaṃ yadevaṃ paryudasya bāhyakebhya eva srotāpatti phalapratipannakaṃ viśeṣayāṃbabhūva /
SA01vakobhau:5692: 155_18-19 ukto yathā sattvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādo yathāvasthitiścyutirapyuktā yathāyuḥkṣayādibhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5694: katamasmin vijñāne vartamāne cyutyupapattī bhavata ityāha
SA01vakobhau:5698: 155_24 ete ṣaṭ dharmā manovijñāna eveṣyante nānyatra /
SA01vakobhau:5712: 156_08-09 yadā cāsyāśrayo vipariṇantumārabhate tadāvaśyamasya tadāśrayapratibaddhaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūya paścāt pracyaveta nānyathā /
SA01vakobhau:5722: 156_16 atha mriyamāṇasya kasmin śarīrapradeśe vijñānaṃ nirudhyate /
SA01vakobhau:5730: 156_21-22 teṣāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pādayornābhyāṃ hṛdaye ca vijñānaṃ saṃnirudhyate /
SA01vakobhau:5734: 156_23-24 kāyendriyasya teṣu nirodhāt kāyendriyaṃ hi mriyamāṇasya tapta ivopale jalaṃ niṣṭhyūtaṃ saṃkocamāpadyamānaṃ pādādiṣvantardhīyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:5740_1: chidyanta iva na ca punastāni kāṣṭhādivacchidyante chinnabadvā punarna ceṣṭanta iti cchinnānyucyante /
SA01vakobhau:5747: 157_06 kiṃ tu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputrasya pañcopanimittāni prādurbhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:5748_0: 157_07-09 vastrāṇāmābharaṇānāṃ ca manojñaḥ śabdo niścarati śarīraprabhā mandībhavati
SA01vakobhau:5748_1: snātasyodabindavaḥ kāye saṃtiṣṭhante capalātmanā 'pyekatra viṣaye buddhiravatiṣṭhate
SA01vakobhau:5751: 157_10-11 vāsāṃsi kliśyanti mālā mlāyanti kakṣābhyāṃ svedo mucyate daurgandhyaṃ kāye'vakrāmati sve cāsane devaputro nābhiramate /
SA01vakobhau:5752: 157_11-12 so'yaṃ sattvaloka evamutpadyamānastiṣṭhan cyavamanaśca triṣu rāśiṣu sthāpito bhagavatā /
SA01vakobhau:5758: 157_16-17 yattatparyādāya rāgaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya dveṣaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya mohaprahāṇaṃ paryādāya sarvakleśaprahāṇamidamucyate samyaktva"miti sūtram /
SA01vakobhau:5763: 157_19-20 ete hi kleśakṣaye niyatatvāt samyaktvaniyatāḥ mokṣabhāgīyalābhino 'pyavaśyaṃ parinirvāṇadharmāṇa iti /
SA01vakobhau:5766: 157_21-22 na ca te kālaniyamena samyaktve niyatā yathā saptakṛtvaḥ paramādayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5777: 158_02-04 karmādhipatyena tasya yojanalakṣāṇāṃ ṣoḍaśakamudvedhaḥ pariṇāhenāsaṃkhyaṃ tathā ca dṛḍhaṃṃ yanmahālagno'pi vajreṇa bhettumaśaktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5786: 158_09-10 yathā hi bhuktaṃ pītamannaṃ pānaṃ ca nāpakvaṃ pakvāśayamāpatatī tyeke /
SA01vakobhau:5793: 158_14-15 sā kāñcanamayī mahī bhavatyapāmupariṣṭāt ukto jalakāñcanamaṇḍalocchrāyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5794: VAkK_3.47 tiryak trīṇi sahasrāṇi sārdhaṃ śatacatuṣṭayam /
SA01vakobhau:5798: 158_20-21 samantataḥ parikṣepeṇa tu parigaṇyamānaṃ triguṇaṃ jāyate ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣā daśasahasrāṇi sārdhāni ca trīṇi śatāni yojanānām /
SA01vakobhau:5817: 159_13 suvarṇamayo rūpyamayo vaidūryamayaḥ sphaṭikamayaśca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ caturṣu pārśveṣu /
SA01vakobhau:5818: 159_13-14 yacca yanmayaṃ pārśvaṃ sumerostasyānubhāvena tadvarṇa tasyāṃ diśi nabho dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:5820: 159_15-16 tasyeha prabhānurāgeṇa vaidūryamayaṃ nabho dṛśyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:5823: 159_18-19 tā hyāpo nānāvidhabījagarbhā bahuvidhaprabhāvabhinnairvāyubhirmathyamānāstāṃ tāṃ jātiṃ pariṇamayanti /
SA01vakobhau:5824: 159_19-20 evaṃ ca punaḥ pariṇamayanti yadbhinnajātīyasya kāryaviśeṣotpattāvasamavadhānena pratyayībhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:5825: 159_20-21 na tu khalu yathā sāṃkhyānāṃ pariṇāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5829: 159_22-23 sa eva hi dharmī na saṃvidyate yasyāvasthitasya dharmāṇāṃ pariṇāmaḥ kaspyeta /
SA01vakobhau:5834: tadeva cedaṃ na cedaṃ tatheti apūrvaiṣā vāyo yuktiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5835: 159_25-26 evaṃ ca punaḥ saṃbhūtāḥ suvarṇādayaḥ karmaprabhāvāt preritairvāyubhiḥ samāhṛtya rāśīkriyante /
SA01vakobhau:5840: 160_03 kāñcanamayyāḥ pṛthivyā uparyaśītiyyojanasahasrāṇyudakaṃ tatra te magnāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5842: 160_05 iti hi meroḥ ṣaṣṭi yojanaśatasahasraṃ samucchrayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5845: 160_07-09 tato 'rdhena īśādhara ityevamanyeṣvapyardhārdhahānirveditavyā yāvannimindharārdhenārdhatrayodaśottarāṇi trīṇi yojanaśatāni cakravāḍaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5847: 160_11 yāvāneva caiṣāṃ jalādūrdhvaṃ samucchrāyastāvāneva ghano vistāra ityarthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5849: 160_13-14 eṣāṃ ca nimindharāntanāṃ parvatānāṃ saptāntarāṇi sapta śītā ucyante pūrṇā aṣṭāṅgopetasya pānīyasya /
SA01vakobhau:5850: 160_14-15 taddhi pānīyaṃ śītalaṃ ca svādu ca laghu ca mṛdu cācchaṃ ca niṣpratikaṃ ca pibataśca kaṇṭhaṃ na kṣiṇoti pītaṃ ca kukṣiṃ na vyābādhate /
SA01vakobhau:5860: 160_22-23 pārśvatasriguṇo bhavati yugandharatīreṇa gaṇyamānaḥ catvāriṃśat sahasrāṇi lakṣadvayaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:5862: 161_02-03 yugandharasyeṣādhārasya cāntaraṃ dvitīyā śītā ardhena prathamāyāścatvāriṃśat yojanasahasrāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:5869: 161_07-08 taddhi bāhyo mahāsamudro lavaṇaṃ pūrṇaḥ hṣārodakasya /
SA01vakobhau:5876: 161_13-15 tasya ca madhye kāñcanamayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ vajrāsanamabhinirvṛttaṃ yasminniṣadya sarve bodhisattvā vajropamaṃ samādhimutpādayanti //
SA01vakobhau:5877: 161_15 nahi tamanya āśrayaḥ pradeśo vā soḍhuṃ samarthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5882: 161_19 itaḥ pūrveṇa sumerupārśve pūrvaṃ videho dvīpaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5890: 162_01-02 itaḥ paścimena sumerupārśve 'paragodānīyo dvīpaḥ sārdhāni sapta yojanasahasrāṇi sākalyena /
SA01vakobhau:5898: 162_07-08 sarveṣu ca pārśveṣu samo yathaikaṃ pārśvaṃ dviyojanasahasre /
SA01vakobhau:5900: 162_08-09 yaśca dvīpo yadākṛtistadākṛtīnyeva tatra manuṣyāṇāṃ mukhāni /
SA01vakobhau:5912: 162_18-19 ihaiva jambūdvīpe uttareṇāsya jambūdvīpasya kṛṣṇaparvatāstrayastānatikramyāpare trayaḥ punaśca traya iti navabhyaḥ kīṭaparvatebhyaḥ pareṇa himavān parvataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5915: 162_22-23 tasmāddhimavataḥ pareṇānavataptaṃ nāma saro gandhamādanādarvāk yataścatasro nadyaḥ sravnti gaṅga sindhuḥ śītā vakṣuśca /
SA01vakobhau:5919: 162_25-26 tasyaiva cāntike jambūrabhinirvṛttā madhurasvādūni yasyāḥ phalāni tasyā adhikāreṇāyaṃ jambūdvīpa iti khyātaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5923: 163_02-03 asyaiva jambūdvīpasyādho viṃśatyā yojanasahasrairavīcirmahānarako viṃśatisahasrapramāṇa evodvedhavistārābhyāmevamasyādharatalamitaścatvāriṃśatā yojanasahasrairbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:5925: 163_04-05 anyeṣu sāntaraṃ duḥkham taddyathā saṃjīve cchinnāvabhinnasaṃpiṣṭaśarīrāṇāṃ śītalā vāyavo vānti punarapi tān sattvān saṃjīvayanti /
SA01vakobhau:5932: 163_09-10 pratāpanastāpano mahārauravo rauravaḥ saṃghātaḥ kālasūtraḥ saṃjīvaśca /
SA01vakobhau:5948: 163_22-23 yatra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nikṣipte saṃśīryate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitamutkṣipte pāde punarapi saṃjāyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitam /
SA01vakobhau:5949: 163_24-25 kuṇapaṃ gūthamṛttikā yatra nyaṅkuṭā nāma prāṇinaḥ prativasanti sarvaśvetāḥ kṛṣṇaśirasaḥ sūcimukhāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yāvadasthīni bhindanti /
SA01vakobhau:5950: 163_25-01 kṣuradhārācito mahāpathaḥ yatra teṣāṃ sattvānā manvākrāmatāṃ nikṣipte pāde saṃchidyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitamiti pūrvavat /
SA01vakobhau:5951: 164_01-02 asipatravanaṃ yatra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tīkṣṇā asayaḥ saṃnipatanti aṅgapratyaṅgānyavakṛntanti śyāmaśabalāśca śvāno bhakṣayanti /
SA01vakobhau:5953: 164_03-04 teṣāṃ sattvānāmabhirohatāṃ kaṇṭakā avāṅmukhībhavantaḥ kāyaṃ bhindanti avataratāṃ cordhvībhavantaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5956_0: 164_06-08 caturtha utsado nadī vaitaraṇi pūrṇa taptasya kṣārodakasya yasyāṃ te sattvā
SA01vakobhau:5956_1: asiśaktiprāsahastaiḥ puruṣairubhābhyāṃ tīrābhyāṃ prativāryamāṇā ūrdhvamapi gacchantaḥ
SA01vakobhau:5956_2: svidyante pacyante adhastiryagapi gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante /
SA01vakobhau:5959: 164_10 ta ete catvāra utsadā digbhedena ṣoḍaśocyante /
SA01vakobhau:5964: 164_13-14 kiṃ te narakapālāḥ sattvasaṃkhyātā utāho neti /
SA01vakobhau:5970: duḥkhiteṣu ca nandanti jāyante yamarākṣasā" iti //
SA01vakobhau:5971: 164_18-19 ye te yamenānuśiṣṭāḥ sattvān narakeṣu prakṣipanti ta ete yamarākṣasā uktā na tu ye kāraṇāḥ kārayantīti /
SA01vakobhau:5974: 164_20-21 teṣveva narakeṣu hi ānantaryakāriṇāṃ vipākāvakāśastatra teṣāṃ ko vipratibandhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:5981: 164_25-01 tadyathā arvudo nirarvudaḥ aṭato hahavaḥ huhuvaḥ utpalaḥ padmo mahāpadmaśca /
SA01vakobhau:5990: 165_06-07 teṣāmanekaprakalpo bhedaḥ sthānaṃ cāniyataṃ nadīparvatamarupradeśeṣvanyeṣu vā 'dhaśca bhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:5993: 165_08-09 teṣāṃ kila mūlaṃ sthānaṃ mahāsamudrastato 'nyatra visṛtā iti /
SA01vakobhau:5995: 165_09-10 tasya jambūdvīpasyādhastāt pañcayojanaśatāntaraparicchinnā rājadhānī teṣāṃ mūlasthānaṃ tato 'nyatra visṛtāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6012: 165_20-21 sūryavimānasyādhastāt vahiḥ sphaṭikamaṇḍalaṃ taijasamabhinirvṛttaṃ tāpanaṃ prakāśanaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:6016: 165_23-24 kiṃ punaścaturdvīpeṣu sūryo yugapat kṛtyaṃ karoti /
SA01vakobhau:6021: 165_26-27 yadottarakurāvardharātraṃ tadā pūrvavidehe sūryasyāstaṅgamanaṃ jambūdvīpe madhyāhno godānīye udayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6026: 166_02 varṣāṇāṃ dvitīye māse bhādrapade dvitīyasya pakṣasya navamyāṃ vardhate rātriḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6039: 166_12 jambūdvipasya dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ gacchati bhāskare rātrivṛddhiḥ uttaraṃ gacchatyaharvṛddhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6043: 166_15-16 yadā hi saurasya vimānasyāsanne cāndramasaṃ vimānaṃ vahati tadā kila sauryo bhāsastasmin vimāne patanti /
SA01vakobhau:6044: 166_16-17 tato 'parapārśve chāyā patantī vikalaṃ maṇḍalaṃ darśayatīti prājñaptiko nirdeśaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6045: 166_17-18 vāhayogaḥ sa tādṛśo bhavati yatkadācidvimānasyārdhaṃ dṛśyata iti pūrvācāryāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6057: VAkK_3.63 ṣoḍaśāṣṭau sahasrāṇi catvāri dve ca nirgatāḥ //
SA01vakobhau:6058: 167_02 prathamā pariṣaṇḍā ṣoḍaśa sahasrāṇi yojanānāṃ sumerornirgatā /
SA01vakobhau:6062: 167_06 prathamāyāṃ pariṣaṇḍāyāṃ karoṭapāṇayo nāma yakṣāḥ prativasanti /
SA01vakobhau:6065: 167_07-08 caturthyāṃ tu catvāro mahārājāḥ svayaṃ prativasanti tatparicārāśca /
SA01vakobhau:6082: 167_19-20 tāsu pañcayojanaśatapramāṇāścatvāraḥ kūṭā abhyudgatā yeṣu vajrapāṇayo nāma yakṣāḥ prativasanti /
SA01vakobhau:6085: puraṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma haimaṃ citratalaṃ mṛdu //
SA01vakobhau:6086: 167_23-24 sumerutalasya madhye sudarśanaṃ nāma nagaram dairdhye sārdhatṛtīyayojanasahasre ekaikaṃ parśvamucchrāyeṇādhyardhayojanam /
SA01vakobhau:6088: 167_25-26 tacca bhūmitalaṃ tūlapicuvat mṛdusaṃsparśaṃ pādakṣepotkṣepābhyāṃ natonnataṃ śakrasya devānāmindrasya rājadhānī /
SA01vakobhau:6090_0: 168_02-04 śakrasya devānāmindrasya vaijayanto nāma prāsādo nagarasya madhye nānāratnasthānavidhānasaṃpadā
SA01vakobhau:6090_1: sarvānyabhavanaśrīmahimnā hrepaṇo dairdhyeṇārdhatṛtīye yojanaśate pārśvaṃ pārśvam /
SA01vakobhau:6094: 168_07 tasya hi nagarasya bahiścaturṣu pārśveṣu catvāryudyānādīni devānāṃ kriḍābhūmayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6098: 168_10-11 eṣāṃ codyānānāṃ caturdiśaṃ catvāri sumūmīni viṃśatiyojanāntaritāni krīḍāsthānānyeva devānāṃ parasparaspardhayaiva śobhāṃ vitanvanti /
SA01vakobhau:6104: 168_16-17 tasya khalu sarvapariphullasya yojanaśatamanuvātaṃ gandho vāti pañcāśadyojana yojanāni prativātam /
SA01vakobhau:6109: 168_19-20 tasyaiva tu sā gandhasya tādṛśo prabhāvasaṃpadeṣṭavyā yāt pratibadhyamāno'pi divyairmṛdumārutairgandhāntaraṃ saṃtanoti /

SA01vakobhau:6881: 192_25 cittavaśena kāyasya tathā tathā saṃsthānaṃ kāyavijñaptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6890: sarva hi saṃskṛtamātmalābhā dūrdhvaṃ na bhavatīti yatraiva jātaṃ tatraiva dhvasyate /
SA01vakobhau:6903: 193_08-09 so 'sāvākasmikok vināśo yadi bhāvasyotpannamātrasya na syāt paścādapi na syādbhāvasya tulyatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:6907: na hi sa eva tasmādvilakṣaṇo yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:6910: 193_12-13 na ca sarvasyākasmiko vināśaḥ kathaṃ tāvat bhavān kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogādvināśaṃ paśyāmīti manyate /
SA01vakobhau:6913: 193_14-15 kimagnisaṃyogātkāṣṭhādayo vinaṣṭā ato na dṛśyante utāho svayaṃ vinaṣṭā anye ca punarnotpannā ato na dṛśyante /
SA01vakobhau:6921: 193_19-20 kṣaṇikānāṃ ca buddhiśabdārciṣāṃ dṛṣṭa ākasmiko vināśa iti nāyaṃ hetumapekṣate /
SA01vakobhau:6925: 193_21-22 na hi śaṃsayaniścayajñānayoryuktaṃ samavadhānaṃ sukhaduḥkhayo rāgadveṣayorvā /
SA01vakobhau:6926: 193_22-24 yadā ca paṭubuddhiśabdānantaramapaṭubuddhiśabdāvutpadyete tadā kathamapaṭuḥ samānajātīyo dharmaḥ paṭīyāṃsaṃ hiṃsyāt /
SA01vakobhau:6927: 193_24-25 antyayośca kathaṃ yo 'pyarciṣāmavasthānahetvabhāvāddharmādharmavaśādvā vināśaṃ manyate tadapyayuktam /
SA01vakobhau:6929: 193_25-26 na cāpyutpādavināśahetvordharmārdharmayoḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe vṛttilābhapratibandhau bhavitumarhataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6930: 193_27 sakyaṣcaiṣa kāraṇa parikalpaḥ sarvatra samskṛte kartumityalaṃ vivādena /
SA01vakobhau:6931: 194_01-02 yadi ca kāṣṭhādīnāmagnyādisaṃyogahetuko vināśaḥ syādevaṃ sati pākajānāṃ guṇānāṃ pakvataratamotpattau
SA01vakobhau:6935: 194_04-06 ghāsādyagnisaṃbandhā guṇāḥ pākajā utpannāstata eva tādṛśādvā punaḥ pakvataratamotpattau teṣāṃ vināśa iti hetureva teṣāṃ vināśakaḥ syāddhetvaviśiṣṭo vā /
SA01vakobhau:6936: 194_06-07 na ca yuktaṃ yata eva tādṛśāddvā teṣāṃ bhāvastata eva tādṛśācca teṣāṃ punarabhāva iti /
SA01vakobhau:6939: 194_09-10 yattarhyāpaḥ kvāthyamānāḥ kṣīyante kiṃ tatrāgnisaṃyogāḥ kurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:6940: 194_10-11 tejodhātuṃ prabhāvato vardhayanti yasya prābhāvādapāṃ saṃghātaḥ kṣāmakṣāmo jāyate yāvadatikṣāmatāṃ gato 'nte na punaḥ saṃtānaṃ saṃtanoti /
SA01vakobhau:6942: 194_12-14 tasmānnāsti bhāvānāṃ vināśahetuḥ svayameva tu bhaṅguratvādvinaśyanta utpannamātrā vinaśyantīti siddha eṣāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgācca gatyabhāvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6946: 194_16 ekadiṅmukhe hi bhūyasi varṇa utpanne dīrghaṃ rūpamiti prajñapyate /
SA01vakobhau:6951: 194_18-19 tadyathā 'lātamekasyāṃ diśi deśāntareṣvanantareṣu nirantaramāśu dṛśyamānaṃ dīrghamiti pratīyate sarvato dṛśyamānaṃ maṇḍalamiti /
SA01vakobhau:6955: 194_22-23 cakṣuṣā hi dṛṣṭvā dīrghamityavasīyate kāyendriyeṇāpi spṛṣṭveti dvābhyāmasya grahaṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /
SA01vakobhau:6957: 194_23-24 yathā vā spraṣṭavye dīrghādigrahaṇaṃ tathā varṇe saṃbhāvyatām /
SA01vakobhau:6959: 194_24-25 sa tu sāhacaryāt bhavati na tu sākṣāt grahaṇam /
SA01vakobhau:6960: 194_25-26 yathā 'gnirūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyoṣṇatāyāṃ smṛtirbhavati puṣpagandhaṃ ca ghrātvā tadvarṇa iti /
SA01vakobhau:6961: 194_26-01 yuktamatrāvyabhicāratvādanyenānyasya smaraṇaṃ natu kiñcit spraṣṭavyaṃ kvacit saṃsthāne niyataṃ yatastatra smaraṇaṃ niyamena syāt /
SA01vakobhau:6969: 194_06 yaccāpi kiñcit sapratighaṃ rūpamasti tadavaśyaṃ paramāṇau vidyate /
SA01vakobhau:6971: 195_08 na ca saṃsthānaṃ paramāṇau vidyate dīrghādi /
SA01vakobhau:6973: 195_09-10 atha mattaṃ saṃsthānaparamāṇava eva tathā saṃniviṣṭā dīrghādisaṃjñāṃ labhanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:6976: 195_11 na ca saṃsthānāvayavānāṃ varṇādivat svabhāvaḥ siddha iti kuta eṣāṃ saṃcayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:6977: 195_12 yattarhi varṇaścābhinno bhavati saṃsthānaṃ ca bhinnaṃ dṛśyate mṛdbhājanānām /
SA01vakobhau:6978: 195_12-14 nanu coktaṃ yathā kṛtvā varṇe dīrghādisaṃjñā prajñapyate tathā ca pipīlikādīnāmabhede paṅkticakrādīnāṃ bhedaḥ prajñāyate tathā saṃsthānasyāpi /
SA01vakobhau:6979: 195_14-16 yattarhi tamapi dūrādvā varṇamapaśyantaḥ sthāṇvādīnāṃ dairghyādīni paśyanti varṇameva te tatrāvyaktaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīrghādiparikalpaṃ kurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:6983: 195_18-19 athedānīṃ kāyasya gatiṃ nirākṛṭya samsthānaṃ ca tatra bhavantaḥ sautrāntikāḥ kāṃ kāyavijñarptiṃ prajñapayanti /
SA01vakobhau:6986: 195_20 tāṃ ca prajñapayantaḥ kathaṃ kāyakarma prajñapayanti /
SA01vakobhau:6987: 195_20-21 kāyādhiṣṭhānaṃ karma kāyakarma yā cetanā kāyasya tatra tatra praṇetrī /
SA01vakobhau:6989: 195_22-23 yattarhi "cetanā karma cetayitvā ce"tyuktaṃ saṃkalpacetanā pūrvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ saṃkalpacetanā pūrvaṃ bhavatyevaṃ caivaṃ ca kariṣyāmīti /
SA01vakobhau:6991: 195_23-24 yayā kāyaḥ preryate sā 'sau cetayitvā karmetyucyate /
SA01vakobhau:6992: 195_24-25 evaṃ tarhi vijñaptyabhāvādavijñaptirapi kāmāvacarī nāstīti mahānto doṣā anuṣajyante /
SA01vakobhau:6997: 195_28-01 sā 'pi ca vijñaptiḥ satī tadākṣepe cetanāyā balaṃ nibhālayate /
SA01vakobhau:6999: 196_01-02 dravyameva tu saṃsthānaṃ vaibhāṣikā varṇayanti saṃsthānātmikāṃ tu kāyavijñaptim /
SA01vakobhau:7016: 196_12-13 yasmin rūpe 'tītānāgatapratyutpanno notpadyate 'nunayo vā pratigho vā yāvadyasminvijñāne /
SA01vakobhau:7018: 196_13-14 na cā vijñaptiṃ virahayyāsti rūpamanidarśanamapratighaṃ nāpyanā sravam /
SA01vakobhau:7020_1: kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā carato vā svapato vā tiṣṭhato vā jāgrato vā satatasamitamabhivardhata
SA01vakobhau:7023: 196_18-19 akurvataśca svayaṃ paraiḥ kārayataḥ karmapathā na sidhyeyurasatyāmavijñaptau /
SA01vakobhau:7029: 196_22-23 tatra kiṃ prayojanaṃ syādyadi dharmāyatanāntargatamavijñaptirūpaṃ naśyeta /
SA01vakobhau:7032: 196_24-26 yattarhīdamuktaṃ "tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyataḥ samyagdṛṣṭirbhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati samyak saṃkalpaḥ samyak vyāyāmaḥ samyak smṛtiḥ samyak samādhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7033: 196_26-27 pūrvameva cāsya samyak vāvakrmāntājīvāḥ pariśuddhā bhavanti paryavadātā" iti /
SA01vakobhau:7036: 197_01-02 na hi samādānādurdhvaṃ tadasti yenānyamanasko 'pyayaṃ bhikṣuḥ syāt bhikṣuṇī veti /
SA01vakobhau:7051: 197_07-08 yadapyuktamanāsravarūpokteriti tad eva samādhiprabhāvasaṃbhūtaṃ rūpamanāsrave samādhāvanāsravaṃ varṇayanti yogācārāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7057: 197_11 paryāyeṇa tarhi tadeva sāsravaṃ cānāsravaṃ ca syāt /
SA01vakobhau:7060: 197_12-13 yathā tat sāsravaṃ tathā na kadācidanāsravamiti ko 'tra saṃkaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7061: 197_13-15 yadi ca rūpāyatanādīni ekāntena sāsravāṇi syuriha sūtre kimartha viśeṣitāni syu"ryāni rūpāṇi sāsravāṇi sopādānīyāni cetaḥkhilamrakṣavastvi"ti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7062_1: hyeṣā yathā dātṝṇāṃ dāyāḥ paribhujyante tathā tathā bhoktṝṇāṃ guṇaviśeṣādanugrahaviśeṣāccānyamanasāmapi
SA01vakobhau:7062_2: dātṝṇāṃ tadālambanadānacetanā bhāvitāḥ saṃtatayaḥ sūkṣmaṃ pariṇāmaviśeṣaṃ prāpnuvanti
SA01vakobhau:7063: 197_19-20 "idamabhisaṃdhāyoktaṃ" bhavedabhivardhata eva puṇyamupajāyata eva puṇyam iti /
SA01vakobhau:7064: 197_20-21 atha mataṃ kathamidānīṃ saṃtānāntaraviśeṣādanyamanaso 'pi saṃtānāntarasya pariṇāmaḥ setsyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:7066: 197_21-23 kathamidānīṃ saṃtānāntaraviśeṣātsaṃtānāntare dharmāntaramavijñaptiḥ setsyatīti nirūpadhikeṣvidānīṃ puṇyakriyāvastuṣu kathaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
SA01vakobhau:7068: 197_24-25 avijñaptivādinastu niraupadhike yatra vijñaptirnāsti tatra kathāmavijñaptiḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:7070_0: 197_26-01 yattarhi sūtra uktaṃ "yasyograbhikṣuḥ śīlavān kalyāṇadharmā piṇḍakaṃ paribhujyāpramāṇaṃ
SA01vakobhau:7070_2: puṇyābhiṣyandaḥ kuśalābhiṣyandaḥ sukhāsvādadhāraḥ pratikāṅkṣitavya" ityatra tadānīṃ
SA01vakobhau:7072: 198_02-03 yadapyuktaṃ "kārayataḥ kathaṃ karmapathāḥ setsyantī"ti tatrāpyevaṃ varṇayanti /
SA01vakobhau:7073_1: jāyate yata āyatyāṃ samante 'pi bahutaraphalābhinirvarttanasamarthā bhavatīti svayamapi
SA01vakobhau:7073_2: ca kurvataḥ kriyāphalaparisamāptāveṣa eva nyāyo veditavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7077: 198_07-08 upātteṣu skandheṣu trikālayā cetanayā prāṇātipātāvadhvena spṛśyata iti bhadantaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7078: 198_08-09 haniṣyāmi hanmi hatamiti cāsya yadā bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:7081: 198_11 svayaṃ tu ghnata etāvāṃścetanāsamudācāra ityayamatrābhiprāyo yuktarūpaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:7082: 198_11-13 ka idānīmeṣa pradveṣo yadavijñaptiḥ prakṣipyate saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣaścābhyupagamyate tathaivāprajñāyamānaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7084: 198_13-14 kintu cittānvayakāyaprayogeṇa kriyāparisamāptau tābhyāṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ dharmāntaraṃ prayojayiturutpadyata iti notpadyate paritoṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7085: 198_15-16 yatkṛtaprayogasaṃbhūtā tu kriyāparisamāptistasyaiva tannimittaḥ saṃtatipariṇāmo bhavatīti bhavati paritoṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7096: 198_20-21 kimasau vācaṃ bhāṣyate kriyāṃ vā karoti cīvarādīn vā paryeṣate /
SA01vakobhau:7100: 198_22-23 yasyāḥ pratilambhādvyutthito 'pi na punarmithyāvāgādiṣu pravartate samyagvāgādiṣu ca pravartate /
SA01vakobhau:7102_0: 198_24-27 yadyevamihāpyevaṃ kiṃ na gṛhyate mārgasamāpanno vināpyavijñaptyā tadrūpamāśayaṃ
SA01vakobhau:7102_1: ca āśrayaṃ ca pratilabhate yasya pratilambhāt vyutthito 'pi na punarmithyāvāgādiṣu
SA01vakobhau:7103: 198_27-01 ato nimitte naimittikopacāraṃ kṛtvā aṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:7108: 199_03-04 tadyāthā 'ṣṭau lokadharmāḥ lābho 'lābhaḥ yaśo 'yaśaḥ nindā praśaṃsā sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti /
SA01vakobhau:7110: 199_05-06 prātimokṣasaṃvaro 'pi syāt yayā cetanayā vidhipūrvaṃ kṛtvā 'bhyupagamaḥ pratiṣiddhātkarmaṇaḥ kāyavācau saṃvṛṇoti /
SA01vakobhau:7113: 199_07-09 tadbhāvanayā kriyākāle smarataḥ tatpratyupasthānāt setubhāvo 'pi syādakriyāṃ pratijñāṃ saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya lajjito dauḥśīlyākaraṇāt ityarthameva ca tasyāḥ samādānam /
SA01vakobhau:7114: 199_09-10 yadi punaravijñaptereva dauḥsīlyaṃ pratibadhnīyāt na kaścitmuṣitasmṛtiḥ śikṣāṃ bhindyāt /
SA01vakobhau:7116: 199_12-13 yadyasti tacca mahābhūtānyupādāyetyuktam tat kim vijñaptimahābhūtānyevopādāyāvijñaptirutpadyate athānyāni /
SA01vakobhau:7118: 199_14 na hi saiva sāmagrī sukṣmaphalā caudārikaphālā ca yujyate /
SA01vakobhau:7119: 199_14-15 kiṃ khalu yadātanī vijñaptistadātanānyeva sā mahābhūtānyupādāya vartate /
SA01vakobhau:7120: 199_15-16 sarvamupādāyarūpaṃ prāyeṇaivaṃ kiñcittu vartamānamanāgataṃ cātītāni mahābhūtānyupādāya /
SA01vakobhau:7130: 199_24-25 kāmāvacaraṃ kāyavākkarmaṃ kāmāvacarāṇyeva mahābhūtānyupādāya evaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānabhūmikaṃ tadbhūmikānyevopādāya /
SA01vakobhau:7132: 199_27-01 asravaṃ tu kāyavākkarma yasyāṃ bhūmau jātastadutpādayati tadbhūmikānyupādāya tadveditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:7143_1: abhinnāni ca yānyeva ca bhūtānyupādāya prāṇātipātādviratirutpadyate tānyeva yāvat saṃbhinnapralāpāt /
SA01vakobhau:7149: 200_14-16 kiṃ punariyaṃ vijñaptirutpadyamānā pūrvakasya saṃsthānasya saṃtānaṃ bādhitvotpadyate utāho na /
SA01vakobhau:7155: 200_18-19 anyānyeva tāni naiḥṣyandikāni tadānīmupajāyante yānyupādāya vijñaptirbhavati /
SA01vakobhau:7156: 200_19-20 evaṃ tarhi yadyadevāṅgaṃ niśrityotpadyate vijñaptistena tenāṅgena mahīyasā bhavitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:7158: 200_20-21 anabhivyāpane ca punaḥ kathaṃ kṛtsnāṅgena vijñapayet /
SA01vakobhau:7160: 200_22 tat khalvetat karma paryāyeṇa dvividhaṃ trividhaṃ pañcavidhaṃ cottam /
SA01vakobhau:7165: 200_24-25 evaṃ vākkarma cetanā ceti pañcavidhaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:7170: 200_27-28 avyākṛtaṃ hi cittaṃ durbalamato na śaktaṃ balavatkarmākṣeptuṃ yanniruddhe 'pi tasminnanuvadhnīyāt /
SA01vakobhau:7199: kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne na tata ūrdhvam /
SA01vakobhau:7204: 201_20-21 sa hi svaparṣanmadhye āyuṣmato 'śvajitaḥ kṣepārthamātmānaṃ kṣiptavāt /
SA01vakobhau:7205: 201_21-22 tata ūrdhvamasatyāṃ vāgvijñaptau kathaṃ tatra śabdāyatanaṃ bāhyamahābhūtahetukam /
SA01vakobhau:7210: 201_24-25 na hi teṣūpapannastajjātīyamadhobhūmikaṃ cittaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti yena tāṃ vijñaptiṃ samutthāpayet /
SA01vakobhau:7213: 201_25-26 kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇamūrdhvaṃ brahmalokānnāsti vijñaptiḥ kāmadhātau ca nivṛktāvyākṛtā nāsti /
SA01vakobhau:7216: 202_02-03 tacca dvitīyādiṣu dhyāneṣu nāsti bhāvanāprahātavyena cotthāpyate /
SA01vakobhau:7219: 202_05 kiṃ khalu samutthānavaśādevaṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalatvaṃ veditavyam /
SA01vakobhau:7222: caturbhiḥ prakāraiḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvataḥ saṃprayogataḥ samutthānataśca /
SA01vakobhau:7232: 202_14-15 taireva kuśalamūlahyar patrāpyaiḥ saṃprayuktā dharmāḥ saṃprayogeṇa kuśalāstairasaṃprayuktānāṃ kuśalatvābhāvādauṣadhamiśrapānīyavat /
SA01vakobhau:7234: 202_17-18 kāyavāvakkarmaṇi cittaviprayuktāśca saṃskārajātyādayaḥ prāptinirodhāsaṃjñisamāpattayastaireva kuśalamūlādisaṃprayuktai dharmaḥ samupasthāpitāḥ samutthānena kuśalāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7236: 202_19-20 prāptīnāṃ tu visabhāgacittasamutthāpitānāṃ kathaṃ kuśalatvamiti vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:7246: 203_01 evaṃ tarhi na kiñcitsāsravamavyākṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati kuśalaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:7248: 203_02 paramārthata evamuktaṃ vipākaṃ tu prati yatsāsravaṃ na vyākriyate tadavyākṛtamityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:7255: 203_06-07 yadi samutthānavaśātkuśalākuśalatvaṃ kāyavākkarmaṇaḥ kiṃ na mahābhūtānām /
SA01vakobhau:7257: 203_07-09 samāhitasyāvijñaptau nāstyabhiprāyo na cāsamāhitaṃ cittaṃ tasyāḥ samutthāpakaṃ visabhāgabhūmikatvāditi kathaṃ tasyāḥ kuśalatvam /
SA01vakobhau:7261: 203_11-12 kiṃ tarhi bhagavatoktaṃ "tato 'pi mithyādṛṣṭermithyāsaṃkalpaḥ prabhavati mithyā vāgmithyākarmānta" mityevamādi /
SA01vakobhau:7270: 203_17-18 tena hi vinā 'sau mṛtasyeva na syādā kṣiptā 'pi satī /
SA01vakobhau:7286: 204_01 naivaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā na kuśalākuśalāni bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:7304: kiṃ khalu yathā pravartakaṃ tathaivānuvartakaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:7314: 204_19-20 na tu kadācit kuślaṃ pravartakamanuvartakaṃ cāvyākṛtaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:7317: 204_21-22 kuśalaikatānā hi buddhānāṃ saṃtatayo nityaṃ samāhitatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:7320: svapan samāhito nāgo niṣaṇṇo 'pi samāhita" iti /
SA01vakobhau:7321: 204_25-26 anicchayā 'sya cittasyāvisaraṇādevamuktaṃ na tu na santyavyākṛtāni vipākajairyā pathikanirmāṇacittāni buddhānāmiti vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:7325: 205_02 vipākajaṃ tu cittaṃ naiva pravartakaṃ nānuvartakaṃ nirabhisaṃskāravāhitvāt /
SA01vakobhau:7331: 205_05-06 na vā sarvaṃ darśanaprahātavyaṃ pravartakamiti viśeṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam /

SA01vakobhau:9843: 282_20-22 "ye caivaṃ dṛṣṭaya evaṃvādino yadayaṃ puruṣapudgalo gośīlaṃ samādāya vartate mṛgaśīlaṃ kukkuraśīlaṃ,
SA01vakobhau:9844: sa tena śudhyati mucyate sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti /

SA01vakobhau:9852: 282_27-28 yasya ca mārgālambanā mithyādṛṣṭirvicikitsā vā 'sti sa nāsti mokṣamārga iti paśyan vicikitsan vā kathaṃ tayā śuddhiṃ pratyeṣyati /

SA01vakobhau:9874: 283_11-13 ātmānameva tatra vaśinaṃ paśyennātmīyaṃ paśyatītyātmadṛṣṭirevāsau dvimukhī athāhamityetasmāt mameti dṛṣṭyantaraṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:9884: 283_20-21 anye kleśā na santīrakā ato na viparyāsāḥ /

SA01vakobhau:10234: 295_12-13 anāgataṃ cedrūpaṃ nābhaviṣyat na śrutavānāryaśrāvako 'nāgataṃ rūpaṃ nābhyanandiṣyat /

SA01vakobhau:10260: 296_10-11 dharmasyādhvasu, pravartamānasya bhāvānyathātvaṃ bhavati na dravyānyathātvam /

SA01vakobhau:10262: 296_12-13 yathā ca kṣīraṃ dadhitvena pariṇamadrasavīryavipākān parityajati na varṇam /
SA01vakobhau:10264: 296_14-15 evaṃ pratyutpannādatītamadhvānaṃ gacchan pratyutpannabhāvaṃ jahāti na dravyabhāvamiti /
SA01vakobhau:10270: 296_19 tadyathā puruṣa ekasyāṃ striyāṃ raktaḥ śeṣāsvavirakta iti /
SA01vakobhau:10273: 296_20-21 dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamāno 'vasthāmavasthāṃ prāpyānyo 'nyo nidiśyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10274: 296_21-23 yathaikā vartikā ekāṅke nikṣiptā ekamityucyate śatāṅke śataṃ sahasrāṅke sahasramiti /
SA01vakobhau:10277: 297_01-02 dharmo 'dhvasu pravartamānaḥ pūrvāparamapekṣyānyo 'nya ucyate avasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10278: 297_02-03 yathaikā strī mātā vocyate duhitā veti /
SA01vakobhau:10280: 297_04 eṣāṃ tu prathamaḥ pariṇāmavāditvāt sāṃkhyapakṣe nikṣeptavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10283: 297_05-06 puruṣasya tu kasyāñcit striyāṃ rāgaḥ samudācarati kasyāñcit kevalaṃ samanvāgama iti kimatra sāmyam /
SA01vakobhau:10285: 297_07-08 atīte 'dhvani pūrvapaścimau kṣaṇāvatītānāgatau madhyamaḥ kṣaṇaḥ pratyutpanna iti /
SA01vakobhau:10292: 297_12 yadā sa dharmaḥ kāritraṃ na karoti tadā 'nāgataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10300: 297_15-16 yadyevaṃ pratyutpannasya tatsabhāgasya cakṣuṣaḥ kiṃ kāritram /
SA01vakobhau:10302: 297_16-17 atītānāmapi tarhi sabhāgahetvādīnāṃ phaladānāt kāritraprasaṅgo 'rdhakāritrasya veti lakṣaṇasaṃkaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10313: 298_01-02 atha tannaivātītaṃ nāpyanāgataṃ na pratyutpannamasti ca /
SA01vakobhau:10315: 298_02-03 ato na vaktavyaṃ yadā karitraṃ na karoti dharmastadā 'nāgata iti /
SA01vakobhau:10322: 298_08-09 yadi dharma eva kāritraṃ kasmātsa eva dharmastenaivātmanā vidyamānaḥ kadācidatīta ityucyate kadācidanāgata ityadhvanāṃ vyavasthā na sidhyati /
SA01vakobhau:10325: yo jāto bhavati na ca vinaṣṭaḥ sa varttamānaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10328: 298_11-12 yadi yathā varttamānaṃ dravyato 'sti tathā 'tītamanāgataṃ cāsti /
SA01vakobhau:10332: 298_15 tenaiva svabhāvena sato dharmasya kathamidaṃ sidhyatyajāta iti yo vinaṣṭaḥ iti veti /
SA01vakobhau:10334: 298_16-17 kiṃ ca paścānnāsti yasyābhāvā dvinaṣṭa ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:10336: 298_17-18 yadyabhutvā bhavatīti neṣyate bhūtvā ca punarna bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:10339: 298_19-20 nityaṃ ca nāmāsti sa dharmo na ca nitya ityapūrvaiṣā vāco yuktiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10347: 299_02-03 evaṃ ca kṛtvā 'stītyucyate na tu punardravyataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10354: 299_05-07 tasmāt bhūtapūrvasya ca hetorbhāvinaśca phalasya bhūtapūratāṃ bhāvitāṃ ca jñāpayituṃ hetuphalāpavādadṛṣṭipratiṣedhārthamuktaṃ bhagavatā "astyatītamastyanāgatami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:10356: 299_07-09 yathā 'sti dīpasya prāgabhāvo 'sti paścādabhāva iti vaktāro bhavanti yathā cāsti niruddhaḥ sa dīpo na tu mayā nirodhita iti /
SA01vakobhau:10359: 299_10-11 yattarhi laguḍaśikhīyakānparivrājakānadhikṛṭyoktaṃ bhagavatā "yatkarmābhyatītaṃ kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ tadastī"ti /
SA01vakobhau:10360: 299_11-12 kiṃ te tasya tasya karmaṇo bhūtapūrvatvaṃ necchanti sma /
SA01vakobhau:10361: 299_12-13 tatra punastadāhitaṃ tasyāṃ saṃtatau phaladānasāmarthyaṃ saṃdhāyoktam /
SA01vakobhau:10362: 299_13 anyathā hi svena bhāvena vidyamānamatītaṃ na sidhyet /
SA01vakobhau:10363: 299_13-15 itthaṃ caitadevaṃ yat paramārthaśūnyatayāmuktaṃ bhagavatā "cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacitsaṃnicayaṃ gacchati /
SA01vakobhau:10364: 299_15-16 iti hi bhikṣavaścakṣurabhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca pratigacchatī"ti
SA01vakobhau:10365: 299_16-17 yadi cānāgataṃ cakṣuḥ syānnoktaṃ syād bhūtvā na bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:10370: 299_18-19 yadapyuktaṃ "dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādāditi idaṃ tāvadiha saṃpradhāryam /
SA01vakobhau:10371: 299_20-21 yanmanaḥ pratītya dharmaścotpadyate manovijñānaṃ kiṃ tasya yathā manojanakaḥ pratyaya evaṃ dharmā āhosvidālambanamātraṃ dharmā iti /
SA01vakobhau:10372: 299_21-22 yadi tāvat janakaḥ pratyayo dharmāḥ kathaṃ yadanāgataṃ kalpasahasreṇa bhaviṣyati vā na vā tadidānīṃ vijñānaṃ janayiṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:10378: 299_25 yadā tadālambanaṃ tathāsti kathaṃ tadālambanam abhūt bhaviṣyati ceti /
SA01vakobhau:10379: 299_25-26 na hi kaścidatītaṃ rūpaṃ vedanāṃ vā smarannastīti paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:10382: 299_26-27 yathā khalvapi varttamānaṃ rūpamanubhūtaṃ tathā tadatītaṃ smaryate /
SA01vakobhau:10383: 299_27-28 yathā cānāgataṃ varttamānaṃ bhaviṣyati tathā buddhyā gṛhyate /
SA01vakobhau:10390: yadi ca tattadeva rūpaṃ kevalaṃ paramāṇuśo vibhaktam /
SA01vakobhau:10393: 300_03-04 na tu kiñcidutpadyate nāpi nirudhyata ityājīvikavāda ālambito bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:10394: 300_04-05 sūtraṃ cāpaviddhaṃ bhavati "cakṣurutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchatī"ti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10397: 300_06 yadi ca te tathaiva santi nityāḥ prāpnuvanti /
SA01vakobhau:10403: evaṃ tarhi nāma eva nāstīti pratīyeta /
SA01vakobhau:10406: 300_10-11 evaṃ tarhi yaḥ śabdābhāvaṃ prārthayate tasya śabda eva kartavyaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:10414: 300_14-15 yattarhi bodhisattvenoktam "yattat loke nāstitadahaṃ jñāsyāmi vā drakṣyāmi vā nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata" iti /
SA01vakobhau:10417: 300_16-18 itarathā hi sarvabuddhīnāṃ sadālambanatve kuto 'sya vimarśaḥ syāt ko vā viśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10419: 300_18-19 yadanyatra bhagavatoktam "etat bhikṣurmama śrāvako yāvatsa mayā kalpamavoditaḥ sāyaṃ viśeṣāya paraiṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:10421: 300_20-21 sacca sato jñāsyati asaccāsataḥ sottarañca sottarataḥ anuttaraṃ cānurattarata" iti /
SA01vakobhau:10425: 300_22 naiva hi sautrāntikā atītāt karmaṇaḥ phalotpatti varṇayanti /
SA01vakobhau:10428: 300_24-25 yasya tvatītānāgataṃ dravyato 'sti tasya phalaṃ nityamevāstīti kiṃ tatra karmaṇaḥ sāmarthyam /
SA01vakobhau:10452: 301_09-10 yathā tu tadasti tathoktaṃ athāsatyatītātānāgate kathaṃ tena tasminvā saṃyukto bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:10453: 301_10-11 tajjataddhetvanuśayabhāvāt kleśena tadālambane kleśānuśayabhāvādvastuni saṃyukto bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:10469: 301_19-20 yatra vā visaṃ yuktaḥ prahīṇaṃ tasya tadvastviti /
SA01vakobhau:10471: 301_21 syātu prahīṇaṃ na ca tatra visaṃyuktastadyathā
SA01vakobhau:10474: 301_24-01 duḥkhajñāne samutpanne samudayajñāne 'nutpanne duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo nikāyaḥ prahīṇo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:10475: 302_01 tasmin prahīṇe tadālambanaiḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavyaiḥ sarvatragaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10476: 302_02-03 bhāvanāprahātavye 'pi nikāye navānāṃ prakārāṇāṃ yaḥ prakāraḥ prāk prahīṇastasmin prahīṇe 'pi śeṣaistadālambanaiḥ kleśaiḥ saṃyukto veditavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10477: 302_04-05 kasminvastuni katyanuśayā anuśerata iti etatpratipadamabhidhīyamānaṃ bahutaraṃ vaktavyaṃ jāyate /
SA01vakobhau:10479: 302_05-06 kathamalpenālpena yatnena mahato mahataḥ praśnaughān pratipādyemahīti /
SA01vakobhau:10480: 302_06-07 samāsata ime ṣoḍaśa dharmāḥ kāmarūpārupyāvacarāḥ pañcaprakārāḥ anāsravāśca /
SA01vakobhau:10482: 302_07-09 tatra katamo dharmaḥ kasya cittasyālambanamiti jñātvā amuṣminniyanto 'nuśayā anuśerata ityetadabhyūhitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:10489: 302_13-14 kāmāvacarāstāvad duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśca dharmāḥ pañcānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:10490: 302_14-15 svadhātukānāṃ trayāṇāṃ teṣāmeva ūrdhvadhātukasyaikasya bhāvanāheyasyaiva anāsravasya ceti /
SA01vakobhau:10492: 302_17 rūpāvacarāsta eva triprakārā dharmā aṣṭānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:10498: 302_21 ārūpyāvacarāsta eva triprakārā dharmā daśānāṃ cittānāmālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:10506: 303_02-03 kāmāvacarā hi nirodhadarśanaheyā dharmāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāmālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:10511: 303_05-07 nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyāstasyaiva nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyasyādhikasya cittasyālambanamiti navānāmekādaśānāṃ ca cittānāmālambanaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:10520: 303_16-17 evameṣāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ cittānāṃ ṣoḍaśadharmālambanavyavasthāṃ viditvā kathamanuśayakāryāṃ yojayitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:10522: 303_18-19 sukhendriyālambane vijñāne katyanuśayāḥ anuśerata iti praśna āgate vicārayitavyam /
SA01vakobhau:10523: 303_19-20 sukhendriyaṃ saptavidhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ ca pañcaprakāramanāsravaṃ ceti /
SA01vakobhau:10528: 303_23-25 tatra yathāsaṃbhavaṃ kāmāvacarāścatvāro nikāyā rūpāvacarāśca saṃskṛtālambanā ārūpyāvacarau ca dvau nikāyau sarvatragāścānuśayā anuśerata iti jñātavyam /
SA01vakobhau:10530: 303_26-01 tat punaḥ sukhendriyālambanālambanaṃ dvādaśavidhaṃ vijñānaṃ katamasya vijñānasyālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:10531: 304_01-02 tasyaiva dvādaśavidhāsyārūpyāvacarasya ca bhūyo dviprakārasya duḥkhasamudayadarśanaprahātavyasya /
SA01vakobhau:10532_1: dvau duḥkhasamudayadarśanaheyau vardhayitvā kāmāvacarā ārūpyāvacarāścatvāro nikāyā
SA01vakobhau:10532_2: rūpāvacarāḥ saṃskṛtālambanā anuśayā anuśerata iti jñātavyam /
SA01vakobhau:10571: 305_11-13 apare svadṛṣṭāvevānyatra gṛhīte tyaktāyāṃ dveṣamicchanti darśanaheyānāṃ rāgādīnāṃ svāsāntānikadṛṣṭyālambanatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:10577: 305_19-20 tadyathā rāgānuśayo 'prahīṇo bhavatyaparijñātaḥ kāmarāgaparyavasthānīyāśca dharmā ābhāsagatā bhavanti tatra cāyoniśo manaskāra evaṃ kāmarāga utpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:10579: 305_21 evamanyo 'pi kleśa utpadyata iti veditavyo yaḥ
SA01vakobhau:10584: 306_02-03 eta evānuśayāḥ sūtre bhagavatā traya āsravā uktāḥ kāmasravo bhavāsravo 'vidyāsrava iti /
SA01vakobhau:10591: 306_08-09 avidyāṃ varjayitvā 'nye kāmāvacarāḥ kleśāḥ saha paryavasthānaiḥ kāmāsravo veditavya ekacatvāriṃśaddravyāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:10598: nanu ca tatrāpyasti paryavasthānadvayaṃ styānamauddhatyaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:10604: 306_18 kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ rūpārūpyāvacarā anuśayāḥ samasyaiko bhavāgra uktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10607: 306_21-22 te hyūbhaye 'pyavyākṛtā antarmukhapravṛttāḥ samāhitabhūmikāśceti trividhena sādhamyerṇaikatāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10608: 306_22-23 yenaiva ca kāraṇena bhavarāga uktastenaiva bhavāsravaḥ ityavidyedānīṃ traidhātukyavidyāsrava iti siddham /
SA01vakobhau:10616: 307_04-05 evaṃ bhavāsrava eva bhavaugho bhavayogaścānyatra dṛṣṭibhyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10620: 307_07-08 na ca kila kevalā dṛṣṭya āsyānukūlāḥ paṭutvāt /
SA01vakobhau:10622: 307_08-09 miśrīkṛtya sthāpitā iti tadevaṃ kāmaugha ekānnatriṃśaddravyāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:10638: 307_20-21 gṛhiṇo 'pyanena vipralabdhā anaśanādibhiḥ svargamārgasaṃjñayā pravrajitā apīṣṭaviṣayaparivarjanena śuddhipratyāgamanāditi /
SA01vakobhau:10641: VAkK_5.38 avidyā tu grāhikā neti miśritā //
SA01vakobhau:10642: 308_01 asaṃprakhyānalakṣaṇatayā 'paṭutvādavidyā na grāhikā bhavatyataḥ kila miśritā /
SA01vakobhau:10644_0: 308_02-04 vistareṇa yāvadyo 'sya bhavati kāmeṣu kāmarāgaḥ kāmacchandaḥ kāmasnehaḥ
SA01vakobhau:10644_1: kāmaprema kāmecchā kāmamūrcchā kāmagṛddhaḥ kāmaparigarddhaḥ kāmanandī kāmaniyantiḥ
SA01vakobhau:10647: 308_05-06 cchandarāgaścopādānamuktaṃ sutrāntareṣvato vijñāyate kāma hyupādānamapi kāmādiṣu cchandarāga iti /
SA01vakobhau:10659: 308_16 āsayanti saṃsāre āsravanti bhavāgrādyāvadavīciṃ ṣaṅbhirāyatanavraṇair ityāsravāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10666: 308_19-20 sā teṣāmeva saṃskārāṇāṃ gratiprasravdhyā 'lpakṛcchreṇānusrota uhyata''; iti sūtravādānusārāt /
SA01vakobhau:10678: 309_05-06 ata evocyate syāt dṣṭisaṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣvanunayasaṃyojanena saṃyukto na dṛṣṭisaṃyojanena na ca tatra dṛṣṭyanuśayo nānuśayīta /
SA01vakobhau:10679: 309_06-07 āha syāt samudayajñāne utpanne nirodhajñāne 'nutpanne nirodhamārgadarśānaprahātavyeṣu dṛṣṭiśīlavrataparāmarśasaṃprayukteṣu dharmeṣu /
SA01vakobhau:10684: 309_12-13 kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ saṃyojaneṣu tisro dṛṣṭayo dṛṣṭisaṃprayojanaṃ pṛthaguktaṃ dve punardṛṣṭī parāmarśāsaṃyojanaṃ pṛthak /
SA01vakobhau:10688: 309_15-16 ataḥ kila dravya sāmānyādete saṃyojanāntaram kṛte /
SA01vakobhau:10689: 309_16-17 ete ca dve parāmarśasvabhāvena śeṣāiti parāmarśanasāmānyādapyete pṛthagvihite grāhyagrāhakabhedāt /
SA01vakobhau:10690: 309_18-19 atha kasmādīṣryāmātsarye saṃyojane pṛthaksaṃyojanadvayamuktaṃ nānyat paryavasthānam /
SA01vakobhau:10691: VAkK_5.42 ekāntākuśalaṃ yasmāt svatantraṃ cobhayaṃ yataḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10699: 310_02 tadyathā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo vicikitsā kāmacchando vyāpāda iti /
SA01vakobhau:10702: 310_03-04 avaro hi bhāgaḥ kāmadhāturetāni ca tasyānuguṇāni /
SA01vakobhau:10708: 310_08-09 tribhiḥ sattvāvaratāṃ nātikrāmati pṛthagjanatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ dhātvavaratāṃ kāmadhātum /
SA01vakobhau:10710: 310_10-12 yadā srota āpannasya paryādāya trisaṃyojanaprahāṇāt ṣaṭkleśāḥ prahīṇāḥ kimarthaṃ tisro dṛṣṭīrapahāya trayamevāha satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ vicikitsāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:10728: 311_04-06 eṣāṃ mokṣagamanāntarāyāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ dyotayan bhagavān kleśatrayasyaiva prahāṇaṃ deśitavān /
SA01vakobhau:10737: 311_12-13 tadyathā rūparāga ārūpyarāga auddhatyaṃ māno 'vidyā ca /
SA01vakobhau:10742: 311_14-15 rāgo bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ dveṣo bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ moho bandhanaṃ sarvaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10752: tatra ye yāvat kleśā upakleśā api te /
SA01vakobhau:10756: 312_08-09 ye 'pyanye kleśebhyaḥ kliṣṭā dharmāḥ saṃskāraskandhasaṃgṛhītāścaitasikāsta upakleśāste punarye kṣudravastuke paṭhitāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10772: 312_19 kaukṛtyaṃ ca vyāpāda vihiṃsāvarjitaḥ sattvāsattvayorāghātaḥ krodhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10785: 313_08 pratighasamutthe ityete ca daśa kleśaniḥṣyandā upakleśāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10791: 313_13-14 cittakauṭilyaṃ śāṭhyaṃ yena yathābhūtaṃ nāviṣkaroti vikṣipatya parisphuṭaṃ vā pratipadyate /
SA01vakobhau:10793: 313_14-15 sāvadyavastudṛḍhagrāhitā pradāśo yena nyāyasaṃjñaptiṃ na gṛhṇāti /
SA01vakobhau:10795: 313_16 viheṭhnaṃ vihiṃsā yena prahārapāruṣyādibhiḥ parān viheṭhyate /
SA01vakobhau:10805: 314_06 ete pañca dharmā dvividhā darśanabhāvanāprahātavyā ubhayaprakārakleśasaṃprayogāt /
SA01vakobhau:10824: 315_03 etau dvau kāmadhātau prathame ca dhyāne /
SA01vakobhau:10827: 315_05-06 sa hi tatra mahābrahmā vitathātmasaṃdarśanatayā āyuṣmantamaśvajitaṃ vañcayituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10837: 315_14-15 darśanaprahātavyāḥ sarve manobhūmikāḥ saha mānasiddhābhyāṃ bhāvanāheyābhyāmapi /
SA01vakobhau:10840: 315_17-18 ye ca kecidupakleśāḥ svatantrāste bhāvanāheyā api santo manobhūmikā eva draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:10847: 316_03-04 yānīmāni sukhādīni pañcendriyāṇi eṣāṃ katamenendriyeṇa katamaḥ kleśa upakleśo vā saṃprayuktaḥ /

SA01vakobhau:11503: 336_15-16 dharmasvāminā hi bhagavatā parityaktasvavṛttikarmāntebhyaḥ śiṣyebhyo mokṣārthamabhyupagatebhyo dvayaṃ prajñaptaṃ vṛttiśca karma ca /
SA01vakobhau:11505: 336_17 anayā vṛttyedaṃ karma kurvāṇā bhavantī na cirānmokṣaṃ prāpsyantīti /
SA01vakobhau:11520: 337_07 tasya tvevaṃ pātrobhūtasya katham tasyāṃ bhāvanāyāmavatāro bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:11526: 337_11 adhiko rāgo vitarkaścaiṣāṃ ta ime adhirāgavitarkāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11534: 337_15-16 tatra punaścaturvidho rāgaḥ varṇarāgaḥ saṃsthānarāgaḥ sparśarāga upacārarāgaśca /
SA01vakobhau:11536: 337_17-19 dvitiyasya vikhāditakavikṣiptālambanāṃ tṛtīyasya vipaṭumnā pūyanibaddhāsthyālambanāṃ caturthasya niśceṣṭamṛtkāyālambanām /
SA01vakobhau:11539: 338_01-02 asthisaṃkaklāyāṃ hi sarvametaccaturvidhaṃ rāgastu nāstīti adhimuktiprādeśikamanaskāratvādaśubhayā na kleśaprahāṇam viṣkambhaṇaṃ tu /
SA01vakobhau:11540: 338_02-03 sa punar ayam aśubhāṃ bhāvayan yogācāras trividha ucyate /
SA01vakobhau:11545: 338_05-06 svāṅgāvayave cittaṃ nibadhnāti pādāṅguṣṭhe lalāṭe yatra cāsyābhiratiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11546: 338_06-07 sa tatra māṃsakledapītā dhimokṣakrameṇāsthiviśodhayan sakalāmasthisaṃkalāṃ paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:11547: 338_07-09 tathaiva ca punardvitīyāmadhimucyate yāvadvihārārāmakṣetrakrameṇa samudraparyantām pṛthivīmasthisaṃkalāṃ pūrṇāmadhimucyate 'dhimokṣābhivardhanārtham /
SA01vakobhau:11552: 338_13-14 sa punaḥ cittasaṃkṣepaviśeṣārtha tasyāmasthiśaṅkalāyāṃ pādāsthīni hitvā śeṣaṃ manasi karoti /
SA01vakobhau:11553: 338_14-15 evaṃ krameṇa yāvat kapālasyārdhaṃ hitvā 'rdhaṃ manasi karoti kṣayakṛtaparijayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11555: 338_17 so 'rdhamapi kapālasya muktvā brūvormadhye cittaṃ dhārayati /
SA01vakobhau:11557: 338_18-19 astyaśubhā ālalmbanaparīttatayā parīttā na vaśitāparīttatayā parītteti catuṣkoṭikam /
SA01vakobhau:11559: 338_21 atha kiṃsvabhāveyamaśubhā katibhūmikā kimālambanā kva cotpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:11562: 338_24-26 alobhasvabhāvā daśabhūmikā sasāmantakadhyānāntareṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣui kāmadhātau ca kāmāvacara dṛṣyālambanā kiṃ poounrdṛśyavastusaṃsthāne /
SA01vakobhau:11582: 339_09-10 pañcasu bhūmisu triṣu sāmantakeṣu dhyānāntare kāmadhātau copekṣāsaṃprayogitvāt /
SA01vakobhau:11585: 339_12-13 ye tu mauleṣvapi dhyāneṣu samāpannasyopekṣāmicchanti neṣāmaṣṭabhūmikā /
SA01vakobhau:11597: 339_19-20 gaṇanayā 'nugamena sthāpanayā upalakṣaṇayā vivarttena pariśūddhacyā ca /
SA01vakobhau:11598: 339_20-22 tatra ca gaṇanā nāma āśvāsapraśvāseṣu cittaṃ dattvā 'nabhisamskāreṇa kāyaṃ cittaṃ cādhyupekṣya smṛtimātreṇa gaṇayatyekaṃ dvau yāvaddaśa /
SA01vakobhau:11607: 340_02-03 kiyaddūramete praviśanti vā niṣkrāmanti vā kimete sarvaśarīravyāopina ekadeśacāriṇa iti /
SA01vakobhau:11609: 340_05 niṣkrāmato vitastivyāmāntaraṃ yāvadvāyumaṇḍalaṃ vairambhāśca vāyava ityapare /
SA01vakobhau:11611: 340_06-07 sthāpanā nāma nāsikāgre yāvat pādanṅguṣṭhe sthitāṃ paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:11613: 340_07-08 kimanugrāhakā ete upadhātakāḥ śītā uṣṇā iti /
SA01vakobhau:11614: 340_08 upalakṣaṇā nāma naite kevalā vāyava eva /
SA01vakobhau:11615: 340_08-10 catvāryetāni mahābhūtāni mahābhūtābhinirvṛttamupādāyarūpaṃ tadāśritāścittacaittā iti pañcaskandhānupalakṣayati /
SA01vakobhau:11616: 340_10-11 vivarto nāma vāyvālambanāṃ vṛddhiṃ vivarttyottareṣu kuśalamūleṣu saṃniyojanaṃ yāvadagradharmeṣu /
SA01vakobhau:11628: 340_19-20 yadi hi kāyaḥ śuṣiro bhavati āśvāsapraśvāsabhūmikaṃ ca cittaṃ saṃmukhībhūtamevaṃ te varttante /
SA01vakobhau:11629: 340_20-21 jāyamānasya caturthadhyānādvyuttiṣṭhamānasya ca praviśanti bhiyamāṇasya caturthaṃ ca dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānasya niṣkrāmanti /
SA01vakobhau:11639: VAkK_6.13 nādhareṇa lakṣayete manasā ca tau //
SA01vakobhau:11651: 341_12-13 sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tu anityatā saṃskṛtānāṃ duḥkhatā sāsravāṇāṃ śunyatā 'nātmate sarvadharmāṇām /
SA01vakobhau:11654: 341_14-15 sāmāhitasya kila kāyaṃ paramāṇuśaḥ kṣaṇikataśca paśyataḥ kāyasmṛtyupasthāṇaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:11681: 342_12-13 tadyathā hyuktamāyuṣmatā aniruddhena "tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharataḥ kāyālalmbanānusmṛtistiṣṭhati saṃtiṣṭhata" iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11682: 342_13-14 bhagāvatā 'pi coktaṃ "tasya kāye kāyānupaśiyano viharata upasthitā smṛtirbhavatyasaṃmūḍhe"ti /
SA01vakobhau:11683: 342_14-15 yatra tūktaṃ "kathaṃ bhikṣavaścaturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ samudayaśca bhavatyastaṅgamaśca /
SA01vakobhau:11686: 342_17-18 yathālambanaṃ caiṣāṃ nāma svaparobhayasaṃtatyālambanatvāt pratyekameṣāṃ traividhyam /
SA01vakobhau:11691: 342_22-23 yato vā kāmarāgasya kāyo 'dhaṣṭhānaṃ sa ca vedanā 'bhilāṣātsa ca cittasyādāntatvāt tatkleśāprahāṇāditi vaibhāṣikāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11693: 343_01-03 śucisukhanityātmaviparyāsanāṃ caturṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa catvāri smṛtyupasthā nānyuktāni yathākramaṃ nādhikanyūnāni evaṃ ca trīṇyasaṃbhinnālambanāni caturthamubhayathā /
SA01vakobhau:11695: 343_03-04 atha kāyādīnāṃ dve trīṇi catvāri vā samastāni paśyati saṃbhinnālambanam /
SA01vakobhau:11699: 343_08-09 saṃbhinnalambane dharmasmṛtyupasthāne sthitastān kāyādīn sarvānabhisamasya caturbhirākāraiḥ paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:11710: 343_17-18 nirodhaṃ caturbhiḥ nirodhataḥ śāntataḥ praṇītato niḥsaraṇataśca /
SA01vakobhau:11730: 344_12 yathā mūrdhāna uktāḥ evaṃ mṛdumadhye kṣāntī tathaivākaraṇāt /
SA01vakobhau:11739_1: dukhaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣaṇābhyāṃ manasi karotyeṣā sarvaiva madhyā kṣāntiryadaikameva kṣaṇaṃ tadadhimātreti /
SA01vakobhau:11744: 345_04-05 te 'pi hi kāmāvacaraduḥkhālambanāḥ kṣaṇikāśca laukikāścaite 'grāśca dharmāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11747: 345_06-07 ta eta ūṣmagatādayaḥ smṛtyupasthānasvabhāvatvāt prajñātmakā ucyante /
SA01vakobhau:11753: 345_12-13 tatra trisatyālambanoṣmagatākaraṇe dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratyutpannamanāgatāni catvāri bhāvyante /
SA01vakobhau:11759: 345_16-17 mūrdhākaraṇe catuḥsatyālambane 'pi nirodhālambanavardhane cāntyamanāgatāni catvāri ākārāḥ sarve /
SA01vakobhau:11766: 346_01-02 ityetāni catvāri nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāni yadutoṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaḥ kṣāntayo 'gradharmāśca /
SA01vakobhau:11767: 346_02-03 eṣāṃ dve mṛdūnī calatvāt parihāṇitaḥ kṣāntayo madhyamagradharmā adhimātram /
SA01vakobhau:11770: 346_03-05 niścito vedhā nirvedhaḥ āryamārgastena vicikitsā prahāṇāt satyānāṃ ca vibhajanādidaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ yāvat mārga iti /
SA01vakobhau:11777: 346_10 anāgamyaṃ dhyānāntaraṃ catvāri ca dhyānānyasya bhūmistatsaṃgṛhītatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:11786: 346_15-16 bhadantaghoṣakasya tu dve prathame nirvedhabhāgīye saptabhūmike kāmāvacare api taḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11800: 347_04-05 yadbhūmikānyanena pratilabdhānibhavanti tāṃ bhūmi tyajannāryastānyapi tyajati nānyathā bhūmityāgaḥ punarbhūmisaṃcārāt /
SA01vakobhau:11808: 347_12-13 yo mauladhyānabhūmikāni nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayati satatraiva janmāti satyānyavaśyaṃ paśyati /
SA01vakobhau:11811: 347_15 yadā vihineṣu punarlābhobhavatyapūrvāṇyeva tadā labhyante na pūrvaṃ tyaktāni /
SA01vakobhau:11835: 348_12 ūṣmagataṃ mūrdhānaṃ ca śrāvakagotrādutpannaṃ vyāvartya punarbuddhaḥ syādityasti saṃbhavaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11843: 348_17-18 trīṇyapi nirvedhabhāgīyāni śrāvakagotrādvacyāvartya buddhādibhavaḥ syāt pratyekabuddha ityarthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11851: 349_03 kiṃ punaḥ prathama eva janmani kṛtaprayogo nirvedhabhāgīyānyutpādayet /
SA01vakobhau:11904: 350_13 tataḥ punarduḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteranantaramatraia kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānamutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:11907: 350_14-15 yathā ca kāmāvacare duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirdharmajñānaṃ cotpadyate
SA01vakobhau:11932: 351_14-15 duḥkhe hi dṛśyamāne tasya trividho 'bhisamayaḥ samudayādīnāṃ kāryābhisamayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11937: 351_18 na tarhi satyānāṃ duḥkhādito darśanaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:11939_0: 351_18-21 "ihāryaśravakasya duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasi kūrvataḥ samudayaṃ vā samudayato
SA01vakobhau:11939_1: yāvat mārga vā mārgato manasi kurvato 'nāsraveṇa manasikāreṇa saṃprayukto yo dharmāṇo pravicaya" iti /
SA01vakobhau:11943: 352_01 athāpyekasya darśanāccheṣeṣu va4itvalābhādekābhisamayaṃ brūyānna doṣaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:11944: 352_01-02 antarā tu vyutthānamasti nāstīti vicāryaṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:11945: 352_02-03 atha punarbrūyāt duḥkhameva parijānansamudayaṃ prajahāti nirodhaṃ sākṣāt karoti mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA01vakobhau:11947: 352_04 evamapi na doṣaḥ syādekasya darśane śeṣāṇāṃ kāryābhisamayavacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:11948: 352_04-05 darśanābhisamayaṃ tu prati sūtre satyānāṃ krameṇābhisamaya ukto lakṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:11949: 352_05-07 "nahaiva gṛhapate satyānāmekābhisamayo 'pi pūrvābhisayaya" iti vistareṇa sadṛṣṭāntāni trīṇi sūtrāṇi /
SA01vakobhau:11950: 352_07-08 "yo duḥkhe niṣkāṅkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe 'pi sa" iti sūtrādekābhisamaya iti cet /
SA01vakobhau:11957: 352_12 kasmāt punaḥ kṣāntayo jñānāni cavaśyaṃ bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:11965: 352_17-18 yadi punardvitīyenānantaryamārgeṇaiva saha visaṃyogaprāptirutpadyeta kiṃ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:11967: 352_18-19 kṣāntibhiḥ kleśaprahāṇānnava saṃyojananikāyā jñānavadhyā iti śāstravirodha iti cet /
SA01vakobhau:11975: 353_01-02 duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntimārabhya yāvat mārge 'nvayajñāna kṣāntirete pañcadaśa kṣāṇā darśanamārgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11991: 353_09-10 na hi sarvaṃ satyadarśanaṃ samāptamiti tadantarālatvāttanyappi darśanamārgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:11994: 353_12-13 ya ete darśanamārgasvabhāvāḥ pañcādaśa kṣaṇa uktā veditavyau
SA01vakobhau:12006: 353_20 phalānāmādyaṃ srota āpattiphalaṃ sarvaphalaprāptau tasya prathamatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:12007: 353_20-22 tāveva śraddhādharmānusāriṇau yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇāprahīṇabhāvanāheyau bhavataḥ sakalavandhanau to srota āpattiphalapratipannakāvucyete /
SA01vakobhau:12009: 353_24-25 yadi pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kāmāvacarāṇaṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ yāvat pañca prakārāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:12013: 354_02-03 yadi tayostasmāt pareṇa ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau vā prakārāḥ pūrvaprahīṇā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:12018: 354_06-07 yadi punarnavamasyāpi prakārasya prahāṇāt kāmadhātorvītarāgau bhavata ūrdhvaṃ vā yāvadākiñcanyāyatanāt tau tṛtīya pratīpannakāvucyete /
SA01vakobhau:12021: 354_09 ṣoḍaśe tu phalasthau tau yatra yaḥ pratipannakaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12022: 354_10 ṣoḍaśe tu citta utpanne tau na punaḥ śraddhādharmānusāriṇāvucyete /
SA01vakobhau:12026: 354_11-12 yatra phale yaḥ pratipannako bhūtaḥ sa tadānīṃ tatra phalasthito bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:12027: 354_12 srota āpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā /
SA01vakobhau:12032: 354_16 tasminkāle yo mṛdvindriyaḥ śraddhānusāripūrvī sa śraddhādhimukta ityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:12035: 354_18-19 kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ prahīṇapañcaprakāro 'pi ṣoḍaśe citte srota āpanna evocyate na sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12037: VAkK_6.32 phale phalaviśiṣṭasya lābho mārgasya nāstyanaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12039: 354_23 phale hi labhyamāne phalaviśiṣṭo mārgo na labhyata ityeṣa niyamaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12040: 354_23-24 ataḥ phalastho yāvanna viśeṣāya prayujyate phalāntaraprāptau tāvat pratipannako nocyate /
SA01vakobhau:12042: 354_25-01 yastu tṛtīyadhyānavītarāgo 'dharāṃ bhūmi niśritya niyāmamavakrāmati so 'vaśyaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ mārga saṃmukhīkaroti /
SA01vakobhau:12043: 355_01-02 anyathā hi sa tasmādūrdhvopapannaḥ sukhendriyeṇāsamanvāgataḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:12047: 355_04-05 yathaite kāmadhātau navaprakārāḥ kleśā upadiṣṭā evaṃ
SA01vakobhau:12052: 355_09 tatpratipakṣā apyānantaryavimuktimārgākhyā guṇā bhūmau bhūmau navaprakārā eva /
SA01vakobhau:12056: 355_12-13 teṣāṃ punaḥ pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātratvena trividhatvāt nava vyavasthāpyante /
SA01vakobhau:12057: 355_13-15 tadyathā mṛdumṛduḥ prakāro mṛdumadhyo mṛdvadhimātro madhyamṛdurmadhyamadhyo madhyādhimātro 'dhimātramṛduradhimātramadhyo 'dhimātrādhimātraśceti /
SA01vakobhau:12060: 355_16-18 ādita evādhimātramārgasaṃbhavādutpannādhimātramārgasya cādhimātrakleśāsaṃbhavāt audāriko hi malaścelātpūrvaṃ nirdūyate paścāt sūkṣmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12061: 355_18-19 audārikaṃ ca tamaḥ sūkṣmeṇālokena hanyate sūkṣmaṃ cādhimātreṇetyeṣa dṛṣṭāntayogaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12062: 355_19 śuklā hi dharmā valavanto durbalāstu kṛṣṇāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12067: 356_01 yasya hi phalasthasyaiko 'pi bhāvanāheyaḥ prakāro 'prahīṇaḥ sa srota āpanaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12075: 356_04-05 tadasāvāpanna āgataḥ prāpta iti srota āpannaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12081: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sa eva nāṣṭamakaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12088: 356_12-13 yattarhhi sūtra uktaṃ "asthānamanavakāśo yaddaṣṭisaṃpannaḥ pudgalo 'ṣṭamaṃ bhavamabhinirvartayiṣyati /
SA01vakobhau:12091: 356_13-15 yathārutaṃ vā kalpyamāne 'ntarābhavo 'pi na syāt evamapyūredhvasrotaso bhavāgraparamasyaikasyāṃ gatāvaṣṭama upapattibhāvo na prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:12094: 356_16-17 iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakaṃ pratyekaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu saptakṛtvo na pounarubhayeṣveva saptakṛtva iti /
SA01vakobhau:12100: 356_19-20 yaśca manuṣyesu srota āpanno bhavati sa tānevāgamya parinirvāti /
SA01vakobhau:12128: yathākāśaṃ kuru maṇḍapaṃ pātayeti bhavanti vaktāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12129: 357_08 anyo 'pi ca syātsaptakṛtvaḥ paramo na tu niyata iti nocyate /
SA01vakobhau:12130: 357_08-09 evaṃ tāvadakṣīṇabhāvanāheyaḥ phalasthaḥ saptakṛtvaḥ paramo bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:12136: 357_13-14 śloke tu dvayorgrahaṇaṃ srota āpannasya paścātprahīṇe sati tatpratipakṣānāsravendriyasyānuktasiddhatvāt /
SA01vakobhau:12141: 357_16-17 tatprahāṇe ṣaṣṭhasyāvaśyaṃ prahāṇāt nahi tasyaikaḥ prakāraḥ phalaṃ vighnayituṃ samarthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12144: 357_18-19 devakulaṅkulo yo deveṣa dve trīṇi vā kulāni saṃśritya parinirvāti tatra vā 'nyatra vā devanikāye /
SA01vakobhau:12145: 357_19-20 manuṣyakulaṅkulo yo manuṣyeṣu tatra vā 'nyatra va dvīpe parinirvāti /
SA01vakobhau:12148: 357_22-23 yasya phalasthasyaikaprakāroyāvatpañcamaḥ prahīṇo bhavati asau dvitīyaphalapratipannako veditavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:12164: 358_09 avasthātraye hi karmāṇi vidhnāyopatiṣṭhanta" ityuktaṃ prāk /
