SA01vakobhau:15106: balakālaṃ malānāṃ ca na pramādyaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ //
SA01vakobhau:15120: 461_05-06 kathaṃ punaridaṃ gamyate skandhasaṃtāna evedamātmābhidhānaṃ vartate nānyasminnabhidheya iti /
SA01vakobhau:15122: 461_06-07 ye hi dharmāḥ santi teṣāṃ pratyakṣamupalabdhirbhavatyasatyantarāye /
SA01vakobhau:15127: 461_08-09 sati kāraṇe kāraṇāntarasyābhāve kāryasyābhāvo dṛṣṭo bhāve ca punarbhāvistadyathāṅkurasya /
SA01vakobhau:15128: 461_09-11 satyeva cābhāsaprāpte viṣaye manaskāre ca kāraṇe viṣayagrahaṇasyābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ punaśca bhāvo 'ndhavadhirādīnāmanandhāvadhirādīnāṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:15135: 461_15 kiṃ cedaṃ dravyata iti kiṃ vā prajñaptitaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15151: 461_22-23 yadyayamarhtaḥ skandhānāṃ lakṣyate teṣveva pudgalaprajñaptiḥ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:15159: 462_01-02 na hi vinendhanenāgniḥ prajñapyate na cānya indhanādagniḥ śakyate prajñapayituṃ nāpyananyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15162: 462_03 evaṃ na ca vinā skanvaiḥ pudgalaḥ prajñapyate /
SA01vakobhau:15163: 462_03-04 na cānyaḥ skandhebhyaḥ śakyate pratijñātuṃ śāśvataprasaṅgāt /
SA01vakobhau:15168: 462_07 etadevātra vaktavyaṃ kiṃ dāhyaṃ kok dāhaka iti /
SA01vakobhau:15169: 462_07-08 loke hi tāvadapradīptaṃ kāṣṭḥādikamindhanamucyate dāhyaṃ ca /
SA01vakobhau:15171: 462_08-09 yacca bhasvaraṃ coṣṇaṃ ca bhṛśaṃ ca tena hi tadidhyate dhyate ca /
SA01vakobhau:15174: 462_10-11 yathā kṣīraṃ pratītya dadhi madhu pratītyaśuktam /
SA01vakobhau:15177: 462_11-12 yadi caiyaṃ pudgalaḥ skandhān pratītyotpadyate sa tebhyo 'nyaścānityaśca prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:15178: 462_12-14 atha punastatraiva kāṣṭhādau pradīpte yadīṣṇyaṃ tadagnistatsahajātāni trīṇi bhūtānīndhanamiṣyante /
SA01vakobhau:15182: 462_16 na hi tattasya kāraṇaṃ nāpi tat prajñapteḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15185: 462_17-18 skandhā apyevaṃ pudgalasyāśrayasahabhūtāḥ prāpnuvantīti vispaṣṭamanyatvaṃ pratijñāyate /
SA01vakobhau:15194: 462_23-24 atha punaḥ sarvameva tat pradīptaṃ kāṣṭhādikamindhanaṃ cāgniśceṣyate /
SA01vakobhau:15196: skandhā eva ca pudgalā ityananyatvamanivāryaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:15198: 462_26-01 yathendhanamupādāyāgniḥ prajñapyate evaṃ skadhānupādāya pudgalaḥ iti /
SA01vakobhau:15199: 463_01-02 yadi cāyamanyaḥ skandhebhyo na vaktavyaḥ "pañcavidhaṃ jñeyamatītānāgataṃ pratyupannamasaṃskṛtamavaktavyami"ti na vaktavyaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:15200: 463_02-03 naiva hi tadatītādibhyaḥ pañcamaṃ nāpañcamaṃ vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:15201: 463_03-04 yadā ca pudgalaḥ prajñapyate ki tāvatskandhānupalabhya prajñapyate āhosvit pudgalam /
SA01vakobhau:15205: 463_06 pudgala eva hi tasyā upādānaṃ prāpnoti /
SA01vakobhau:15206: 463_06-07 atha mataṃ satsu skandheṣu pudgala upalabhyate tataḥ skandhānupādāyāsya prajñaptirucyata iti /
SA01vakobhau:15207: 463_07-08 tadevaṃ rūpasyāpi cakṣurmanaskārālokeṣu satsūpalambhāt tānupādāya prajñaptirbaktavyā /
SA01vakobhau:15213: 463_11-13 cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītyapudgalaṃ pratibhāvayati cakṣurvijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyaḥ no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vāno vā /
SA01vakobhau:15214: 463_13-14 evaṃ yāvat manovijñeyān ceddharmān pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayati manovijñeyaḥ pudgalo vaktavyo no tu vaktavyo dharmā vā no vā /
SA01vakobhau:15216: 463_15-17 cakṣurvijñeyāni cedrūpāṇi pratītya kṣīraṃ vibhāvayatyudakaṃ vā cakṣurvijñeyaṃ kṣīramudakaṃ ceti vaktavyaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no vā /
SA01vakobhau:15217: 463_17 evaṃ ghrāṇajihvākāyavijñeyaṃ vaktavyaṃ no tu vaktavyaṃ spraṣṭavyāni vā no vā /
SA01vakobhau:15219: 463_18-19 ato yathā rūpādīnyeva kṣīramudakaṃ vā prajñapyate samastānyevaṃ skandhāḥ pudgala iti siddham /
SA01vakobhau:15220: 463_20 yaccocyate cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi pratītya pudgalaṃ prativibhāvayatīti /
SA01vakobhau:15222: 463_21-22 kiṃ tāvadrūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavatiti āhosvidrūpāṇyupalabhamānaḥ pudgalamupalabhata iti /
SA01vakobhau:15223: 463_22-23 yadi rūpāṇi pudgalopalabdheḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavanti sa ca tebhyo 'nyo na vaktavyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15229: 463_26-27 rūpādabhinnasvabhāvaḥ pudgalaḥ prāpnoti rūpa eva vā tatprajñāptiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15230: 463_27 idaṃ ca rūpamayaṃ pudgalaḥ kathamidaṃ gamyate /
SA01vakobhau:15240: 464_05-06 yadi cāyamasti no tu vaktavyo rūpāṇi vā to vā /
SA01vakobhau:15243: 464_08-09 kiṃ tadrūpāṇi pratītyotpadyate āhosvit pudgalamubhayaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:15246: 464_10-11 yameva hi viṣayaṃ cakṣurvijñāneṣu pratītyotpadyate vijñānaṃ sa eva tasyālambanapratyayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15249: 464_12-13 sūtre hi nirdhāritaṃ dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpādo bhavatīti /
SA01vakobhau:15252: 464_14 yatkiñcit bhikṣo cakṣurvijñānaṃ sarvaṃ taccakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ceti /
SA01vakobhau:15254: 464_15-16 "ye hi hetayo ye pratyayā vijñānasyotpādāya te 'pyanityā" iti sūtre vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:15255: 464_16-17 atha pudgalo na tasyālambanaṃ na tarhi tena vijñeyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15261: 464_20-22 "yānīmāni brāhmaṇa pañcendriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣyaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:15263: 464_22-23 tadyathā cakṣurindriyaṃ śrotrendriyaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ jihvendriyaṃ kāyendriyam /
SA01vakobhau:15264: 464_23-24 mana eṣaṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ gocaraviṣayaṃ pratyanubhavati manaścaiṣāṃ pratisaraṇami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:15268: 464_26-27 ṣaḍimānīndriyāṇi nānāgocarāṇi nānāviṣayāṇi svaṃ svaṃ gocaraviṣayamākāṅkṣantī tyuktaṃ ṣaṭprāṇakopame /
SA01vakobhau:15272: 465_02-03 yacca tatkevalaṃ mana ādhipatyādhyākṛtaṃ manovijñānaṃ naivaṃ tadanyeṣāṃ viṣayamākāṅkṣatyato nāstyeṣa doṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15273_0: 465_03-06 uktaṃ ca bhagavatā "sarvābhijñeyaṃ vo bhikṣavo dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayiṣyāmī"tyuktvā
SA01vakobhau:15273_2: veditaṃ suḥkhaṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhaṃ vā yāvat manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayam /
SA01vakobhau:15275: 465_07 ata etāvadevābhijñeyaṃ pratijñeyaṃ cetyavardhāryate na pudgalaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15278: 465_08-09 cakṣuṣa ca pudgalaṃ paśyām iti paśyanta paudgalikā anātmanā ātmānaṃ paśyāma iti dṛṣṭisthānamāpannā bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:15281_0: 465_11-13 "cakṣuḥpratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ
SA01vakobhau:15281_1: sparśasahajātā vedanā saṃjñā cetanā itīme catvāro rupiṇaḥ skandhāśvakṣurindriyaṃ
SA01vakobhau:15282: 465_13-14 atreyaṃ saṃjñā sattvo naro manuṣyo mānavaśca poṣaḥ puruṣaḥ pudgalo jīvo janturiti /
SA01vakobhau:15283: 465_14-15 atreyaṃ pratijñā ahaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyāmīti /
SA01vakobhau:15284: 465_15-16 atrāyaṃ vyavahāra ityapi sa āyuṣmānevaṃnāmā evañjātya evaṅgotra evamāhāra evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evandīrghāyurevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyanta iti /
SA01vakobhau:15286: 465_17-18 sarva ime dharmāḥ anityāḥ saṃskṛtāśceti tāḥ pratītyasamutpannā iti /
SA01vakobhau:15290: 465_20 yadi cāyaṃ pudgalo nāyatanaṃ na sostīti siddham /
SA01vakobhau:15292: 465_21-22 teṣāmapi caivaṃ paśyato "yāvatā bhikṣo cakṣuryāvatā rūpāṇi vistareṇa etāvatā bhikṣo tathāgataḥ sarvaṃ ca prajñāpayati sarvaprajñaptiṃ ce"ti /
SA01vakobhau:15293: 465_22-25 bimbisārasūtre coktam "ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatito na tvātrā tmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā duḥkhamidamutpadya mānamutpadyate" iti vistaraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15295: 466_01-04 "manyase ki nu sattveti māradṛṣṭigataṃ hi te /
SA01vakobhau:15298: evaṃ skandhānupādāya saṃvṛtyā sattva ucyate" // iti /
SA01vakobhau:15301: yathā saṃkliśyate cittaṃ yathā cittaṃ viśudhyati //
SA01vakobhau:15303: nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmāstvete sahetukāḥ //
SA01vakobhau:15307: na labhyate so 'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatāmi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:15312: 466_15-16 śūnyatāyāmasya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate na vimucyate /
SA01vakobhau:15314: 466_17 na vaita evaṃ grandhaṃ pramāṇaṃ kurvanti /
SA01vakobhau:15318: 466_19 yadi nikāya eva pramāṇaṃ na tarhi teṣāṃ budhaḥ śāstā /
SA01vakobhau:15327: 466_22-24 yo hi granthaḥ sarveṣu nikāyāntareṣvāmnāyate na ca sūtraṃ dharmatāṃ vā bādhate so 'smābhirapāṭhānna buddhavacanamiti vacanaṃ kevalaṃ sāhasamātram /
SA01vakobhau:15328: 466_24 kiṃ cedamapi teṣāṃ sūtraṃ nāsti "sarvadharmā anātāna" iti /
SA01vakobhau:15330: naiva hi pudgalo dharma ucyate nāpyanyo dharmāditi /
SA01vakobhau:15333: 467_02-03 iha caivaṃ vikalpyate "anātmanyāteti saṃjñāviparyāsa ścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsa" iti /
SA01vakobhau:15334: 467_04 anātmanyātmeti viparyāso na tvātmani kiṃ ca punaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15335: 467_04-05 "nātmā skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ" yattāvaduktaṃ prāk "no tu vaktavyaṃ rūpāṇi vā no ve"ti tattāvadaśocam /
SA01vakobhau:15336: 467_05-07 uktaṃ ca sūtrāntare "ye kecit bhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti sarve ta imāneva pañcopādānaskandhāni"ti /
SA01vakobhau:15338: 467_08-10 tathoktaṃ "ye kecidanekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmarantaḥ samanusmārṣuḥ samanusmaranti samanusmariṣyanti vā punaḥ sarve ta imāneva opañcopādanaskandhāni"ti /
SA01vakobhau:15341: 467_11-12 yadi tu rūpavantaṃ pudgalaṃ paśyetsatkāyadṛṣṭiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:15344: 467_14 yadyevaṃ tarhi na buddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ prapnoti /
SA01vakobhau:15345: 467_14-15 na hi kiñcictrittamasti caittā vā yatsarvaṃ jānīyāt /
SA01vakobhau:15348: 467_15-16 evaṃ tarhi cittavināśe pudgalasyāvināśābhyupagamāt nityatvamasyābhyupetaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:15349: 467_16-17 naiva ca vayaṃ sarvatra jñānasaṃmukhībhāvād buddhaṃ sarvajñamācakṣmahe /
SA01vakobhau:15352: 467_17-19 yā hyasau buddhākhyā saṃtatistasyā idamasti sāmarthyaṃ yadābhogamātreṇāviparītaṃ jñānamutpadyate yatreṣṭam /
SA01vakobhau:15358: 467_23-24 "ye cābhyatītāḥ saṃbuddhā ye ca buddhā anāgatāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15359: yaśca etarhhi saṃbuddho bahūnāṃ śokanāśana" iti /
SA01vakobhau:15360: 468_01 skandhā eva ca traiyadhvikā iṣyante na pudgalā yuṣmābhiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15362: 468_02-03 "bhāraṃ ca vo bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi bhārādānaṃ ca bhāranikṣepaṇaṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ce"ti /
SA01vakobhau:15364: 468_03-04 na hi bhāra eva bhārahāro yuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15372: 468_06-07 "yo 'sāvāyupmānevaṃnāmā yāvadevañcirasthitika evamāyuḥparyantaḥ" sa eṣa yathā vijñāyeta /
SA01vakobhau:15373: 468_07-08 mānyathā vijñāyi nityo vā avaktavyaṃ veti /
SA01vakobhau:15374: 468_08-09 skandhā eva ca skandhānāmupadhātāya saṃvartante pūrvakā uttareṣāmiti bhāraṃ ca bhārahāraṃ ca kṛtvoktāḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15376: 468_10 asty eva pudgalo yasmād uktaṃ "nāsti sattva upapāduka iti mithyādṛṣṭiḥ" /
SA01vakobhau:15377: 468_11 kaścaivam āha nāsti sattva upapāduka iti /
SA01vakobhau:15378: 468_11-12 sattvastu yathā 'sti tathā vibhakto bhagavateti brūmo mānuṣyakasūtre /
SA01vakobhau:15379: 468_12-13 tasmād yaḥ paratropapādukasattvākhyaskandhasaṃtānāpavādaṃ karoti tasyaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭir nāsti sattva upapāduka iti /
SA01vakobhau:15381: 468_14-15 athaiṣā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ pudgalāpavādikā satī kiṃprahātavyā bhavet /
SA01vakobhau:15384: 468_16 "ekaḥ pudgalo loka utpadyamāna utpadyate" iti vacanāt na skandhā iti cet /
SA01vakobhau:15387: 468_18 saṃskṛta iti vā pudgalo vaktavya utpatīmattvābhyupagamāt /
SA01vakobhau:15388: 468_18-19 na sa evamutpadyate yathā skandhā apūrvaprādurbhāvāt /
SA01vakobhau:15391: 468_19-20 yathā yājñiko jāto vaiyākaraṇo jāta ityucyate vidyopādānāt /
SA01vakobhau:15394: 468_22 na pratikṣepāt sūtra eva hi pratikṣiptaṃ bhagavatā paramārthaśūnyatāyām /
SA01vakobhau:15396: 468_23-24 ya imāṃśca skandhānnikṣipati anyāṃśca skandhān pratisaṃdadhātyanyatra dharmasaṃketāditi /
SA01vakobhau:15397: 468_24-25 phalgusūtre coktam "upādatta iti phalgu na vadāmīti /
SA01vakobhau:15399: 468_26-01 kaṃ ca tāvadbhavānyājñikaṃ yāvadvacyā dhita madhimucyate /
SA01vakobhau:15411: 469_05-06 yadi ca skandhānāmapūrvotpādo na pudgalasyeṣyate so 'nyaśca tebhyo nityaśca sphuṭaṃ dīpito bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:15412: 469_06 pañca skandhā ekaḥ pudgala iti brūvatā kathamanyatvaṃ nocyate /
SA01vakobhau:15413: 469_07 kathaṃ tāvat bhūtāni catvāri rūpaṃ tvekaṃ na ca bhūtebhyyo 'nyadrūpam /
SA01vakobhau:15417: 469_08-09 tathāpi tu yathā bhūtamātraṃ rūpamevaṃ skandhamātraṃ pudgala ityabhyupetaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:15418: 469_09-10 yadi skandhamātraṃ pudgalaḥ kasmāt bhagavatā sa jīvastaccharīrakanyo veti navyākṛtam /
SA01vakobhau:15421: 469_11-12 sa ca kasmiścinnāstīti kathamasyānyatvamananyatvaṃ vā vyākriyatām /
SA01vakobhau:15426: 469_15 yadi yadeva pṛccheyaṃ tadeva vyākuryā iti /
SA01vakobhau:15431: nanu bhadantaḥ pūrvameva pratijñāṃ kārito nā 'nyadvacyākartavyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:15434: 469_18-19 ahamapi mahārājaṃ pṛccheyaṃ bahuvollakāśca rājāno bhavanti /
SA01vakobhau:15435: 469_19 yadi yadeva pṛccheyaṃ tadeva vyākuryā iti /
SA01vakobhau:15437: 469_20-21 yaste 'ntaḥpure ābhravṛkṣastasya kimamlāni phalāni āhosvit madhurāṇīti /
SA01vakobhau:15439: 469_21-22 nanu mayā pūrvameva mahārājaḥ pratijñāṃ kārito nānyadvacyākartavyamiti /
SA01vakobhau:15441: 469_23 sa āha kathamasato vṛkṣasya phalānāmamlatāṃ madhuratāṃ vā vyākaromīti /
SA01vakobhau:15442: 469_23-24 evameva mahārāja sa eva jīvo nāsti kuto 'sya śarīrādanyatāmananyatāṃ vā vyākaromīti /
SA01vakobhau:15445: 469_25-27 sa hi yasyāpi skandhasaṃtānasya jīva ityākhyā tasyāpyabhāvaṃ pratīyāditi mithyādṛṣṭiṃ pātitaḥ syāt /
SA01vakobhau:15449: 470_01-03 yat bhagavatoktam "astyātmetyānanda vatsasagotrāya parivrājakāya praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ nanvakalpaṃ syādvacanāya sarvadharmā anātmāna iti /
SA01vakobhau:15450_0: 470_03-05 nāstyātmetyānanda vatsasagotrāya parivrājakāya praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ
SA01vakobhau:15450_1: nanu vatsasagotraḥ parivrājakaḥ pūrvameva saṃmūḍho bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃmohamāpadyeta
SA01vakobhau:15450_2: abhūt me ātmāsa me etarhi nāstīti /
SA01vakobhau:15462: jīvākhyā tatra sā na syāt jīvanāstitvadeśanāt //
SA01vakobhau:15464: abhavyaḥ śūnyatāṃ boddhuṃ tadānīṃ tādṛśo janaḥ //
SA01vakobhau:15465: 470_17-18 tathā hyātmāsti nāstīti pṛṣṭo vāstyeva nāvadat /
SA01vakobhau:15466: āśayāpekṣāyā praṣṭuḥ sati tvastīti nāha kim //
SA01vakobhau:15468: 470_19-20 yadi hi tāvadātmā loka iṣṭaḥ syāttasyābhāvādayuktaṃ caturdhā vyākaraṇam /
SA01vakobhau:15470: 471_01 śāśvate loke na kasyacit parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /
SA01vakobhau:15471: śāśvate loke na kasyacit parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt /
SA01vakobhau:15473: 471_02-03 ubhayathātve niyamata ekeṣāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ prāpnuyāt ekeṣāṃ na /
SA01vakobhau:15475: 471_04-05 ato mārgadhīnatvāt parinirvāṇasya caturdhāpi niyamo na vyākriyate nirgrantha4rāvakacaṭakavat /
SA01vakobhau:15478: 471_06-07 tathāhi muktikaḥ parivrājaka eva catuṣkaṃ pṛṣṭvā punaḥ pṛṣṭavān kiṃ nu sarvo loko 'nena mārgeṇa niryātyāhosvidekadeśo lokasye"ti /
SA01vakobhau:15479: 471_07-09 sthavira ānanda āha "yameva tvaṃ muktika tatprathamato bhagavantaṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭavāṃstame vaitarhi pṛcchasyanena paryāyeṇe"ti sarvam /
SA01vakobhau:15480: 471_09-10 bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maranādityapi catuṣkaḥ praṣṭurāśayāpekṣayā na vyākṛtaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15481: 471_10 sa hi muktvāmānaṃ tathāgataṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭavān /
SA01vakobhau:15482: 471_11-12 paudgalikastu paryanuyojyaḥ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavān jīvantaṃ pudgalamastīti vyākaroti paraṃ maraṇānna vyākarotīti /
SA01vakobhau:15484: 471_13-14 idaṃ tarhi kasmādvacyākaroti "bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ maitreyānāgate 'dhvani tathāgato 'rhan saṃyaksaṃbuddha" iti /
SA01vakobhau:15487: 471_15-17 yadi ca bhagavān pūrvaṃ pudgalaṃ dṛṣṭvā parinirvṛtaṃ punaḥ na paśyatyajñānānna vyakarotīti sarvajñatvaṃ śāsturutpāditaṃ bhavati na vā so 'stītyabhyupagantavyam /
SA01vakobhau:15489: 471_18 arthatadapi na vaktavyaṃ paśyati vā naveti /
SA01vakobhau:15490: 471_18-19 evaṃ tarhi idamapi śanaiḥ śanairavaktavyaṃ kriyatāṃ sarvajño vā na vā bhagavānna veti /
SA01vakobhau:15491: 471_19-20 astyeva pudgalo yasmātsatyataḥ sthitito nāsti me ātmeti dṛṣṭisthānamuktam /
SA01vakobhau:15496: 471_22-23 "astyātmetyānanda śāśvatāya paraiti nāstyātmetyānandocchedāya paraitī"ti vātsyasūtre vacanāt /
SA01vakobhau:15497: 471_24 yadi tarhi pudgalo nāsti ka eṣa saṃsarati /
SA01vakobhau:15499: 471_25-01 uktaṃ ca bhagavatā "avidyānivaraṇānāṃ sattvanāṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ saṃsaratāmi"ti /
SA01vakobhau:15503: 472_02-03 yathātu kṣaṇiko 'gniḥ saṃtatyā saṃsaratītyucyate tathā sattvākhyaḥ skndhasamudāyastṛṣṇopādānaḥ saṃsaratītyucyate /
SA01vakobhau:15504: 472_03-05 yadi skandhāmātramidaṃ kasmādāha bhagavān "grahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena sunetro nāma śāstā 'bhūvami"ti /
SA01vakobhau:15512: 472_07-08 yadi cātmā bhavettthāgatā eva suvyaktaṃ paśyeyuḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15514: 472_08-09 "ātmani ca satyātmīyaṃ bhavatī"ti sūtre vacanādātmagrāho 'pyeṣāṃ skandheṣvadhikaṃ pravarteta /
SA01vakobhau:15518: 472_11-12 atha mataṃ naivātmani pravartate sneha iti /
SA01vakobhau:15519: 472_12-13 tat ka idānīmeṣa yogo yadanātmanyātmadhimokṣāt sneha utpadyate ātmanyeva tu notpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:15520: 472_13-14 tasmāt dṛṣṭacyarvudametasmin śāsane utpannaṃ ya eṣa ekeṣāṃ pudgalagrāha ekeṣāṃ sarvanāstitāgrāhaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15521: 472_14-15 ye 'pi ca dravyāntaramevātmānaṃ manyante tīrthakārāstepāmeva mokṣābhāvadoṣo niṣkampaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15522: 472_16-17 yadi tarhi sarvathāpi nāstyātmā kathaṃ kṣaṇikeṣu citteṣu cirānubhūtasyārthasya smaraṇaṃ bhavati pratyabhijñānaṃ vā /
SA01vakobhau:15526: 472_20-21 tādṛśo 'pi hyatadanvayaścittaviśeṣo na samarthaḥ tāṃ smṛtiṃ bhavayituṃ tadanvayo 'pi cānyādṛśo na samarthastāṃ smṛtiṃ bhavayitum /
SA01vakobhau:15527: 472_21-22 labhayathā tu samartha ityevaṃ smṛtirbhavatyanyasyāṃ sāmarthyādarśanāt /
SA01vakobhau:15529: 472_22-23 evaṃ hi devadattacetasā dṛṣṭaṃ yajñadattacetaḥ smaret /
SA01vakobhau:15531: 472_23-24 na hi tayoḥ saṃbandho 'sti akārya kāraṇabhāvādyathaikasaṃtānikayoḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15534: 472_25-26 saṃtatipariṇatyā yathoktamiti ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15543: 473_01-02 tato caitrākhyātsaṃtānāttāṃ bhavantīṃ dṛṣṭvocyate caitraḥ smaratīti /
SA01vakobhau:15551: 473_04-05 kva ca punaḥ smṛtirviniyoktavyā va evaṃ tasyāḥ svāmī mṛgyate /
SA01vakobhau:15560: hetureva tarhi svāmī prāpnoti phalameva ca svam /
SA01vakobhau:15561: 473_09 yasmāddhetorādhipatyaṃ phale phalena ca tadvān heturiti /
SA01vakobhau:15563_0: 473_10-12 yaścāpi sa caitrābhidhānaḥ saṃskārasamūhasaṃtāna ekato gṛhītvā gavākhyasvāmītyucyate
SA01vakobhau:15563_1: sa cāpi tasya deśāntaravikārotpattau kāraṇabhāvaṃ cetasi kṛtvā na tu khalu kaścidekaścaitro
SA01vakobhau:15565: 473_13 evaṃ ko vijānāti kasya vijñānamityevamādiṣu vaktavyam /
SA01vakobhau:15567: 473_15 yo 'pyāha bhāvasya bhavitrapekṣatvāt sarvo hi bhāvo bhavitāramapekṣate /
SA01vakobhau:15568: 473_15-16 yathā devadatto gacchatītyatra gatirbhāvo gantāraṃ devadattamapekṣate /
SA01vakobhau:15575: 473_18-19 so 'pi na kaścidekaḥ saṃskārā hi ta evaṃnāmānaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15576: 473_19-20 tatra yathā devadatto gacchati yathā vijānāti /
SA01vakobhau:15578: 473_20-22 kṣaṇikā hisaṃskārā abhinnasaṃtānā devadatta iti bālairekasattvapiṇḍagraheṇādhimuktāḥ svasya saṃtānasya deśāntare kāraṇaṃ bhavanta ucyante gacchati devadatta iti /
SA01vakobhau:15581: 473_23-24 ta eva ca punarvijñānasya kāraṇaṃ bhavanta ucyante jānāti devadatta iti /
SA01vakobhau:15583: 473_25 yattarhi "vijñānaṃ vijānātī"ti sūtra uktaṃ kiṃ tatra vijñānaṃ karoti /
SA01vakobhau:15591: 474_01-02 ata eva tadindriyādapyutpannaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātītyucyate nendriyam /
SA01vakobhau:15592: 474_02-03 athavā tathā 'trāpi vijñānasaṃtānasya vijñāne kāraṇabhāvādvijñānaṃ vijānātīti vacanānnirdoṣaṃ kāraṇe dartṛśabdanirdeśāt /
SA01vakobhau:15594: 474_04-05 api khalu yathā pradīpo gacchati tathā vijñānaṃ vijānātīti /
SA01vakobhau:15600: 474_08-09 yathā cābhijāyate tiṣṭhati rūpamityatra bhaviturbhāvādanarthantaratvamevaṃ vijñānasyāpi syāt /
SA01vakobhau:15601: 474_09-10 yadi vijñānādvijñānamutpadyate nātmānaḥ kasmānna nityaṃ tādṛśamevotpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṅkurakāṇḍapatradivat /
SA01vakobhau:15603: 474_11 eṣa hi saṃskṛtasya svabhāvo yadavaśyaṃ prabandhasyānyathātvaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:15604: 474_11-13 anyathā hi nikāmadhyānasamāhitānāṃ sadṛśakāyacittotpattau prathamakṣaṇaniṃrviśeṣatvāt paścādapi na syāt svayaṃ vyutthānam /
SA01vakobhau:15609_0: 474_15-17 yadyathā strīcittānantaraṃ yadi tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittamutpannaṃ bhavati tatpatiputrādicittaṃ
SA01vakobhau:15609_1: vā punaśca paścātsaṃtatipariṇatyā strīcittamutpadyate tat samartha bhavati tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittotpādane
SA01vakobhau:15612: 474_18-19 atha punaḥ paryāyeṇa strīcittādvahuvidhaṃ cittamutpannaṃ vahutara māsannataraṃ vā tadevotpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:15615: 474_20-21 saiva balīyasī bhāvanā kasmānnityaṃ na phalati /
SA01vakobhau:15623_0: 475_01-03 ya eva tvayamekīyastīrthika ātmaprabhavāṃ cittotpattiṃ manyate tasyaivedaṃ
SA01vakobhau:15623_1: sphuṭaṃ codyamāpadyate kasmānna nityaṃ tādṛśamevotpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṅkurakāṇḍapatrādivaditi /
SA01vakobhau:15627: 475_04-05 saṃyoginostu paricchinnatvādaprāptipūrvikā prāptiḥ samyoga iti lakṣaṇavyākhyānāccātmānaḥ paricchedaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15632: 475_06-08 astu vā saṃyogastathāpi nityamaviśiṣṭe manasi kathaṃ saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15634: 475_08-09 sa eva paricodyate kathaṃ buddhiviśeṣa iti /
SA01vakobhau:15637: 475_10-11 nahi kiñcidātmanaḥ upalabhyate sāmarthmauṣadha kāryasiddhāviva kuhakavaidyaphuḥsvāhānām /
SA01vakobhau:15642: 475_12-13 na hi te citravadarādivadādhārye nāpi sa kuḍacyakuṇḍādivadādhāro yuktaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15649: 475_16 ko hi sa gandhādibhyo 'nyāṃ pṛthivīṃ nirdhārayati /
SA01vakobhau:15651: 475_17-18 te hyeva tadākhyā gandhādayo yathā pratīyerannānya iti /
SA01vakobhau:15655: 475_20 sa eva valiṣṭhaḥ kasmānnityaṃ na phalati /
SA01vakobhau:15659: 475_22-23 smṛtyādīnāṃ guṇapadārthatvāt tasya cārthādavaśyaṃ dravyāśritatvāt teṣāṃ cānyāśrayāyogāditi cet /
SA01vakobhau:15668: 476_04-05 ahaṃ sukhī syāmahaṃ duḥkhī na syāmityevamarthaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15674: 476_06-08 gauro 'hamahaṃ śyāmaḥ sthūlo 'hamahaṃ kṛśaḥ jīrṇo 'hamahaṃ yuveti gaurādibuddhibhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇo 'yamahaṅkāro dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:15677: 476_09-10 ātmana upakārake 'pi śarīra ātmopacāro yathā ya evāyaṃ sa evāhaṃ sa evāyaṃ me bṛtya iti bhavatyupakārake 'pi ātmopacāro natvahaṅkāraḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15680: 476_11-12 yenaiva hi sahāsya saṃvandhaḥ kāyena cittena vā yatraivāyamahaṅkāra utpadyate nānvatra /
SA01vakobhau:15689: 476_16 asatyātmani ka eṣa sukhito duḥkhito vā /
SA01vakobhau:15695: 476_19 asatyātmani ka eṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ kartā kaśca phalānāṃ bhoktā bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:15701: 476_21-22 asti punaḥ kvacideva kārye kasyacit svātantryam /
SA01vakobhau:15707: 476_24-25 tatra kāyakarmaṇi tāvat kāyasya cittaparatantrā vṛttiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15708: 476_25-26 cittasyāpi kāye svakāraṇaparatantrā vṛttistasyāpyevamiti nāsti kasyacit svātantryam /
SA01vakobhau:15712: 476_28-01 yattu yasya pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tattsya kartetyucyate /
SA01vakobhau:15713: 477_01 na ca ātmanaḥ kvacidapi kāraṇatvaṃ dṛśyate /
SA01vakobhau:15715: 477_02-03 smṛtijo hi cchandaḥ cchandajo vitarko vitarkātprayatnaḥ prayatnādvāyustataḥ karmeti kimatrātmā kurute /
SA01vakobhau:15716: 477_03-04 phalasyāpica ka upabhogo yamayamātmā kurvannupabhoktā kalpyate /
SA01vakobhau:15720: 477_05-06 vedanādyanāśrayatvāt tadāśrayaśca ṣaḍāyatanaṃ nātmā yathā tathoktam /
SA01vakobhau:15722: 477_07-08 ātmanyapi sati kathaṃ vinaṣṭāt karmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15726: 477_09-10 naiva tu vayaṃ vinaṣṭāt karmaṇa āyatyāṃ phalotpattiṃ brūmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15734: 477_13-14 tat punaḥ puṣpānniṣpannaṃ kasmāttasya vījasya phalamityucyate /
SA01vakobhau:15736: 477_14-15 yadi hi tatpūrvikānnabhaviṣyat tattādṛśasya phalasyotopattau na samarthamabhaviṣyat /
SA01vakobhau:15741: 477_17-18 kā punaḥ saṃtatiḥ kaḥ pariṇāmaḥ ko viśeṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15742: 477_18-19 yaḥ karmapūrva uttarottaracittapravasaḥ sā saṃtatistasyā anyathotpattiḥ pariṇāmaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15745: 477_20-21 trividhakarmapūrvakatve 'pi yatkarma guru vā bhavatyāsannamabhyastaṃ vā yatkṛtaṃ sāmarthyaṃ dyotyate natvanyasya /
SA01vakobhau:15747: 477_23-24 "yat guru yaccāsannaṃ yaccābhyastaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat /
SA01vakobhau:15749: 477_25 tatra vipākahetvāhitaṃ tu vipākaphaladānasāmarthyaṃ vipākaṃ dattvā vinivartate /
SA01vakobhau:15753: 478_01-02 na tāvat dṛṣṭāntena sarvaṃ samānaṃ bhavati /
SA01vakobhau:15754: 478_02 tatrāpi tu na phalādeva punaḥ phalāntaramutpadyate /
SA01vakobhau:15757: 478_03-04 yo hi tatra bhūtaprakārāṅkuraṃ nirvartayati sa tasya vījaṃ nānyaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15758: 478_04-05 bhāvinyā tu saṃjñāyā sādṛśyādvā pūrvako 'pi saṃtāno bījamityākhyāyate /
SA01vakobhau:15759_1: 'kuśalo vā cittavikāra utpadyate tasmātpunarvikārāntaramutpadyate nānyatheti samānametat /
SA01vakobhau:15761: 478_07-09 yathā lākṣārasarañjitāt mātuluṅgapuṣpātsaṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣajaḥ phale raktaḥ keśara upajāyate na ca tasmāt punaranyaḥ evaṃ karmajādvipākāt na punarvipākāntaramiti /
SA01vakobhau:15763: 478_10-11 nānāvidhaśaktibhinnaistu karmabhiradhivāsitāḥ saṃtataya etāmavasthāṃ gatā īdṛśaṃ phalamabhinivartayantīti buddhānāmeva viṣayaḥ /
SA01vakobhau:15779: 479_03-04 ye dharmahetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
SA01vakobhau:15780: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
